content.text: SSH, the secure shell : the definitive guide. The danger of data being intercepted by unauthorized third parties in Internet communication is growing in today's communications society. The authors are dealing with network security and presenting various versions of the SSH (Secure Shell) network protocol. SSH offers robust and reliable TCP/IP-based solutions for various network security issues. The topic has been discussed in detail recently by K. Siyan (ID 50/95 - temporarily outdated). SSH is free software, but also available in various commercial added-value versions for different platforms. The focus of the book is on UNIX; Windows and other operating systems are treated somewhat shorter. System administrators and technically interested readers with previous knowledge (e.g. UNIX programs rsh, rlogin and rcp) are addressed, among other things, the login process on remote systems, data transfer between different computers, the generation of "protected" tunnels and the secured execution of processes on other computers. (3)
content.title_en: SSH, the secure shell : the definitive guide

content.text: Ocean circulation and climate: "Observations and modelling of the oceans" represents the findings of leading scientists on the knowledge of the ocean circulation after the completion of the investigation phase of the "World Ocean Circulation Experiment (WOCE). WOCE's physical and chemical measurements combined with satellite height measurements have created a data set of unprecedented bandwidth and accuracy. This data set provides the basis for the development of marine circulation models and combined marine-atmosphere circulation models that help to understand marine fluctuations and climate fluctuations and project climate changes. (MOD)
content.title_en: Ocean circulation and climate : observing and modelling the global ocean

content.text: The hydrographic structure in the German Bay : mainly illustrated on the basis of the available documents on temperature, salinity and density. The report reproduces the manuscript of the late German oceanographer Dr Erich Goedecke (1909-1969) on the hydrographic structure of the German Bay from the 1950s. The graphic representations have been partially revised. The report is considered as a supplement to the current state of knowledge of the oceanography of the German Bay and as a storage of knowledge.
content.title_en: The hydrographic structure in the German Bay : mainly represented on the basis of the available documentation on temperature, salinity and density

content.text: Computerization of the effects of hydrodynamic shocks : Part B7 of the Life-Cycle Design project; final report. Ship hydrodynamics, slumming, sloshing, finite volume method, free surface, container ships, tankers, catamarans
content.title_en: Calculation of the effects of hydrodynamic shocks : Part B7 of the Life-Cycle Design project; final report

content.text: How did they find their way? : the securing of the North Frisian coast trip; sea signs, sailing instructions and sea charts until the middle of the 19th century; from the coast trip to the high sea navigation; private navigation schools in North Frisian and their teachers. The writing on the North Frisian sea trip is divided into two parts. In the first part the author deals with the history of the nautical aids for the coastal navigation from the Rhine mouth to the Eider since the earliest times; landmarks, sailing instructions, sea signs and finally cartographic material were included. In the second part he describes the teaching of private North Frisian navigation schools, which were given from about 1630 to 1870 mainly on Föhr and Sylt and where the astronomical and mathematical knowledge for the high sea navigation was taught. The first teachers were pastors, later trained experienced seamen the young. They are listed here chronologically with the determined life data.
content.title_en: How did they find their way? : the security of the North Frisian coast; sea signs, sailing instructions and sea charts until the middle of the 19th century; from the coast to the high seas navigation; private navigation schools in North Frisian and their teachers

content.title_en: Power, torque, measurement and analysis system : Final report ; Start of project: 01.11.1999 - Final report: 30.04.2001

content.text: Reformation and the denominational age. Was the Reformation something completely new, revolutionary or was it part of a long-lasting reform process? Can the denominationalization even be understood as a > opening < of the modern age? For the first time, the authors offer an excellent overview of the most important questions that have been controversially discussed in the research on the Reformation since 1945, critically assess the state of research and outline development perspectives.
content.title_en: Reformation and the denominational age

content.text: Graphics and GUIs with MATLAB. To content: Full updates reflecting MATLAB 6.x improvements. Extended discussions on 2-D and 3-D graphics. New chapters on good GUI design and GUI data viewing techniques. Output viewing. Updated voice commands. Deeper coverage of programming techniques, such as data structures and repeat visit techniques.
content.title_en: Graphics and GUIs with MATLAB

content.text: Leisure-oriented spatial planning in practice: contributions from Hesse, Rhineland-Palatinate and Saarland. Tourism and leisure represent a difficult field of responsibilities, spatial demarcations, conceptual approaches and programmes in the planning practice. The Working Group "Leisure" of the Landesarbeitsgemeinschaft Hessen / Rhineland-Palatinate / Saarland of the ARL has examined as representative questions and important intersections of "non-specialist planning" leisure time and spatial planning for the three countries as possible. The structure of leisure planning is presented and fundamental problems and deficits in the planning coordination are addressed. Selected case studies show regional specialities (also from a neighbouring country), which are partly documented in detail with empirical studies.
content.title_en: Leisure-oriented spatial planning in practice : contributions from Hesse, Rhineland-Palatinate and Saarland

content.text: Environmental assessment of regional plans. Directive 2001/42/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 June 2001 on the assessment of the environmental impact of certain plans and programmes, which, by publication on 21 July 2001 (OJ L 197/30), has been implemented within three years and will have a significant impact on the planning and adoption of plans and programmes in the Federal Republic of Germany. The objective of Directive 2001/42/EC is to ensure "a high level of environmental protection in order to promote sustainable development and to contribute to the integration of environmental considerations in the preparation and adoption of plans and programmes by ensuring that certain plans and programmes which are likely to have significant environmental impacts are subject to environmental assessment in accordance with this Directive." The study deals with the various sub-aspects, such as the scope and procedure of environmental assessment, the decoping, the definition of the framework for the study (scoping), the environmental report, the monitoring of the effects of the effects and the implementation of the Directive in the German spatial planning law. Recommendations are made on the various areas.
content.title_en: Environmental assessment of regional plans

content.text: Databases : Data models, objects, WWW, XML. A. Heuer (BA 1/04) recently informed about databases. This book differs from this work by its holistic view. Thus, different data models are not side by side; cross references are produced. The practical presentation is oriented towards a large continuous case example, the "ceramic workshop" with its customer, order and product data. Both relational databases as well as object-oriented and object-related databases are treated. Here too, comparisons and an exhibition of the common features are described. Databases on the web are described under the aspect of dynamically generable HTML pages. XML (Extensible Markup Language) is well considered in the elementary techniques and their use in connection with databases. The practical reference is finally clearly illustrated with explanations for the acquisition of knowledge in databases in a process of (semi-)automatic extraction. Only little prior knowledge is required, e.g. via HTML. Also suitable for self-study tasks (with solutions in the WWW). (2)
content.title_en: Databases : Data models, objects, WWW, XML

content.text: The study also discusses the links between economic and transport development at regional level. It also discusses ways to promote regional economic cycles and thus reduce the volume of interregional transport. Traffic flows, environmental relief, regional economies, regional policies, structural policies, economic promotion, promotion programmes.
content.title_en: Environmental and transport relief by regional economic cycles : Research report 29896151

content.text: Spatial planning in the eastern border area of Bavaria: legal and practical perspectives. The order and development of coherent spaces over existing but transitory borders in the EU area poses major challenges for regional and regional planning. This applies especially to the EU eastward enlargement. The border barriers are overcome in an integrated approach by coordinating national and regional approaches across disciplines. In doing so, substantive and procedural regulations on both sides of the borders must be taken, which also follow EU law requirements. The legal forms of transnational coordination of spatial planning are presented in their current stock, their previous probation and their future perspectives. National and regional spatial planning is also addressed in the European context (European Council and EUREK). Two maps illustrate the institutionalised transnational and multilateral cooperation.
content.title_en: Spatial planning in the eastern border area of Bavaria: legal and practical perspectives

content.text: Characteristics for the electropractical operator : selected tables, images and diagrams from the VDE regulations as well as relevant EN and DIN standards. Publisher's text: The book serves as reference work with interpretations for existing important regulation regulations, standardized properties and terms, selected parameters and definitions. These must be observed in the preparation, production and testing of electrical systems and their most important equipment and equipment. Interpretations and original certificates of DIN and DIN VDE standards are also included.
content.title_en: Characteristics for the electropractical operator : selected tables, pictures and diagrams from the VDE regulations and relevant EN and DIN standards

content.text: Spatial risk management in technology and environment: disaster preparedness through spatial planning. The volume contains the results of the working group "Spatial risk management in technology and environment". Thus, for the first time, it has been possible to present the mutual overlap between disaster preparedness and spatially oriented planning in important basic principles. Spatial sciences have paid little attention to the large, disaster-related risks in environment and technology in the past. At the same time, the spatial dimension in the various scientific approaches to this topic has often been neglected. In view of the state of scientific research, the regional or spatial implications of major risks in environment and technology are systematically brought to the fore here. In this context, impacts on the human capital of a society are considered as well as on the natural, real and social capital. Often, it is an inappropriate use of sites and institutional deficits in social systems that are responsible for outstanding risks. The working group assumes that from the integrative view of spatial planning the anthropogenic dimension of large environmental and technical risks is the focus of interest. Spatial risk management in environmental and technical risks a) Spatial risk planning policy and risk planning planning policy.
content.title_en: Spatial Risk Management in Technology and Environment : Disaster Reduction through Spatial Planning

content.text: IT architectures : planning, integration, maintenance. In this book, the authors explain how IT systems can be structured and also address the questions of how different IT systems communicate with each other and how the complexity of IT environments can be mastered by appropriate structuring. These questions are becoming increasingly important in the age of increasing networking. The considerations taken into account apply regardless of whether the elements considered are software or hardware components. It is clear that an IT architecture is always composed of different hierarchical stages (from individual components to systems to domains of interacting systems) and can only be understood in the interplay of hierarchical stages. Methodical representation with many memorabilia, which often also works with drastic comparisons to the tasks of an architect in building buildings. Clearly, the benefits of an IT architecture and the need for independent training of IT architects are worked out. (3)
content.title_en: IT architectures : planning, integration, maintenance

content.text: Sustainable agriculture and food industry: challenges and opportunities in the value chain. *Further information Author: Target groups:Food industry and its associations, agricultural research organisations, economic, agricultural, research and environmental ministries and their authorities, including research institutions, parliamentarians, parties, universities and universities, specialised libraries
content.title_en: Sustainable agriculture and food industry: challenges and opportunities in the value chain

This second edition is extended by 40 pages, but smaller libraries therefore do not necessarily have to replace the 1st, especially if we have Weis, larger ones more often; however, a first purchase is recommended. (2)
content.title_en: Lighting technology for practitioners : basics, lamps, luminaires, planning, measurement

content.text: The library system in National Socialism: a research status analysis. The present study deals with the German library system in National Socialism. The focus is on answering the following questions: How did the book burnings occur in May 1933, who took responsibility for this and how did the actions take place in detail? What were the state regulations that the libraries had to fight with and how did the library staff react to it? How did the Association of German People's Librarians (VDV) and the Association of German Librarians (VDB) behave in relation to the political guidelines? What significance did the other library forms, such as the loan libraries, the confessional libraries or the libraries in National Socialist concentration camps, have? Numerous authors have dealt with the various aspects of the Nazi library policy in recent years and decades and gained new insights. Here, the attempt is now made to depict and analyse the research status of the history of the national libraries and the scientific libraries in the Third Reich on the basis of the literature and the history of the history of the library in particular, and the history of the history of the history of the library can be made clear and clear in the way of the way of the history of the history of the history.
content.title_en: The library system in National Socialism : a research status analysis

content.text: Physics of atoms and molecules : an introduction. The new edition of the classic covers the numerous modern applications, such as quantum optics, atomic and ion traps, high-precision spectroscopy, atoms in strong magnetic fields, Bose-Einstein condensates etc.
content.title_en: Physics of atoms and molecules : an introduction

content.text: Radio variety via satellite : this is how you go on reception!. Television reception via satellite is common, but less radio reception, which offers a variety of programs in some excellent sound quality. The author, known through several books on the subject of satellite reception (BA 6/03, 9/02, 7/02 etc.), deals in this volume specifically with radio reception from the technology to the extensive program range, which is constantly increased. A good understanding of the technical questions characterize the book and a large number of photos also allows the layman to easily carry out e.g. the connection to the HiFi system. The technically experienced reader will appreciate the program tables. About the antenna systems and their installation the author reports in the above mentioned books. (2)
content.title_en: Radio variety via satellite : this is how you get on reception!

content.text: Personal firewalls: 10 custom workshops. The "personal" in the title is certainly unnecessary, it is not about personal protection. Besides: the one, the or the firewall? Tobor uses "der", Microsoft "die" in Encarta, "der" in the computer lexicon, Brockhaus "die" and Bertelsmann "die" (the FAZ perhaps: "das"?). Anyway, the protection against external attacks on his own PC by such a firewall is important and is described here in 10 chapters ("Workshops"). 3 of these are included on available programs: ZoneAlarm 3, Outpost 1 and Sygate Personal Firewall 5.1 (all free and included on a CD-ROM; in March 2004 Sygate 5.5 is up-to-date). The following chapters deal with general questions and solutions that affect firewalls, moreover not quite so inexpensive professional solutions, but the last chapter describes variants of encryption, an appendix describes hacker programs (also on the CD-ROM) with which one can check vulnerabilities of one's own computer. - Well written and thoughtful work, which can turn away some mischief.
content.title_en: Personal Firewalls : 10 custom workshops

content.text: An Anatomy of Power: the Chomsky Reader. A large compilation of unpublished basic texts: Noam Chomsky is considered to be one of the most important intellectuals of our day worldwide. In the past thirty years he has published books that have become standard works of linguistics and political science. As one of the sharpest critics of the US-American world power politics, however, he has long since become a leading figure outside the academic circles. Today, people of all classes and age groups flock to his lectures. The meanwhile seventy-year-old manages effortlessly to fill rooms with up to ten thousand places. And the way in which Noam Chomsky spreads his thoughts is unique: quiet, quiet, with great thought. The speaker always allows inter-questions, so that the lectures often arise only from the dialogue between Chomsky and his audience. "The Anatomy of Power" gathers for the first time the most important of these speeches of the last ten years, which are of their particularly easy-to-understand dialogueal form because of the best introduction to Noam Chomsky's thoughts and represent an indispensable addition to his other books.
content.title_en: An Anatomy of Power : Chomsky Reader

content.text: Information technology and telecommunications technology. Practical textbook from basics to applications for all IT and telecommunications professions, especially IT professions. Update in the sense of technical development. Newly included: Electrical installations, as these contents are training content for IT system electronics. Basics (including electrotechnical), digital technology, workstation computers, transmission networks, network nodes, computer communication, reporting and signaling technology, IT terminal equipment and network accesses
content.title_en: Information technology and telecommunications

content.text: The best single-family houses under 150 m2 : Germany - Austria - Switzerland ; [Results of the competition HÄUSER AWARD 2004 "Haus des Jahres"]. Publisher's text: Single-family houses under 150 m2 are affordable for young families, offer space and flexibility and are not too large for singles and couples on the other hand. This book documents the results of the competition of the magazine HÄUSER, advertised in cooperation with the company Schüco and the German Architects' Association. A high-profile jury selected 27 excellent and three winning projects from hundreds of entries, which show the entire variety and beauty of this construction. Publisher's text: Single-family houses under 150 m2 are affordable for young families, offer space and flexibility and are not too large for singles and couples on the other hand. This book documents the results of the competition of the magazine HÄUSER, advertised in cooperation with the company Schüco and the German Architects' Association. A high-carry jury selected 27 award winning projects from hundreds of entries, three winning projects that show the whole variety and beauty of this construction.
content.title_en: The best single-family houses under 150 m2 : Germany - Austria - Switzerland ; [Results of the competition HÄUSER AWARD 2004 "Haus des Jahres"]

content.text: Process portals : Architecture for networking with customers and suppliers ; with 60 tables. Portals have developed into the central user interface in companies. Process portals continue this integration idea by connecting internal and inter-company applications and thereby giving their users role-based access to process-relevant information. The prerequisite for this is an integration approach that goes beyond the pure integration of HTML elements in a website and allows process-oriented bundling of semantically coordinated application modules. The book shows which building blocks a suitable architecture and integration model for this purpose, how different companies have implemented this model and how they can realize the benefits. TOC:Introduction.- Basics.- Information system architecture for process portals.- Application architecture for process portals.- Integration architecture for process portals.- Summary and outlook.- Attachment: IS architectures of software providers.- Portal architectures from the literature.- Portal architectures of software providers.- Comparison of methods Portal architecture.- EAI systems.- Comparison of methods Portal integration
content.title_en: Process portals : Architecture for networking with customers and suppliers ; with 60 tables

content.text: Business software : ERP, CRM, EAI, E-Business ; an introduction. Where information technology (IT) is used to support business tasks, software is its essential design element. If business software was initially only used to improve existing processes, it has increasingly become an organizational design tool in recent years. This book gives an introduction to business software, especially in ERP, CRM, EAI and e-business systems.
content.title_en: Business software : ERP, CRM, EAI, E-Business ; an introduction

content.text: Digital reception from A to Z : terms from practice, easily explained. More and more households receive their radio and television programmes from satellites like Astra or Eutelsat Hot Bird. But also the telephone and the Internet access are basically possible for private individuals via satellites. With this fascinating technology a multitude of concepts needing explanation come to the users. Although in the specialized trade generally good advice is found, however, there is also an interest in neutral information. This offers exactly this book. The reference work includes about 650 alphabetically ordered and thus quickly findable terms, which will facilitate the understanding of the new technology. All topics relevant to the satellite reception, especially analog and digital satellite radio, but also video and terrestrial television are dealt with. Whether basic terms on general satellite technology or special topics - the reader will find here! The book is generally written in an understandable manner, illustrated with 150 photos and offers background information and explanations for numerous terms.
content.title_en: Digital reception from A to Z : practical terms, explained in an easy-to-understand way

content.text: The main uses in the garden are shown in colour illustrations and drawings, their effect on pests and their possible use in the context of biological and integrated plant protection measures. The range of images ranges from spiders and insects to amphibians, reptiles, birds to insect-eating mammals. The narrow band is rather inconspicuous from the external appearance. In addition to and after the more attractive and extensive manual "The Great Cosmo Book of the Nutzlinge" (see M. Fortmann, BA 8/00) it can nevertheless be widely recommended for libraries with appropriate demand. (2)
content.title_en: Basic knowledge Useful : Helpers in modern plant protection

content.text: Manual IT in administration : with 16 tabs. Scientists and practitioners find contributions to research and development in the field of the use of computer science in public administration. Based on current developments and trends in public administration practice, it offers basic analyses and application-oriented considerations on topics of the present - e-government and new management model, IT use for administrative reform - and future, such as online elections etc. Administrative science and administration practical questions on the individual application systems and on the organization and management of IT use are discussed in detail and methodological approaches for the future are developed. TOC:Administrative computerization and administrative reforms.- Application systems, basic components.- (Re)Organisation of service delivery ("Werkättettettemlung").- Distribution routes for administrative services.- Support of democratic procedures.- Organisation and management of IT-Einputung.- Legal questions.-
content.title_en: Manual IT in administration : with 16 tabs.

content.text: The manual for technical product design: material and manufacturing; the basis for decision-making for designers and engineers. At the interface between product development/design and engineering there are sometimes communication and cooperation deficits that can significantly negatively affect the efficiency and quality of development and innovation processes. The reason for this is, among other things, skills gaps in terms of technical connections on the part of the design professions and creative service providers. Corresponding literature, in which basic technical know-how is prepared and imparted on the basis of semantics and the potential of designers and across the board, is not available on the market. The present book wants to close this gap. In development processes frequently used technical knowledge about materials and possible processing processes is prepared vividly and scientifically based in the form of a comprehensive reference work and presented in a way that addresses and supports the thinking of designers/engineers and representatives of designing professions. Through a corresponding form of representation it is possible to inform itself quickly and comprehensively about the wichtist technological framework for a design. Here, visually and intuitively apprehensive reading aids are introduced and the knowledge components within the book-exting process. TOC-exting materials.
content.title_en: Technical Product Design Manual : Material and Manufacturing ; Decision-making basis for designers and engineers

content.text: Stairs, stairs. The development of buildings is an essential aspect of design and detailed planning. In addition to constructive aspects and construction physics requirements, the formal, safety-relevant boundary conditions are to be considered. The aspects of barrier-free construction are of particular importance. The construction forms are presented - depending on building materials - in detailed sections. The present volume is rounded off by a presentation of the planning criteria when installing lifts and escalators. TOC:Basics and regulations.- Design criteria.- Barrier-free development.- Design forms.- Railings.- Escape routes.- Lifts and escalators.
content.title_en: Stairs, stairs

content.text: E-World : Technologies for the world of tomorrow. The development of new information technologies is progressing very quickly. Working world and society will change like never before. The author introduces the most important IT trends of the next years. He does not remain at the surface here, but tries to explain the background and thus to awaken a better understanding of the consequences that can arise from these developments. Problematic effects are clearly mentioned by the name. Core statement of the author is that control over the future E-World is indispensable. Only in this way can it be guaranteed that this E-World remains a human world. Interesting, lively, well comprehensible representation. Wide-ranging historical references. In part, the executive employee Frank K., a typical product of the modern, post-capitalist, global economic order, is also accompanied in his work and considerations. Helpful, universally understandable glossary in the scope of 13 pages. Good compilation of further information (including journal articles and addresses on the World Wide Web). (2)
content.title_en: E-World : Technologies for the World of Tomorrow

content.text: Apparatus elements: Practice of safe design. The book is an overview and help for the people involved in the problems of the apparatus construction and/or use.Apparates are "heartpieces" of process engineering plants, e.g. in the chemical industry. The most important elements of these devices such as wrapping, completion, connection and protection are treated with explanation, derivation and parameter studies in the form of diagrams, images and calculation of examples.The presentation is in their consistent arrangement (explanation, basics, measurements, parameter studies, calculation of examples) and the problems of practice. Particularities and new methods with many evidence and results to complement the rules - but also as supplementary proposals for the regulations - are groundbreaking. TOC:Introduction.-Franches, screws and seals.- Important formula signs.- Different calculation styles and overlection.- Cylindrical and ball-shaped coats.- Corrugated and cone-levels, flanges, screws and seals.- Excerptions of tubes- and tubes- Abstrusions- Abstrusions-.
content.title_en: Apparatus elements : Practice of safe design

content.text: Experiments on cooking, roasting, baking. Schwedt, professor of inorganic and analytical chemistry, became known to a wider audience through his carefully developed experimental books (most recently "Chemical Experiments in Castles, Monasteries and Museums", BA 3/03). Here he deals with the various cooking methods according to the motto "The kitchen - a chemical laboratory". An introduction "From the cooking art to food chemistry" goes ahead. The different cooking methods are divided into cooking with water or water vapour, with grease, in dry heat (microwave, grills) and without heat (by adding salt or acids). In addition, there are 111 experiments, which are described in detail and explained in detail regarding the chemical changes, which usually consist in visible changes (often the color). The kitchen appliances are likely to be available everywhere, the other equipment is available in specialized shops for laboratory use. The work is accompanied by numerous old images of kitchens and kitchen scenes. A successful experiment book, also chemistry teachers and (hobby) cows.
content.title_en: Experiments around cooking, roasting, baking

content.text: Internet pastoral care : the guide to practice. The Church is also looking for dialogue in the communication society. How can this dialogue be achieved on the Internet? How can one get contact with the soul and can pastoral care be done? Michael Belzer develops the framework in which internet pastoral care can become a field of pastoral activity of the Church.
content.title_en: Internet Seeking: the Practical Guide

content.text: The C# programming language: the complete reference; [from the inventor of the language C#; with features of the C# version 2.0]. CMpronounced C sharp) is an object-oriented programming language, which was developed specifically for .NET framework, the new basic technology of Microsoft for Windows and Internet applications. Good introductions to Cóind Th. Erler (BA 5/03) and W. Saumweber (BA 4/03). The present book is addressed to advanced and pros. The authors, all developers of C@ give first a comprehensive presentation of all language components of the meanwhile standardized language C@so as used under the development environments Visual Studio .NET 2002 and Visual Studio .NET 2003. The 2nd part deals with the further development of C@ which stands as version C=.0 shortly before the beginning of the beta test phase. The 4 main innovations of the new version are presented. These are generics (processes for parametrization of classes, structures etc.), anonymous methods (comparable the Lambda functions in storage, etc. for processing of the partial Ispulations) and the partial values (types of the language of the language of the C# programming).
content.title_en: The C# programming language : the complete reference ; [by the inventor of the language C# ; with features of the C# version 2.0]

metadata.authors: Wiltamuth, Scott; Golde, Peter; Hejlsberg, Anders

content.text: Health and human genetics: ethical arguments for binding predictive genetic tests to health purposes. Predictive genetic tests enable the identification of information about individuals The range of information ranges from information on nutrition advice to the diagnosis of serious genetic diseases. Thus, the range of test forms ranges from those for which there is no regulatory requirement at first sight, to those whose potential for risk is large. Currently, the problem is mainly due to the expanding offers for genetic investigations on the Internet. An assessment of the regulatory need of the practice of predictive genetic diagnostics is therefore urgently required: The present volume examines hazard potential and regulatory requirements for predictive genetic tests. It does not submit its own regulatory proposal, but develops medical ethical criteria for such regulations. An extensive documentation presents existing national and international regulatory approaches and analyses them.
content.title_en: Health and human genetics : ethical arguments for binding predictive genetic testing to health purposes

content.text: Scandinavian living design: elegant and simple. After the presentation of the essential materials that determine the Scandinavian living style, wood, glass, fabrics, ceramics and carpets, the example of 12 unique houses in Denmark, Sweden and Finland illustrates the range of Scandinavian living culture, from modern country house to elegantly styled urban apartment. The architect's design idea behind it is described in detail under its name from planning to realization and presented in photographs. Stand in "Scandinavian Design" (BA 7/03) the material in the foreground, so here are the architects and designers. The style, as the subtitle describes, is always elegant and simple. A very meaningful volume in solid presentation. (2)
content.title_en: Scandinavian living design : elegant and simple

content.text: Introduction to systemic knowledge management. The challenge of coping with increasing amounts of knowledge is often seen as a threat rather than an opportunity. Systemic knowledge management offers valuable and effective support, especially when it comes to achieving certain strategic goals. Helmut Willke combines theory and practice in this compact introduction to make them usable for each other.
content.title_en: Introduction to systemic knowledge management

content.text: Fire on board! : Flight accidents: backgrounds, causes and consequences. Books about aircraft accidents usually convey a certain fascination of horror. To this end, one usually does not need to make any illegitimate elements, authentic radio protocols for example fulfill this "purpose" fully - best example is Helmut Kreuzer: "Absturch" (BA 7/02). The present new phenomenon also strives by letting away voyeuristic sensational elements such as victim images or avoiding sentimental ways of looking at factual, fact-oriented representation. However, fact-richness and clarity speak for above mentioned titles, but "Fire on board" has an invaluable advantage: that of topicality. To the terror attack on September 11, 2001, the volume contains protocols of all radio and telephone conversations of all involved machines and beyond - chronologically and through a skillful short-cut system very easily comprehensible and easily precedeable. Spectacular, but by no means sensational illustrations as well as illustrious graphics round off.
content.title_en: Fire on board! : Flight accidents: backgrounds, causes and consequences

content.text: Linear algebra and analytical geometry: a textbook for physicists and mathematicians. The first five chapters of this new textbook correspond to the standard of a modern lecture on linear algebra according to the content and method. The presentation is from the beginning vivid and geometric. The basic statements of linear algebra are reached by cone sections, projective geometry, the main axis transformation, tensors, Lie algebras and symplectic groups. Physicists find a discussion of quaternions, Pauli matrices, orthogonal and unitary groups and the Lorenz group. TOC:School wisdom.- I. Vector spaces.- II. Matrice calculus.- III. The determinant.- IV. Bilinear forms.- V. The Jordanian normal form.- VI. Geometry.- VII.Tensor calculus.- VIII. Linear groups and Lie algebras.- IX. Quaternions and orthogonal groups.- X. Rings and modules.- X.
content.title_en: Linear algebra and analytical geometry : a textbook for physicists and mathematicians

content.text: The Beetle: Ferdinand Porsche and the development of the Volkswagen. Over twenty years of research, among other things in the very early archives of Volkswagen and Porsche, a multitude of previously unpublished photos and development plans as well as the competence of one of the most renowned international motor journalists and proven beetle experts, condensed themselves into a fascinating car biography in "The Beetle". Numerous books have so far illuminated the career of the beetle, but all are only very vaguely his development history. Author Chris Barber, however, focuses precisely on this epoch of the cult car from Wolfsburg. He goes back seventy years and accompanies the ingenious car developer Ferdinand Porsche and his team on their mission to build a vehicle that should revolutionize the automobile market. The Volkswagen should be easy to use, it should provide enough space for a five-member family, it should be robust and to produce in large series and: He should be extremely inexpensive to many decades already this art piece managed by Ferdinand Porsche in a politically diffuse and dangerous environment. Chris Barber's sovereign view is to be owed to the fact that the description of the technical leader of the Brävost is not able to place the Daphgen.
content.title_en: The Beetle : Ferdinand Porsche and the development of the Volkswagen

content.text: I don't play along! : Effects of "intelligence" on television, video and computer games - and what can be done about it; a handout for parents and teachers. The authors note an increasing number of violence in the electronic media and want to announce the fight to these "children's spoilers". With this perspective they report how young people use entertainment medicine today, show what effects "intelligence" has on children and young people, and make suggestions what parents and educators can do against the "internal pollution" of our youth. With a similar tenor, but more systematic and profound Rudolf H. Weiß (ID 28/99) has already looked at the problem, a realistic but also very critical inventory provides Thomas Feibel (BA 02/02). - For educators in school and youth education and also for parents. (2 S)
content.title_en: I'm not playing with it! : Effects of "intelligence" on television, video and computer games - and what to do about it ; a handout for parents and teachers

content.text: Living pastures in the garden. Apparently, building with living pastures that are re-emerging is more and more fashionable (see e.g. "The pastures building book", BA 9/99, and J. Warnes "Building with pastures", BA 11/02). This richly illustrated book provides detailed instructions for building huts, garden houses, rocking frames, labyrinths, tunnels, fences and archways. But also the gardening trade i.e. cultivation, care and cutting of pastures is presented in detail. In addition, there is an overview of the most widely spread and wild species especially in terms of the use of building material. All projects can be realized in their own, not too small garden. Besides or instead of the above title in each library to be used. (2) (Hans-Ulrich Struck) Besides gardening tips on cultivation, care and cutting of pastures, there are precise instructions for building huts, garden houses, fences and other gardening projects with living pastures.
content.title_en: Live willow lichens in the garden

content.text: The luxury of emptiness : from the difficult retreat from the world of growth : [a controversial text]. Shrinking cities, unifying landscapes: The current urbanist debates are determined by worrying tones. Far more than a million apartments are empty in East Germany and are to be torn down to large parts. The West too is experiencing the transformation processes: where traditional production sites are abandoned, more and more balancing and regulating mechanisms are shaken. The existential crisis of housing in the New Länder is only an indicator of a far-reaching change in our old-trusted social and regional structures as a whole.
content.title_en: Luxury of emptiness : from the difficult retreat from the world of growth : [a disputation]

content.text: The book provides a comprehensive and vivid overview of the basics and expertise of the modern materials technology of the electrical professions. In addition to the basic materials and traditional materials of electrical engineering and electrical engineering, the modern materials of electronics are presented and the manufacturing processes of various electronic components are described. In addition, the current high-tech materials of electronics, computer science, energy technology and telecommunications are treated. In the new edition, the subject content, text and images have been improved and the current DIN and DIN EN standards are incorporated. Thus, the book corresponds to the latest state of the art and the technical regulations.
content.title_en: Materials technology for electrical occupations

metadata.authors: Tkotz, Klaus; Ignatowitz, Eckhard; Spielvogel, Otto

content.text: What is self-regulation? : A location determination. Self-regulation, a central term for humanistic forms of therapy and for contemporary infant research, is an important development goal. In this book, self-regulation is discussed from the perspective of different therapeutic approaches and discussed in terms of its therapeutic relevance.
content.title_en: What is self-regulation? : A location determination

content.text: My car repairs itself: [and other technologies from the day after tomorrow]. The author is a chemist, works as a freelance scientific and economic journalist and has also (together with his wife) written the book "Lust und Liebe - alles nur Chemie?" (BA 9/04). Here he deals with the (possible) future, describes current innovative developments and provides visions for technical progress in areas such as computers, energy, environment, automobile, etc. In the automobile he outlines e.g. the possibilities that could be offered by the use of the fuel cell; in the field of world nutrition he focuses on the potential of gene technology and in the field of medicine he reports on the possibilities of pharmacogenetics or the "diabetestable". In the flow text, "excursions" are scattered, in which technical backgrounds (e.g. the functioning of the direct methanol fuel cell) are made clearer or nearby topics (e.g. the situation of research and the young scientists in Germany) are addressed. A popular scientific "panorama view" of the "innovation landscape".
content.title_en: My car repairs itself : [and other technologies from the day after tomorrow]

content.text: Handbook of plastic optics. Optical and optomechanical plastic components are the focus of this volume. All stages of the production process are handled from design to materials, equipment and technologies to quality control. An indispensable plant for all specialists in optical components in research and development
content.title_en: Handbook of plastic optics

content.text: Relational database systems : a practical introduction ; with numerous examples and exercises ; [now based on PostgreSQL]. This book is a practical introduction to the design and programming of relational database systems. It provides detailed knowledge of the database standard language SQL as well as the theoretical basics necessary for the design of such database systems. Numerous examples and detailed exercises enable the reader to design his own database applications - especially for the integration of databases in the World Wide Web - after a short time. The book is particularly suitable as a guide to relevant courses at universities and universities of applied sciences in business studies or in the Computer Science degree programme. Also the practitioner, who needs database knowledge for application development languages as well as database administration tasks, will quickly acquire the necessary basic knowledge with this book.
content.title_en: Relational database systems : a practical introduction ; with numerous examples and exercises ; [now based on PostgreSQL]

content.text: Statistics : Data analysis and probability calculation. The book introduces the most important statistical methods from data collection to descriptive techniques to final analysis including multivariate methods. Particular importance is attached to the presentation of the substance that the properties and correlations of the statistical methods become clear. Numerous examples and illustration illustrations contribute to the application of the presented methods and thus further understandability of the text. By integrating the probability calculation and introducing multivariate methods, the book is not only to be used as a textbook but also as a compendium for statistics. TOC:Descriptive statistics.- Close statistics.- Introduction into the multivariate methods
content.title_en: Statistics : Data analysis and probability calculation

content.text: The Heidelberg Karl-Theodor-Globus from 1751 to 2000 : Maintaining the past with current methods for the future. A successful example of a lively collaboration with different disciplines is illustrated by the restoration of this important cultural asset: The Heidelberg specimen of a Vaugondy globe from 1751 has a changeable history and has been extensively restored in recent times with state-of-the-art methods. Historical sources about the type of production of globes were consulted as well as modern mathematical processes from image processing, with which the digitized world map was filtered. In the examination of historical aspects, an insight into the importance of globes and the emergence of a new world image in the 18th century, which was accompanied by the scientific academies. TOC:To the introduction:Interdisciplinarity - and an Earth globe of the 18th century.- Paris, Mannheim, Heidelberg: The path of two globe pairs through the Kurpfalz.- On the art historical significance of the constellation.- The restoration of the globe.- Map prediction representing the image of the processing of the historical significance.
content.title_en: The Heidelberg Karl-Theodor-Globus from 1751 to 2000 : Keeping the past with current methods for the future

content.text: Warehouse Management : Automation and organization of warehouse and picking systems. Warehouse Management Systems are state-of-the-art in the internal material flow control. In addition to the elementary functions of a warehouse management such as quantity and storage space management, conveyance control and disposition, methods and means for controlling system states as well as operating and optimization strategies are included. The book includes a CD-ROM with a fully operational WMS (Open Source).The associated simulation environment enables the autonomous operation on a   standard PC (Windows). TOC:Management of warehouse systems.- Fundamentals of warehouse and conveying technology.- Material flow automation.- Automatic identification.- Information and communication technology.- Realization of warehouse management systems.- Construction of WMS using the example myWMS.- Abbreviation directory.- Literature directory.- Property directory.-
content.title_en: Warehouse Management : Automation and organization of storage and picking systems

content.text: The manual on the accident investigation. It addresses all authorities, organisations and companies that need to be involved in an accident involving large aircraft at the accident site. It contains relevant national and international laws and regulations, explains their context and application, the interdisciplinary cooperation and the involvement of foreign representatives and investigation bodies. The tasks, duties and rights of the national accident investigation body are explained. The practical crisis management, the preparations to a major accident as well as victim and family care, identified problems in accident investigations and ICAO exercises are discussed.The annexes contain important information on aircraft design, emergency and safety facilities in large aircraft, flight data recorders, conversion tables and important abbreviations in aviation. TOC:Preliminary notice.- Introduction.- Development of the accident investigation.- Legal basis.- Convention on International Civil Aviation (ICAO).- Directive 94/56/EC.- International regulations in the investigation.- Introduction of the investigation.- Divisions- Investigation- Investigation- Interdisciplinary- Cooperation- Interdisciplinary- Interdisciplinary- Investigations.- Interdisciplinary- Investigations.- Interdisciplinary- Investigations.- Interdisciplinary- Research.- Research.
content.title_en: Manual on the accident investigation

content.text: Electronic correlation mapping : from finite to extended systems. Knowledge of the motion of electrons in solids and their interactions with their environment allows to make statements about magnetic and optical material properties. This book presents the first independent and comprehensive publication on the description and prediction of electron movements in solids. Volume 1 introduces to the theoretical background (coulomb scattering, 3-particle and multiparticle systems), in the second volume a selection of possible applications is presented (electrons in crystal, scattering, quantum dots)
content.title_en: Electronic correlation mapping : from finite to extended systems

content.text: Application of the finite element method in concrete construction : sources of errors and their avoidance. The simple, clear and manageable static calculations are increasingly being replaced by numerical methods based on the finite element method. Based on practical examples from the building and engineering construction industry, questions of numerical mapping of concrete structures are being explained, the problems and possible sources of errors occurring in this process. The book is aimed at both practical engineers and students. The rapid sale of the first edition has shown that the book closes a gap
content.title_en: Application of the finite element method in concrete construction : sources of fault and their avoidance

content.text: The statistical laboratory : Introduction and User Manual. The statistical laboratory is an interactive working environment with which statistical functions and presentation possibilities can be easily and intuitively processed. As a window-based interface for the statistical programming environment R, it also allows a much easier access to the extensive functionality of R. The manual for the statistical laboratory is divided into three parts. The first describes the laboratory and its functionality in detail. In order to illustrate the implementation of tasks with the laboratory, some standard evaluations are presented in the second part. These cover the material of a basic course on statistics. Applications are not presented "naked" but the respective methodological background is given. A chapter on the most important R functions round off the book. TOC:The statistical laboratory.- Some standard evaluations.- Important R functions
content.title_en: The Statistical Laboratory : Introduction and User Manual

content.text: Technical optics in practice : with 20 tables. In this book, experts from research and practice summarize the different aspects of classical geometric optics and modern fiber optics and optoelectronics in compact form. Through application and implementation related chapters, the authors offer a high degree of practical benefit. Thus, the book makes an important contribution to the education and training of students and engineers. The high importance of compact light sources for optical technologies was taken into account in the new edition by a chapter "New Lasers". TOC:Geometric Optics.- Wave Optics.- Image errors and optical systems.- Development of optical systems.- Optical materials.- Specifications and production of optical components.- Optoelectronics components.- Fibers and sensors.- Lasers.- New lasers.- Property and author directory
content.title_en: Technical optics in practice : with 20 tables

content.text: The BIM-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-Integrated-Integrated-Integrated-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-Integrated-In-In-Integrated-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-In-based-In-In-In-based-In-In-In-In-In-----In-In-In-----------------------In-In---In-In-In-In-In-In-In-------------------
content.title_en: Software development of embedded systems : basics, modelling, quality assurance

content.text: Liquid ring vacuum pumps, compressors and systems : conventional and hermetic design. Modern industrial process technology is not conceivable without vacuum technology. From the practice of the active engineers this manual was created, which gives an overview of the entire vacuum range
content.title_en: Liquid ring vacuum pumps, compressors and systems : conventional and hermetic design

content.text: Technical Chemistry: Introduction to chemical reaction technology; with 47 tables and 35 mathematical examples. This textbook is a classic of chemical reaction technology. Important data have been updated for the 5th edition. A new chapter on microreaction technology supplements the book, which finally treats this sub-area as an independent chapter in a German-language textbook. The book can ideally complement the study as a complete introduction to the subject in scientific and practical terms. TOC:Basics.- Tasks.- Effectively optimal process management.- Physical and physical-chemical basics.- General material and heat balances for single-phase reaction systems.- The discontinuous mixing of the reaction mass (satreactor) with complete (ideal) mixing of the reaction mass.- Continuous reaction management without remixing of the reaction mass (ideal flow tube).- Continuous reaction management with complete remixing of reaction mass in the reactor (continuously operated ideal boiler and cascade).
content.title_en: Technical Chemistry : Introduction to chemical reaction engineering; with 47 tables and 35 examples of calculations

content.text: Dachstuhlen. Publisher's text: The roof is the original form of human dwellings, in which wood as a building material for the use of roof constructions is still of enormous importance at least in residential buildings. Due to the low weight, the fast assembly, the elementality and the modern connection technology, wooden roof chairs will also be used in the future. The book provides an overview of the common construction systems used in the old building and new building, up to special shapes, roof gullows and modern constructions. Also constructive approaches are shown and explained, as well as hints to analyze the inventory and to put constructive measures to enable later roof space use. Furthermore, the principles of roof stiffening are explained and construction suggestions are given.
content.title_en: Roof chairs

content.text: Mathematics compact : for engineers and computer scientists : with 10 tables ; [Extras on the Web]. This compact and easy to understand math book impresses with its successful selection of materials and its didactical advantages: - Visual, relaxed style - Summary of each chapter - Randnotes for fast navigation - Test questions - Examples and applications - Typical errors and their avoidance - Tips for study. The author limits himself to the material that is relevant today and dispenses with unnecessary evidence. Modern topics such as probability calculation and statistics are convincingly presented. The book is suitable for lecture accompaniment as well as for self-study and as reference work. Accompanying for lecturers on the Internet slides are provided for download. TOC: Mathematical basic concepts.- Consequences and finite sums.- Functions.- Algebra.- Linear algebra.- Differential calculus.- Series.- Integration.- The complex numbers.- Differential equations.- Probability calculation and statistics.- Tips for study.- Literature index.- Index.-
content.title_en: Mathematics compact : for engineers and computer scientists : with 10 tables ; [Extras on the Web]

content.text: Self-evaluation in vocational education and training: concept, practice, limits, action requirements, instruments. Reflection and self-evaluation are central elements of professional action at an individual and organizational level. Self-evaluation in company development processes proves to be a flexible approach to quality assurance of projects. The concept of "self-evaluation" is suitable for process evaluation and the empowerment of individuals, teams and organizational units. Special features are the application orientation of learning, participation and frequent feedback of the participants. The volume includes an educational pass successfully tested in companies.
content.title_en: Self-evaluation in vocational training: concept, practice, limits, needs for action, instruments

content.text: Facades : Building envelopes for the 21st century : building envelopes for the 21st century. This volume combines special solutions and ideas of facade concepts that are exceptional in urban, architectural, technical, constructive and functional terms. This is what 186 international architectural examples and innovative plans by renowned architects, who show a comprehensive overview of the technical possibilities of modern building envelopes in a typological order - including Murphy/Jahn, Daniel Libeskind, Ingenhoven Overdiek, Gehry Partners, BRT Architekten, Foster and Partners, Richard Meier & Partners, WS Atkins & Partners
content.title_en: Facades : Building envelopes for the 21st century : building envelopes for the 21st century

content.text: Measurement technology : System theory for electrical engineers. This textbook deals with the system technical and system theoretical principles of measurement technology. It focuses on the common methods common to all measurement systems, which describe the physical behaviour by means of a mathematical model, which improve the static and dynamic properties of measurement systems, measure stochastic quantities and collect data in the digital computer. For a better & nbsp;linking to the theory of stochastic processes, the theoretical foundations and the systematic classification of signal classes are summarized. The term power density is introduced and the Viennese filter is presented. Further topics are a comprehensive system theoretical description of errors in digital measurement data acquisition as well as the recording of frequency analog signals. With numerous examples, illustrations and exercises. TOC:From the content: measurement systems and measurement errors.- Curve adjustment .- Stationary behavior of measurement systems.- Dynamic behavior of measurement systems.- Random measurement errors.- Correlation measurement technology.- Recording of amplitude analogue signals.- Recording of frequency analogue signals.- Identification of frequency analogue signals.- Symbols.- Directory of references.
content.title_en: Measurement technology : System theory for electrical engineers

content.text: Writing ArtRooms : Calligraphy in space. The traditional art form of calligraphy is also a means of wall and room design. Artfully used, it can both increase and deepen the effect of space and text. This book gathers 26 projects of the writer Propfe from very different spaces (private, public, commercial). In addition to the representation of the finished project in the whole and in detail, sketches and wall patterns show the design and work process. An inspiring book and gift for painters and interior designers, interior designers as well as private and commercial builders.
content.title_en: WritingArtRooms : Calligraphy in space

content.text: Hamburg : a companion to new landscape architecture. Publishing advertising: Parks, squares, promenades, passages is the urban open space. The new book series of the renowned specialist magazine Garten+Landschaft presents the best current examples of designed public spaces. Each volume presents 40 projects of contemporary landscape architecture. All are described competently as well as with plan, photo, location sketch and complete project data.
content.title_en: Hamburg : a companion to new landscape architecture

content.text: The anarchy of hackers: Richard Stallman and the Free Software Movement. How anarchist is hacker ethics? Why does Richard Stallman, one of the most outstanding figures of the Free Software Movement, call himself an anarchist? We must not imagine the anarchists of free software as clichéd chaots with wreaky hairs, crazy eyes and arms full of bombs. Quite the contrary: They demand a new order of intellectual property in the sense of hacker ethics - access to knowledge should be free, decentralized, anti-bureaucratic and anti-authoritarian
content.title_en: The anarchy of hackers : Richard Stallman and the Free Software Movement

content.text: Management of virtual enterprises : Software support and innovative technologies; [this publication was created within the framework of the project "Tool-supported management of knowledge-intensive services in virtual enterprises" funded by the BMBF]. This volume shows the technical requirements for software to support the management of service-oriented virtual enterprises. It describes with VICOPLAN a prototype, which was developed within the framework of a BMBF-funded project entitled αTool-supported management of knowledge-intensive services in virtual enterprises± at the universities of Göttingen (Wirtschaftsinformatik II) and Munich (Wirtschaftsinformatik und Neue Medien). It was also analyzed whether virtual enterprises can be supported meaningfully by the use of innovative technologies such as XML, Web Services and OLAP systems.
content.title_en: Management of virtual enterprises : Software support and innovative technologies ; [this publication was published in the framework of the project "Tool-supported management of knowledge-intensive services in virtual enterprises" funded by the BMBF]

content.text: The ancient culture was a coastal culture and has always been characterized by the battle with the sea. Maritime transport made it possible to spread urban civilization. War on the sea helped to break through the Athenian democracy. The conquest of the sea was a prerequisite for the emergence of the Roman empire, allowing the unification of Greek-Roman civilization and the spread of Christianity. The search for fame and wealth finally prompted Mediterranean sailors to venture into the oceans and consider a journey to India over 1000 years before Columbus. Raimund Schulz describes the driving forces that Greeks and Romans repeatedly moved to sea, and clears up with numerous legends and prejudices such as the alleged anti-sea nature of the Romans. He describes the essential stages of the "conquest" of the sea, taking into account in particular the world of adventurers, mercenaries and outsiders who were at home on the sea. For the first time, the effects of maritime expansion on the mentality, culture, philosophy and economy of Greek and Roman civilization are analysed extensively.
content.title_en: The ancient and the sea

content.text: New areas of technical infrastructure systems: Research status and perspectives on spatial aspects of the change of electricity and water supply in Germany. 4207 The liberalisation of markets as well as the privatisation of state property and public tasks are among the most important recent developments in the political economy of many countries. This development is particularly noteworthy in the area of infrastructure and supply services. In addition to the commercialization of public services so far, the ecological modernization of some infrastructure systems results in a far-reaching transformation dynamic. This concerns particularly the systems of energy and water supply as well as wastewater disposal, which organize a significant part of the metabolism between nature and society. It is to be assumed that these developments trigger significant spatial changes. The aim of the study is therefore to analyse various aspects of the spatial change of German energy and water supply. Here, various scientific discussion strands are brought together, where important aspects are supplemented and critically reflected in the context of the situation in Germany. The study is primarily intended to structure a new spatial scientific research field. The starting point of the study is the social science concept of the large technical analysis systems.
content.title_en: New rooms of technical infrastructure systems: Research status and perspectives on spatial aspects of the change in electricity and water supply in Germany

content.text: From classical physics to quantum physics: a historical-critical deductive derivation with examples of applications from solid-state physics. This book takes a novel path from classical to quantum physics. After describing the Eulerian and Helmholtzian representations of classical mechanics, Schrödinger equation is derived without making any additional assumptions about the nature of quantum mechanical systems. Here, the differences between classical and quantum mechanics are not emphasized, but the commonalities of classical and quantum mechanics are solved and four basic problems of quantization named by Schrödinger are solved. Extensively reference is made to historical literature. This book is not only addressed to students and scientists, but also to school teachers: It contains many details that no longer go into modern representations of classical mechanics, but are important for the understanding of quantum physics. TOC:Why quantum theory?.- To the relationships between classical mechanics and quantum mechanics.- Basic concepts of classical mechanics.- From classical mechanics to quantum mechanics.- From particle to multi-part system.- The representation number of numbers for quantum theory.
content.title_en: From classical physics to quantum physics : a historical-critical deductive derivation with examples of applications from solid state physics

content.text: User's manual for testing web applications: test procedures, tools, practice tips; with 26 tables. A web application can be accessed from anywhere on the Internet. Users, their working behaviour and their internet knowledge are unknown. It is not predictable how many people access a web site at what times. Errors of any kind drive customers directly to the competitor. The technical possibilities of WWW change permanently. These circumstances make the quality of a business-relevant web application a critical success factor for a company. This book describes the measures that ensure the adequate quality of a web application. It explains how quality is defined and measured. It explains the necessary testing procedures and their support by test software. There are concrete work aids in the form of checklists. Testers and Webmasters get the craft tool for their tests. Test managers and project managers know quality risks to properly evaluate and plan all necessary quality assurance measures in time. TOC:Preface/Thank you.-Policy-test.-Sources - What does this book want? - Quality - How defines quality? - Document and Content-Test.-Surface-test.-Test-Test-Test-Test-Test-Test.
content.title_en: Manual for testing web applications : test procedures, tools, practical tips ; with 26 tables

content.text: The kitchen: the world of life, use, perspectives. The new "Edition Wohnen" is published by art historians and scientists of the ETH Zurich Residential Forum. The collection deals with the kitchen as a central living space of domestic life, in which cultural and social changes are reflected: from the housewife in the 8 sqm kitchen to the luxurious high-tech kitchen for trend-conscious hobby chefs. Topics include the historical development of the kitchen from the Gründerzeit to today (Frankfurter Küche, Wohnküche, Normküche), kitchen concepts and lifestyles, the development of the Swiss kitchen standard and European alternatives, modern kitchen planning today for patchwork families or single households. Visually appealingly designed with many historical and current illustrations, advertising materials, floor plan drawings. Understandably written and scientifically based with numerous literature information, besides interior architects and kitchen planners, are addressed above all to culture interested people.
content.title_en: The kitchen : world of life, use, perspectives

content.title_en: Manual Accreditation of degree programmes : an introduction to higher education, politics and professional practice

content.text: A European model? : National minorities in the German-Danish border country 1945 - 2005. After the excitement about the emerging participation of the SSE government in the minority issue, the interest in the minority issue is likely to grow. This book, which appears in the series of the Institute for S.-h. Time and Regional History, is just right. After the collection of the Nazi period ("Between Hope, Adaptation and Distress"), German and Danish historians, lawyers, theologians and politicians are concerned with the question of how the relationship between the German, Danish and Frisian minorities after 1945 has developed and whether it can rightly be considered a European model. The contributions deal with various aspects such as parties, church life, cross-border cooperation, legal issues, organizations of the three ethnic groups etc. Model annex with the text of important political documents (e.g. the Bonn-Kopenhagen Declaration), time table and a detailed list of sources and literature. Breiter recommended. (S. Gülck)
content.title_en: A European model? : National minorities in the German-Danish border country 1945 - 2005

content.text: Balconies and terraces : Planning and execution. Publisher's text: The book provides planners and executives with important design details to avoid damage and defects in construction by means of proper planning and professional craftsmanship. All work steps for the construction of balconies and terraces, from the construction of the rough construction to the laying of coverings, are easily illustrated with detailed drawings. Numerous calculation and execution examples as well as illustrations illustrate the topic. In the 5th edition all regulations and recommendations were adapted to the current state of the art and the valid standards and guidelines IBM for example with the concrete and screed standards or new drainage system solutions. A detailed chapter on damage to balconies and terraces, which addresses damage images, their causes and measures for avoiding them, is new. Updated construction drawings for the execution examples as well as new illustrations, especially on the damage topics, round off the new edition.
content.title_en: Balconies and terraces : tarpaulins and executions

content.text: Integrated Information Management : Strategies and Solutions for the Management of IT Services. This book is aimed at IT managers and IT consultants. The reader receives a practical overview, but in particular suggestions for solutions for the successful management of his information technology. The first part describes six current trends and challenges in information management. The second part presents a comprehensive model for integrated information management, which provides a response to Part 1. The individual components of the model are presented. The third part describes six concrete examples of how to implement selected concepts of integrated information management into practice. A basis of the book is the transfer of successful management concepts from industrial production to IT management. The contents of the book are created in a competence center that the University of St. Gallen operates with a number of renowned large companies. The examples described in the book are largely the results of concrete pilot projects implemented in the partner companies of the Competence Center.
content.title_en: Integrated Information Management : Strategies and Solutions for the Management of IT Services

content.text: Child abuse : recognize, help, prevent. Information on the topics prevention and therapy in child abuse, equally suitable for parents, kindergarten teachers etc. (LK/WIT: von Grote) Compared to the first edition (BA 1/99, was not available for comparison) by 25 pages extended edition of the important title on child abuse. The psychologist Deegener has long been concerned with the topic. In this well-readable, understandable and at the same time technically well-founded book, pedagogical, psychological and legal, but also historical and social aspects of the topic are dealt with. The presentation takes the form of typical questions and theses, which are answered and executed in short, clear sections. The extensive literature data, divided into sections such as literature for affected children, parents and legal counsellors, among others, have been updated, the directory with further addresses is extensive. The all-round successful volume, which was characterized by Heidrun Küster as "premender Arbeits- und Informationsmittelt" (Prestigious Work and Information Agents), can be recommended as a replacement or for initial purchase everywhere. (1)
content.title_en: Child abuse : detect, help, prevent

content.text: Family houses: a lot of space on a small footprint. Family houses should provide sufficient space for all residents, be compact and economically constructed, use small plots creatively, integrate the garden and offer flexible layouts for the future. The present sample collection shows 30 tailor-made architectural houses from Germany, Austria and Switzerland, which optimally meet these specifications with scarce builder budgets. Each house is presented on 4 - 6 pages with texts based on discussions between builders and architects. Quotes from the residents confirm the satisfaction with their house. With photos of furnished and inhabited interiors, exterior views, floor plan drawings and construction data (location, plot size, living space, construction, construction costs, own share). Recommendable collection of ideas for future builders, planners, architects. Particularly positive: the lively described living experiences of the individual family members and the visually appealing design. Extensiveer than the cheaper W. Grassreiner (BA 12/03). Not especially to families B. Rühm (BA 9/04), S. Schneider (BA 3/03bB). (El. Nike).
content.title_en: Family houses : plenty of space on a small footprint

content.text: Systemic-constructivist pedagogy : Introduction to the foundations of an inter-actionist-constructivist pedagogy. In recent years, the systemic-constructivist approach has found an increasing interest and practical dissemination in both school and non-school areas. In this book the approach is developed in a fundamental way and illustrated with examples and numerous illustrations. It is suitable as an introductory textbook as well as as a study book and helps in particular to overcome the gap between psychological and pedagogical topics for practice, because it deals with questions from both areas. This book is addressed both to students beginners as well as to teachers, educators, but also to social scientists and psychologists. From the content: - Constructivism: Free inventing or limiting by structural conditions? - Communication models for educators - Introduction to systematic observation - Role of relations in pedagogy - The importance of the imaginary - Constructive and systematic methods - Didactic basic principles
content.title_en: Systemic-constructivist pedagogy : Introduction to the basics of an interactionist-constructivist pedagogy

content.text: In his prudent argument and many examples of arguments, Erhard Eppler makes clear how important the state is and that we cannot do without it. It becomes apparent that the former Minister of Development also has the south of the earth in mind.
content.title_en: Discontinued State?

content.text: Turbulence and microstructure studies at a hallow sill of a Norwegian Fjord.
