In autumn 2002, intensive turbulence and microstructure studies were carried out in Sognefjord, Norway, with a microstructure and turbulence probe (MST probe) to determine the dissipation rate of turbulent kinetic energy in the vicinity of a subsea surface at the entrance of the fjord.To capture the hydrographic background, high-resolution measurements were carried out in advance with a towed CTD chain and a ship-bound acoustic Doppler current profiler.Compared with the various regimes of oceanic turbulence, the measurements are also consistent with those from other mixing areas with extreme topography (e.g. in the Strait of Gibraltar and at Stonewall Bank off the coast of Oregon). (AU)
content.title_en: Turbulence and microstructure studies at a hallow sill of a Norwegian Fjord

content.text: QUANTAS 04, measurements in the Arkona Basin from 26 January to 13 February 2004. In winter 2004 a research trip was carried out with the multi-purpose boat Helmsand in the Arkona Basin. The research aim was to observe the influx of salt-rich water from the North Sea and the mixing with the surrounding Baltic Sea water. The mutual penetration of water masses of equal density, but different in salt content and temperature, leads to complex sound speed structures in the water layer near the ground. As a result, the sound channel loses the ability to conduct signals over long distances. Travel documentation and data were collected during the research trip in an appropriate file structure on a computer and written on DVD after the trip. Because of the possibility of using this data, this travel report can be limited to main points. (AU)
content.title_en: QUANTAS 04, measurements in the Arkona Basin from 26 January to 13 February 2004

content.text: The new book edition with CD-ROM is now available and costs exactly 10 EURO more. As with the 5th edition (BA 2/01), the book content is a networked HTML structure with special search functions. The CD-ROM does not have to be installed. (1 A,S) (LK/M: Silk) The standard work contains in compact and comprehensive form the entire mathematical knowledge material for study and professional practice (engineers, natural scientists). (LK/M: Silk)
content.title_en: Pocketbook of Mathematics : [with CD-ROM DeskTop Bronstein]

content.text: Paperback for food chemists : Food - supplies - cosmetics - feed ; with 78 tables ; [LFGB-compliant]. The second edition of this now single paperback provides in a concise and clear presentation the basis for the control and evaluation of food, commodities, cosmetics and feed. European and national regulations as well as aspects of quality assurance are sufficiently taken into account. For students and beginners as well as for scientists and practitioners who are working - e.g. as experts or consultants - in this complex area, the paperback is a good introduction and an important source of information. At the same time it is a reference work and provides interested laypersons with valuable information about the explosive, widely-aware area of food chemistry and food control. The new edition has been completely revised and additionally extended to include insights into neighbouring disciplines and neighbouring countries (Austria and Switzerland); the legal regulations correspond to the state of printing.
content.title_en: Paperback for food chemists : Food - supplies - cosmetics - feed ; with 78 tables ; [LFGB-compliant]

content.text: The hydrogen boom: [Wish and reality in the race for climate protection]. Romm thoroughly and differentiated the possibilities and limits offered by the use of hydrogen as an energy source in view of dwindling oil reserves and threatening climate warming. He knows what he is talking about, because the physicist who has been awarded a doctorate served the Clinton government as the responsible for hydrogen and fuel cell research and is active in this field. The regional focus of the ambitious, relatively understandable book lies in the USA, which is involved both as an enormous energy user and a large pollutant producer in the world problems and do far too little against it. It becomes clear how difficult and complicated such a revolution of energy supply is to implement! According to the easier readable H. Boethius: "The Hydrogen Transition" (BA 6/05) and besides the technically oriented Sven Geitmann: "Water & Fuel Cells" (last ID 51/05) as a comprehensive overview is highly recommended.
content.title_en: Hydrogen boom: [Wish and reality in the race for climate protection]

content.text: The main objective of ecological forest conversion in Germany is to replace the forest forest with the forest forest's natural, vulnerable coniferous forests with natural, stable mixed and deciduous forests. The process that has now begun raises many questions: How can genetic diversity be preserved? Close proximity to nature and biodiversity mutually? How do tree species affect the quality of humus? Does forest conversion play a role in water factors? What role does climate-relevant trace gases play? Does natural management ensure economic yield? The book provides sound and detailed answers to these pressing questions for the first time. In the context of the programme "Research for the Environment" the Federal Ministry of Education and Research promoted the focus "Future-oriented forest management" between 1998 and 2004 . The book evaluates the results of the projects from five model regions - cross-referential, understandable, compact. It becomes clear: It will not be possible to implement all expectations of "our forest" at any place and at any time. But it is possible to identify the forest forest's sustainable future with regard to the forest industry.
content.title_en: Ecological forest conversion in Germany : Questions, answers, perspectives

content.text: Final report: Research project SuSi-PLUS: Subjective sense of security in local passenger transport by bus, metro and city railways : Bearb.period: July 2003 - February 2005 ; funded by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research. In the SuSi-PLUS project (subjective sense of safety in local passenger transport by bus, metro and city railways), a group of transport companies from Hamburg, Mannheim and Hanau and a research institute analyzed subjective safety in public transport between July 2003 and February 2005. The aim of the project, funded by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research, was to contribute to a greater level of safety.
content.title_en: Final report: Research project SuSi-PLUS: Subjective safety perception in local passenger transport by bus, metro and city railways : Bearb.period: July 2003 - February 2005 ; funded by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research

content.text: Crisis management in the food industry : Guide for successful food crisis management. The Federal Association of the Food Industry (BVE) and AFC Consultants International, which have jointly launched a crisis hotline, have developed this guide for practice together with practitioners from companies and government representatives. The authors present their knowledge and experience based on case studies. The topic of crisis management is examined by all sides. From the content: *crisis management and crisis bars in case of emergency *food crises in companies from an official perspective *food crisis management from the point of view of trade *crisis management in product blackmail *crisis prevention through electronic traceability *product contamination - insurance protection for food business owners - brand integrity and reproduction management *crisis management: how pre-supplyers can act ad hoc and preventively *The role of analytics in the development, management and preparation (source: publishing house)
content.title_en: Crisis management in the food industry : guide to successful food crisis management

content.text: Cartography and GIS: an introduction. The clearly structured textbook provides an introduction to digital database-based cartography. GIS (Geo Information Systems) allows space-related data to be digitally recorded, edited and displayed. A much used map-making program is the GIS software ArcGIS, which is mainly used in the university area, but is also provided free of charge as a trial version for practice purposes. Using examples and exercises, the program is taught how to handle, process geodata and display them in maps. (3)
content.title_en: Cartography and GIS : an introduction

content.text: Space-related knowledge. Illustrated, entertaining and catchy overview of the most important areas of space travel. Reichl and Koç focus not only on history, scientific foundations and technology but also on topics such as space travel as an economic factor, cost and benefit ratio, private space projects, space tourism and the emerging space nations such as China, Japan and India. A detailed table of contents, summaries of important data and an annex with statistics make the book very clear and also useful for quick facts search. The two authors are or were long-standing employees of the European Aerospace Group EADS and have already published some literature on astronomy and space travel (see Koç: ID 13/05). A recent, successful book on the subject, which is worth its prize - also very suitable for student lectures. Highly recommended before W. Engelhardt (ID 29/01) and besides the subject booklet for the secondary school I (ID 25/05) and the short presentation of G. Siefarth (ID 23/01). (1)
content.title_en: Space knowledge

content.text: Specialists Industrial electronics and information technology : with equipment and system technology. Publisher's text: Basic and technical level contents of information technology and industrial electronics in one volume. Fundamentals of electronics and electrical engineering, their applications, digital technology, measuring, taxes, rules, power electronics. New among others: Notes on implementation in the learning fields, extension of PC measurement technology with LabVIEW, frequency converter, catalogue of terms in English and German. For student-centric learning and teaching in fields of learning. Publisher's text: Basic and technical level contents of information technology and industrial electronics in one volume. Fundamentals of electronics and electrical engineering, their applications, digital technology, measuring, controlling, rules, power electronics. New among others: Notes on implementation in the learning fields, extension of PC measurement technology with LabVIEW, frequency converter, catalogue of terms in English and German. For student-centric learning and teaching in fields of learning.
content.title_en: Specialists Industrial electronics and information technology : with equipment and system technology

content.text: The Institute for Building Research (IFB) in Hanover informs the parties involved in the construction work about science, education, practice and research. Since 1946 it has been laying the foundations for expert opinions, further investigations, developments and inventions. The IFB members are the federal ministries responsible for construction and housing, the top associations of the construction industry, housing and energy industries, universities, cities, housing companies and companies in the economy.
content.title_en: Damage in drywall : detect and avoid

content.text: Table book Metal. Reference book for technical vocational training and professional practice. Finely structured, bicoloured printed, where reference to related terms is made in the table of contents. Contains not only tables, but also basic information and calculation rules, formulas and examples of images. In the appendix a detailed index of keywords. It is oriented towards the current structure of the metal professions and the pedagogical orientation according to learning fields. Is a bit more extensive than "Table book Metal" (BA 11/05), which is intended for the same user group, a little larger in format and more clearly in print. Overall a recommended, current alternative to the above mentioned title. (2 S)
content.title_en: Table book of metal

content.text: Parking: Parking garages and parking ideas in the 21st century. Parking plays a central role in our automobile society, but is currently often neglected in planning. Deported to invisible underground garages or marginalized, it is only an undesirable side effect of maximum individual mobility. However, architects, planners and artists also repeatedly deal with the resting traffic and try to give it a new perspective. The contributions describe both the changing history of parking and the current problem. In addition, successful examples from the practice are presented and thought-provoking for the future of parking is given.
content.title_en: Housepark_Parking : Parking garages and parking ideas in the 21st century

content.text: Surveying and basics of statistics for construction. The broad field of surveying, which includes satellite and physical geodesy, land surveying, geoinformation and cartography, photogrammetry, property and land order as well as cadastral and engineering surveying, must necessarily be limited in this textbook. The selection of content is primarily based on the surveying tasks associated with the creation of buildings of various kinds, such as buildings, dams, roads and bridges, and even machine engineering installations. Before each construction project begins, the task is to measure existing and transfer the planned into the site, which cannot be realized without knowledge of measurement techniques and the necessary equipment and instruments. This also includes the application of GPS technology... Standard work for students and practitioners of the fields of surveying and construction engineering, architecture, geography and further geosciences (included 4., newbearb. edition: ID 10/01 dVerlager).
content.title_en: Surveying and basics of statistics for construction

content.text: Descriptive statistics : an introduction to methods and applications with SPSS; with 48 tables. A textbook for students of economics, which introduces the concepts and methods of descriptive statistics and covers the material of the statistical I lecture at German universities. It is already available in 5th edition (1st edition: ID 16/98). With a short introduction to the handling of the statistics software SPSS. See also "Inductive Statistics" by the author (ISBN 978-3-540-24293-2, 24.95 EUR, not discussed here). (3) (LK/SH: Gülck)
content.title_en: Descriptive statistics : an introduction to methods and applications with SPSS ; with 48 tables

content.text: The use of renewable raw materials as fuel is gaining importance. Grain (corn, straw, whole plant) has a great energy potential, which has been used almost exclusively by Denmark for about 30 years within the EU. The author (specialist in energy technology) shows in this guide the possibilities of straw heating in rural areas in Germany in a concise and understandable way. Introducing he compares the raw material straw with the conventional energy sources natural gas/oil in terms of environmental balance, pollutant diagnosis, economic calculation and draws parallels to the newly discovered fuel wood. In particular, he deals with combustion technology, plant technology, exhaust gas technology and environmentally polluting ingredients as well as permit procedures and possibilities of project funding. Finally, he provides a concrete planning example for a heating plant with grain straw, including differentiated cost calculations. With numerous tables, graphics and internet sources. Reading value for interested farmers and energy technicians. Without comparison title. Unfortunately, high book price. (3) (Elke Nibbrig) The author (specialist in energy technology) shows in the present guide the possibilities of straw heating in Germany in a scarce and understandable way.
content.title_en: The straw heating : Planning - Implementation - Maintenance

content.text: Design and living. Fifth title of the new series of basics for students of architecture and civil engineering (cf. M. Hegger in this No., and N. Kummer; B. Bielefeld; T. Brotrück in BA 2/07). The thin volumes are reminiscent of study scripts. In terms of content they provide a well understandable introduction to the topic. The present volume provides first knowledge of the design of housing houses. The basics of living (life cycles, use areas, spatial formation etc.), connections of individual living areas (sleeping, work, cooking, traffic spaces etc.) and variants of construction forms are dealt with. With numerous drawings, practical tips, standard instructions and literature specifications. In addition to the above target group, the possibility of starting the project is recommended for all those interested in building.
content.title_en: Design and Housing

content.text: The TA Luft is a guide to practice. Technical guidance on air purification (TA Luft) defines a variety of requirements to be observed when approving livestock housing systems. The regulations do not only include requirements for reducing and limiting emissions to odours, ammonia and dust. To protect the environment, certain emission values or minimum distances to protective products such as sensitive plants and ecosystems and the neighbourhood are also to be observed. The present paper is a practical, technical-legal guide by the TA Luft regulations. It serves to facilitate the handling of the TA Luft and to provide assistance for the application of animal husbandry systems. For the solution of possible problems, the design margins of TA Luft are shown and useful background information is given. At the same time, however, it also points to shortcomings and conflict potentials, as not all control applications lead to appropriate solutions. [...] (Source: KTBL)
content.title_en: Handling of TA air in livestock farming facilities: a guide to practice

content.text: The title is also addressed to students who are beginning their studies and who are interested in the topic. The work areas of the architect/builder are presented as the construction manager: basics of the construction management, construction site organisation, scheduling and process planning, quality assurance, costs and billing, acceptance and guarantee, handover to the builder. Practical and understandable presentation with black and white photos, schedules, diagrams, additional tips and hints as well as further literature. The topic is discussed in the textbook of K. Stark: "Construction-operation-bases" (ID 13/07). G. Wheathöfer: "The construction site manual" (BA 2/03) is addressed to the private builder. An ecz film connection is advisable. (3)
content.title_en: Construction management

content.text: Civicity and professionalism: reality and future perspectives of social work. With contributions by Kirsten Aner, Christoph Butterwegge, Thomas Olk, Regina Rätz-Heinisch, Margeritha Zander, Alber Scherr, Franz Josef Krafeld, Titus Simon, Werner Thole, Karin Bock, Wolfgang Schröer, Wolfgang Hinte, Richard Münchmeier and others. - With contributions by Kirsten Aner, Christoph Butterwegge, Thomas Olk, Regina Rätz-Heinisch, Margeritha Zander, Albert Scherr, Franz Josef Krafeld, Titus Simon, Werner Thole, Karin Bock, Wolfgang Schröer, Wolfgang Hinte, Richard Münchmeier and others.
content.title_en: Citizenship and professionalism: reality and future prospects of social work

content.text: Generation Global: a crash course. The Earth has become a single space of experience and the remote has come near. People with different pasts live in a common present, but does it automatically grow into a common future? This title, published by the well-known Munich sociologist (most recently "World Risk Society", BA 6/07), gathers 15 contributions from journalists and international experts from various scientific disciplines (Barbara Ehrenreich, Navid Kermani, Heribert Prantl, André Gorz etc.), which deal with the different dimensions of globalization: mass media, new terrorism, new wars, life in the world risk society, global inequalities, the female side of globalization etc. The volume concludes with a summary contribution describing the new generation Global. Recommended to all libraries that want to offer another interesting title (last D. Cohen BA 1/07, T. Friedman, BA 12/06, J. Sacks, BA 7/07) on a central topic.
content.title_en: Generation Global : a crash course

content.text: Pathologies of Reason : History and Present of Critical Theory. This volume contains contributions that examine the different approaches of Critical Theory to their sustainability and topicality. The idea developed in the title essay serves as a guide to this historical contemplation, that the members of the first generation of the Frankfurt School, in all heterogeneity, agreed to see in the society of the present the expression of a social pathology of reason. How, thus, is the question asked in the contributions, can such a far-reaching thesis be justified, and how can it be theoretically implemented under the changed conditions?
content.title_en: Pathologies of Reason : History and Present of Critical Theory

content.text: Anatomy of Social Sociology. One of the world's leading sociologists, Peter Hedström, traces the foundations of analytical sociology. He argues for an explanatory sociology that combines theory and empiricism.
content.title_en: Anatomy of the Social - Principles of Analytical Sociology

content.text: Methods of empirical communication research : an introduction. Publisher's text: This book is an introduction to the essential methods of empirical communication science. It is aimed in particular at students of communication and media science who collect their first experience with empirical methods and is suitable as a detailed accompaniment of introductory lectures and as a practical hand-out for method exercises. Easy understanding, application orientation and a clear structure are the main characteristics of this textbook. For the fourth edition the volume is updated and a chapter is extended for questioning. Publisher's text: This book is an introduction to the essential methods of empirical communication science. It is particularly addressed to students of communication and media science who collect their first experience with empirical methods and is suitable as a deepening accompaniment to introductory lectures and as a practical hand-out for method exercises. Easy understanding, application orientation and a clear structure are the main characteristics of this textbook.
content.title_en: Methods of empirical communication research : an introduction

content.text: English for architects and civil engineers: a complete project process in English with vocabulary, phrases, exercises and practical advice: all project phases in English with vocabulary, idiomatic expressions, exercises and practical advice. The author is an English native speaker and works as an architect, translator and lecturer for architects, among others. The textbook, intended for self-study or course-accompanying, builds on existing school English and prepares for work as a planner in and with English-speaking countries through technical texts, typical dialogues and business letters. The 12 chapters are oriented to the individual planning and execution phases of a construction project. Each chapter also includes grammar and vocabulary parts and exercises and special skills, e.g. letters, emails, phone calls, application etc. The solutions and 2 separate words end the volume. The target group of this textbook are architects, civil engineers, e.g. translators, pure language interpreters, and languages.
content.title_en: English for architects and civil engineers : a complete project in English with vocabulary, phrases, exercises and practical tips : all project phases in English with vocabulary, idiomatic expressions, exercises and practical advice

content.text: Migration and Integration Research in the Discussion : Biography, language and education as central reference points. The book presents the current state of discussion of migration and integration research. The current controversy is traced and the view is directed towards politics in other countries. Furthermore, the problems and the potential of migration are shown.
content.title_en: Migration and Integration Research in the Discussion : Biography, Language and Education as Central Points of Reference

content.text: Sound technology for media designers : Listening to sounds - Understanding technology - Designing media. Basic but practical textbook on all sub-areas of sound technology for members of the thematically adjacent professions. (Ulrich Wesser) The author deals with all sub-areas of sound technology in this title, which is conceived as a textbook and prepares them for media designers and members of other thematically adjacent professions: sound in physics, in electrical engineering, in human biology, technical tools for transmission, manipulation, recording and reproduction, concrete requirements for a contemporary sound technology. In addition, peripheral areas are also illuminated, such as the organisation of productions. The structure is highly differentiated but quickly comprehensible, the descriptions are very precise, sufficiently detailed and understandable, the explanations are explained sparingly by graphic illustrations. Despite the claim to achieve mathematical or physical prior knowledge, knowledge e.g. of the subject terminology makes easier the understanding. Conclusion: Basic but still practical textbook for transverse users and professionally working in a field of sound technology. (3) (Ulrich Wesser)
content.title_en: Audio technology for media designers : Listening to sounds - Understanding technology - Designing media

content.text: The bloody disintegration of the former Yugoslav multi-ethnic state is a good example of the limits of common models of explanation for internal and intergovernmental conflicts. In the prevention, management and follow-up of this conflict, the international community of states has obviously failed, which ultimately led to a regional permanent crisis that requires a peacekeeping commitment until further notice (KFOR). Against this background, the authors analyse the possibilities of political peace-keeping very differently, taking into account the challenges of a future multipolar world system. Recommendation for expanded political stockpiles. (3)
content.title_en: Conflict settlement and peacekeeping in the international system

content.text: Modular lubrication system for minimum quantity lubrication depending on requirements (SCHMIER) : BMBF-Verbundprojekt (2002-2005) ; Final report. The publication consists of reports on individual areas of responsibility of the project partners: Fraunhofer Institute for Production Technology and Automation, ELBAU Elektronik Bauelemente GmbH, Angaris GmbH, HNP Mikrosysteme GmbH; GMN Paul Müller GmbH Industrie GmbH & Co. KG and Bosch Rexroth AG Linear Motion and Assembly Technologies
content.title_en: Modular lubrication system for a minimum quantity lubrication depending on requirements (SCHMIER) : BMBF-Verbundprojekt (2002-2005) ; Final report

content.text: Urban lighting: Irritations, perspectives, strategies. Since its inception, urban planning has been designed for growth. This growth will no longer exist. Like the Federal Republic of Germany as a whole, cities will increasingly lose population. Empty spaces, building gaps, larger areas will deeply interfere with the existing urban fabric. Cities must indeed be "rebuilt", but how? In the volume, experts from different disciplines will investigate the framework conditions that will shape urban development in the future. Approaches for new structural concepts and planning strategies are presented. Increasing open spaces are of particular importance, not as a "replacement" for buildings, but as a structural element that gives cities a new quality. (http://www.baufachinformation.de/article.jsp?v=224070)
content.title_en: City clearings : irritations, perspectives, strategies

content.text: The Moorish Night : Narration. In this novel-long story Peter Handke takes on the reality of our present ever more oppressive form. Place: the Balkans, the Morawa, an influx of the Danube, a houseboat on the river. Time: one night, from late evening to blue day. Persons: An author, a former, calls his friends, seven in number, on the hotel ship, his enclave, where he has withdrawn a decade earlier. For one night, a boat owner, the former author, tells seven listeners of his round trip through Europe, a round trip, a misguided journey, a death voyage or a "carriage of an amok".
content.title_en: The Moraw Night : Narrative

content.text: The European Union has so far expanded into concentric circles. Integration and enlargement have mutually strengthened each other. This development is currently at borders. Internal borders manifest themselves as problems of political will-building, external borders as an increasing contradiction between integration and enlargement of the EU. The theory of Europe's dynamics is developed from the current enlargement crisis of the EU. This theory forms the framework for discussing key problems of the EU: EU development prospects after the end of its enlargements, the transition to the mode of gradual integration, the question of Turkey's accession, the redesign of the external relations of the EU and the wider sphere of European interest.
content.title_en: The dynamics of Europe

content.text: The master of the network: a collection of tasks for the testing and practice of electrical energy supply. The book includes construction, operation, monitoring, protective measures and disturbances of or in supply networks, topics which must be familiar to a master of the network who supervises these networks. The entire material is implemented here in questions with partly very detailed answers at the end of the chapter and thus serves mainly for the preparation of examination but also as reference work (complementing introductions, textbooks etc.). The first edition (ID 48/96) was already extended in the 2nd of 2004 somewhat, but mainly in the course of the progressive technology and the changing standards, which require continuous training, adapted to the latest state of the art; the literature directory was also updated. In expanded stocks the title should be available and here at least the 1st edition should be exchanged. (3)
content.title_en: The grid master : a collection of tasks for testing and practice of electrical energy supply

content.text: YouTube, Clipfish, MyVideo & Co. : Watch, create, patch up and publish video clips; [this is how it works: How to use YouTube, Clipfish and MyVideo; Video cut for lukewarm: Create and edit your own videos with MovieMaker; Make impressions: Overblown, Effects & Co.; Video portals, Video cut, Tips & Tricks]. Video portals, such as YouTube, are popular. Often practical reasons are crucial for their use and not, as is often assumed, exhibitionist tendencies of video producers: It is easier to load a film to YouTube and distribute the URL via mail, as a teny times a DVD burn. The title first describes passive (search function, rating) and active use (user registration, upload) of the most well-known video communities, such as YouTube, Clipfish and MyVideo, and in part 2 offers numerous tips and tricks, such as saving offered movies or editing, converting and uploading your own videos. The layout of the title is clear and quick to use, the descriptions are sufficiently available to the user. However, there is a lack of technical content.
content.title_en: YouTube, Clipfish, MyVideo & Co. : Watch, create, spice up and publish video clips ; [this is how it works: How to use YouTube, Clipfish and MyVideo ; Video editing for lukewarm: How to create and edit your own videos with MovieMaker ; How to make an impression : Overleash, Effects & Co. ; Video portals, Video editing, Tips & Tricks]

content.text: Photoshop CS3 for dummies: [all about pixels, paths and pallets]. New edition of Peter Bauer's Photoshop introduction to the current version CS3 of the popular image editing software (pre-release: BA 2/06). The structure has remained largely the same compared to the pre-release, and there have been additions to chapters on the extended version and the use of a graphic tablet. The differences to CS2 are not explicitly mentioned. As usual with titles of the Dummies series, the explanations are well understandable (no "special Chinese") and written in a loose style. Explained are the functions that the average user needs most often, the presentation of technical backgrounds is omitted. Target group are beginners with some basic knowledge about digital image processing - but also some advanced ones certainly benefit from the many tips and tricks. A successful entry-level title, still gladly recommended. (2)
content.title_en: Photoshop CS3 for dummies: [all about pixels, paths and pallets]

content.text: The security society: social control in the 21st century. Social control is changing at a high rate. "Online searches" of computers, storage of telecommunications data, video surveillance as well as increasing prison numbers and tightening of juvenile justice are just a few examples of this, which seem to stand together independently in the day-to-day political discussion. In fact, they are an expression of a fundamental change in social control and of the social understanding of security. The book represents this change and interprets it as the formation of a new formation of social control, which works with techniques of self-management, control and exclusion. This development is analysed against the background of the economic, sociocultural and discursive upheavals of the past years, which form the basis for the state and society to understand crime and deviation differently today and react to it differently.
content.title_en: The security society: social control in the 21st century

content.text: Facade openings. Basic series for beginners in architecture and civil engineering, which externally reminds of study scripts and each offers a well-understood introduction to the topic (see last B. Bielefeld, K. Jormakka, H. Klein etc.). The present title deals with the constructive and stylistic design of windows as central openings in the facade design. The various requirements (protection function, air, light permeability, interface with energy-saving planning), construction bases as well as the various components, construction types, materials and the constructive connection to the wall surfaces are measured. Standard series equipped with small-format black and white photos, numerous design drawings, practical tips, hints and further literature. For the target group a recommended addition to the more expensive sample collection of U. Baus: "Openings" (ID 41/06). (3)
content.title_en: Facade openings

content.text: Seven molecules: the chemical elements and life. To say it at the beginning - this book just makes you happy! This starts with the very cleverly chosen title, which makes a potential reader far more curious than, for example, a simple "introduction into biochemistry". The authors, who both call themselves "enthusiastic chemists", have been able to bring both experts and lay people to the chemical processes that take place in an organism in a fascinating way. They use such art names as "WaGluLe TyAtOhRe" for the molecules water, glucose, lecithin, tyrosine, ATP, Oxyhäm and Retinal as well as the verb "SCHÖPFeN", which stands as a reminder for 7 elements sulfur S, carbon C, hydrogen H, oxygen O, phosphorus P, iron Fe and nitrogen N. Illustrated in colour and provided with numerous control questions throughout the course of the course of the course of study. By J.-H. Fuhrhop here last 2 titles on chemistry for medical students (BA 8/89 and for secondary school students).
content.title_en: Seven molecules : the chemical elements and life

content.text: Data analysis with SAS: statistical methods and their graphical aspects. The "Statistical Analysis System" is a program package for statistical investigations developed 30 years ago, which is now running on all the major operating systems for large computers and PC. In this volume, the somewhat extended second edition of the 2004 work (not discussed), the version 8.2 for Windows is used. First, the authors provide a thorough introduction to the structures and operations of the system, placing great emphasis on the graphical possibilities. A streamlined summary of core areas of descriptive and inductive statistics follows as a main part a basic and at the same time practical presentation of manifold procedures and applications using SAS. A reader should be familiar with the general mathematical foundations. Apart from students of higher semesters, especially demanding users of statistical procedures in practice. (3)
content.title_en: Data analysis with SAS : statistical methods and their graphic aspects

content.text: Introduction to electrical measurement technology : Basics, measurement methods, devices; with 12 tables and 54 examples and 15 tasks with solutions. Publisher's text: This textbook provides the basics and procedures of electrical measurement technology together with their practical application. After an introduction to basic terms and a general description of the properties of electrical measuring instruments, the measuring principles and methods for measuring the most important electrical quantities are explained. Application-oriented structured according to the measurement parameters, the specific characteristics, possibilities and areas of application of the current measuring instruments are presented to the described analog and digital methods. The book covers the essential contents of a lecture on the basics of electrical measurement technology as they listen to students of electrical engineering and natural and engineering sciences in basic studies.
content.title_en: Introduction to electrical measurement technology : basics, measuring methods, devices; with 12 tables and 54 examples and 15 tasks with solutions

content.text: The German heat pump is experiencing a renaissance as a economical and carbon dioxide-reducing heating system due to rising energy prices and growing environmental awareness. The author (diploma engineer, specialization in energy technology) deals with the different facets of heat pump heating. In the first book third, the physical-technical and chemical basics are explained in detail. Subsequently, the individual components and different construction methods, planning bases, construction and operation as well as other uses of heat pump systems are explained in detail. Finally, a short comparison with other heating types, a glossary with technical terms, further addresses. Numerous diagrams, calculations, formulas and vivid colored illustrations are presented. Specialist craftsmen, architects, energy consultants, builders and potential builders with technical/natural science basic knowledge are addressed. Recommended after the initial information from M. Baumann (BA 8/07) and the manual by K. Ochsner (BA 9/07), besides the specialist of I. Tiator (ID 4/08) (3).
content.title_en: ABC of the heat pump

content.text: The world is flat: a short story of the 21st century. This book has sold itself far over two million times in the English edition. Why? Friedman, Pulitzer Prize winner and columnist of the New York Times, explains globalization to his unsecured compatriots. And he formulates what they and all other inhabitants of the "first world" can do to survive in an increasingly flat world. The world's best seller in the pocketbook, expanded and updated: Thomas L. Friedman's controversially discussed inventory of the present is at the same time packed reportage and concise introduction to what drives the world from today's innermost. Global value chains and insourcing, RFID and workflow: Friedman describes the backgrounds of the keywords, introduces us to people whose visions determine our future, and leads behind the scenes of the economic world, whether in Bangalore, India, where the Asian boom culminates, or in Bentonville, Arkansas, where the heart of Wal-Mart, the grossly disobeys the company - but not telling about Friedman's changes.
content.title_en: The world is flat : a short history of the 21st century

content.text: Anatolin : Roman. No list of physical and mental disorders knows this disease, no doctor ever diagnosed it, and yet some suffer from it: "Morbus biographicus", in English: "autobiographical emptying". The symptom: lack of memory of one's own childhood. In the end, the loss of every biographical feeling. As therapy only remains, the lack of autobiographical thread tells new story to spin. No list of physical and mental disorders knows this disease, no doctor has ever diagnosed it, and yet some suffers from it: "Morbus biographicus", in German: "autobiographical emptying". The symptom: lack of memory of one's own childhood. In the end, the loss of every biographical feeling. As therapy, only remains, the lack of autobiographical thread to spin new
content.title_en: Anatolin : Roman

content.text: iPod and iTunes for Dummies: [technics brought to the i point; for Mac and Windows users; import music, send pictures, play videos; the iPod as organizer]. The American original has been available for over 4 years (now in 5th edition), now the "Dummies" guide to the classic MP3 player and its software appears with us. The authors, experienced in terms of PC, multimedia and desktop publishing (to the latter ID 47/87), have gathered all the knowledge worth knowing about the topic. After a general introduction are in 4 parts - "create and procure media content", " manage media content", "play iPod", "advanced" - many practical informations offered, to which there is also the obligatory final chapter with further tips, troubleshooting and solutions to 10 problems. The construction scheme is well known, there are many subsections, supplemented by good illustrations and by pictograms. In all the expertise: the sound is easy to understand and the numerous step-by-step instructions to BAiod well understandable, "Babby's 5th of the B.
content.title_en: iPod and iTunes for Dummies : [technique brought to the i point ; for Mac and Windows users ; import music, send pictures, play videos ; the iPod as organizer]

content.text: Strategies of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS) and the Federal Office for Building and Regional Planning (BBR) for the management of demographic change: a project of the research programme "General Research for the Department" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS) and the Federal Office for Building and Regional Planning (BBR). [...] As a result, the effects of demographic change in most federal states play a special role in the establishment, continuation or reorientation of spatial planning plans. The intensity of the examination of demographic change and the orientation of the strategies and instruments of the regional planning on the consequences reflect the pressure of action in the Länder. The Länder Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Brandenburg, Saxony-Anhalt, Thuringia, Saxony and Saarland as well as in sub-regions Rhineland-Palatinate and Lower Saxony have re-established their regional development plans/programmes or are in the process of doing so, all with the explicit aim of responding to the consequences of demographic change in the form of population decline and ageing.[...] (Source: BBR)
content.title_en: Strategies of regional and regional planning to cope with demographic change: a project of the research programme "General Research for the Department" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS) and the Federal Office for Building and Spatial Planning (BBR)

content.text: Continuing education and lifelong learning in universities: an international comparative study on structures, organisation and supply forms. Given the overall social situation and the current demographic changes, continuous learning in the curriculum is becoming increasingly important. But how do universities position themselves in this environment? Are they acting as "important player" or are they currently showing more modest commitment? The given necessity of lifelong learning opens up interesting options for developing scientific further education in this context. These, however, also represent major political, structural and organisational challenges that the universities accept differently. The study presented here analyses the "structure and organisation of continuing education by universities" in an international comparison. In addition to Germany as a reference country, the current situation of continuing education and training at the system, organisational and supply levels in Finland, France, Great Britain, Austria and the United States of America were analysed. In addition, a study was linked to the study involving the non-high-school actors, such as companies and research institutions, who are also engaged in highly qualified further education. Beyond the consideration of the respective framework conditions of the countries considered, an understanding of the organisational context of continuing education and training was created over the context of knowledge.
content.title_en: Continuing education and lifelong learning in higher education : an international comparative study on structures, organisation and supply

content.text: Digital technology - a practical introduction. Digital technology is omnipresent today. It combines many disciplines: physics, mathematics, electrical engineering, computer science, etc. This book brings both the necessary theory and the consistent reference to practice. Each chapter contains numerous tasks (unfortunately without solutions) and detailed literature references. On the Internet you will find further exercises, examples, animations and slides for lecturers. Mentionable is also an important, otherwise not often treated aspect, namely verification. The lecture material mainly serves Bachelor students as an introduction, especially beginners because of its tailored applications. Now it is not the 1st textbook; here only the more recent ones: H.G. Fehn (ID 34/07), K. Beuth (BA 3/07), H.M. Lipp (ID 51/06), K. Fricke ID 32/00; new edition: 2005), K. Urbanski (ID 3/04). Recommended if too little of these is in existence. (3)
content.title_en: Digital technology - a practical introduction

content.text: The use of environmental heat is becoming more important. For the author (energy consultant/regenerative energies) heat pumps, together with thermal solar systems, wood heating and ventilation systems, offer the optimal combination for the use of indigenous energy sources. If the heat pump is operated with "eco-electricity", the CO-2 emission is reduced to a minimum. Based on energy policy considerations, the technology of heat pumps, the planning of a heat pump system as well as the installation and commissioning with practical examples is clearly structured here. With numerous, vivid colored illustrations, photos and graphics, economic considerations, cost comparison of heating systems according to VDI, norms and regulations, glossary, manufacturer's list and examples of applications, offers. Target group are specialist craftsmen, energy consultants, architects. High book price. According to Michael Baumann (BA 8/07), besides K. Ochsner (BA 9/07), before I. Tiator (ID 4/08) and W. Waldschmidt (ID 14/08).
content.title_en: Practice heat pump : technology, planning, installation

content.text: PHP and MySQL : Practice book for kids : [with CD; on CD: XAMPP with PHP 5 and MySQL 5, SELFPHP, four editors, six CMS (including Joomla) and many practical examples; from 11 years on, but also for adults looking for a really simple introduction]. The edition of an introductory text for the design and programming of web pages by the same author ("PHP and MySQL for Kids", BA 2/08) published less than a year ago, however, follows with this slightly extended reissue (see BA 2/06) the appropriate sophisticated addition. Despite the easy way of presenting the contents of the introductory volume, a reader must be familiar with the content of the introductory volume if he really wants to use the range of versatile routines, edition options, programming languages and examples for the design of an impressive interactive homepage. The CD included here again contains many examples and software components. Recommendable to computer users with prior knowledge from 14, not only "Kids". However, a purchase is unnecessary where the first edition is available.
content.title_en: PHP and MySQL : Practice book for kids : [with CD ; on CD : XAMPP with PHP 5 and MySQL 5, SELFPHP, four editors, six CMS (including Joomla) and many practical examples ; from 11 years on, but also for adults looking for a really simple introduction]

content.text: Manual Colour Composition Web Colors: [the right color combination for every design; practical help for every web designer and computer user who handles color; a wealth of color combinations with RGB values for every design; dotted with many background information and color boards]. In this manual you get the necessary tools to combine web colors in a meaningful and harmonious way. Helen Weber reveals a lot of background knowledge about RGB color space. She combines colors with contrast and color circle and at the same time delivers the corresponding RGB values. This practical approach is supported by tips on color creation, so that you only have to grasp the inspiration for this book. In this manual you get the necessary tools to combine web colors in a meaningful and harmonious way. Helen Weber reveals a lot of background knowledge about RGB color space. She combines colors with contrast and color circle and at the same time delivers the associated RGB values. This practical approach is supported by tips on color identification, so that you only need to get inspiration from this book.
content.title_en: Manual Colour Composition Web Colors : [the right color combination for any design ; practical help for any web designer and computer user who handles color ; a wealth of color combinations with RGB values for each design ; peppered with lots of background information and color boards]

content.text: The well-known author and long-time EADS employee (most recently "Racket Type Book", BA 6/08) has been dedicated to space travel since 1960 in the present book of manned space travel. The author is limited to space vehicles and the corresponding programs, space stations are not treated. The small and compact booklet appears in the series "Typenkompass" and provides short and concise information with many illustrations and data tables. Also planned projects such as the Orion program (should replace the Space Shuttle from 2015) or the Altair mond ferry are presented. Conclusion: a compact, informative and inexpensive volume, very suitable as a current addition to more comprehensive, older space titles. (2) (LK/MZ: Steiner) Rez.: The well-known expert author and long-standing EADS employee (lastly "Kracket Type Book", BA 6/08) is devoted to the present book of manned space travel since 1960. The author is limited in content to space vehicles and the corresponding programs are not treated as compact and compact as a reference number.
content.title_en: Manned spacecraft : since 1960

content.text: The urban code of China. Folding text: When reading Chinese cities as this volume performs, it is not primarily about Beijing, Shanghai, Xi, Shenzhen and other well-known addresses," but rather about the Chinese city around those characteristics that all Chinese cities have more or less, around their core, about their syntax, in short: their code. Only the decoding of this common opens the view of their internal structure and makes us weigh and meaningfully arrange the diversity of empirical impressions. Such a city reading provides the building blocks of the Chinese city code: the dualism of open and closed space, which emphatically determines the basic structure of the Chinese city; the clear preference for private or community-related vis-à-vis public and social space; and the natural practice of interpreting and designing housing settlements as exclusive, closed spaces and much more. With this code, the author can then read new city foundations planned by European architects in China." The urban code of China also helps the reader to see the booming development of China.
content.title_en: The urban code of China

content.text: Young Architects - the avant-garde. The young international architectural scene has a lot of potential – the ideas are unconventional but feasible. This Callwey book presents over 100 offices that inspire with their spectacular buildings and visions. The approaches and design methods of the new avant-garde are impressively documented by means of numerous pictures and plans. A book for anyone who wants to know who the stars of tomorrow are today.
content.title_en: Young Architects - the avant-garde

content.text: I am taking an eyelash and trying to kill myself with it. Travel to become homeless," writes Henri Michaux. During the writing of his novels about his native Carinthia, Austrian Josef Winkler travelled to Italy, later to India and then to Mexico, in his luggage the stories of other authors, from which he uses short quotations as intarsias in his poetic reports: from travels that take him home to his own surprise with variations of a childhood picture - a child already covered with packing paper - and who is already overrun by the road. Last but not least in Klagenfurt, where a child is run over and dies during street work to prepare for the 2008 European Football Championship.
content.title_en: I'll take an eyelash and kill you with it

content.text: Mathematics for natural scientists: methods, applications, program codes. Compact math book for students of the natural sciences, except physics, which requires a more sophisticated mathematical instrument. Examples of scientific applications guarantee the reference to practice. The exercises are also partly oriented towards the application-oriented testing of the learned - occasionally with a pinch of entertainment mathematics, for example if the torchance of a middle-strucker is to be calculated (solutions are available on a website of the University of Munich). For numerous computational examples, program codes for the computer algebra system Maple or the free statistical program R (see A. Behr: "Introduction to statistics with R", ID 31/05). The title-like book by W. Pavel (BA 9/07) deals with analysis and linear algebra in more detail, saves probability calculation and statistics, to which the present title each devotes a chapter.
content.title_en: Mathematics for Natural Scientists : Methods, Applications, Program Codes

content.text: Biologists in industry: what does they expect? ; a virtual internship. Starting from the somewhat unpleasant situation that bachelor's courses offer little room for real but important internships for a later career entry, the authors have developed a concept that places virtual industrial internships with some real contacts to companies and real laboratory hours in their place. Additional work materials and tasks are provided by the authors. - At university locations with appropriate training directions. For orientation, perhaps already for high school students with relevant study requirements. Starting from the somewhat unpleasant situation that bachelor's courses offer little room for real but important internships for a later career entry, the authors have developed a concept that virtual industrial internships with partly real contacts to companies and real laboratory hours are placed in their place. Additional work materials and tasks are provided by the authors. - At university locations with appropriate training directions. For orientation, perhaps already for high school students with relevant study requirements.
content.title_en: Biologists in industry: what does it expect? ; a virtual internship

content.text: Results of the German Mobile Telecommunication Research Programme (DMF) : Assessment of the health risks of mobile communications - Health risk assessment of mobile communications. The six-year research programme was supervised by the Federal Office for Radiation Protection (BfS). The BfS and the Radiation Protection Commission (SSK) agreed that the research programme did not provide any evidence that would call into question the current limits from a scientific point of view. Nor could the indications of potential risks below the current limit values be confirmed. A causal link between electromagnetic fields below the current limit values and non-specific health problems such as headaches, sleep disorders ("electrosensibility") could be detected.
content.title_en: Results of the German Mobile Telecommunication Research Programme (DMF) : Assessment of the health risks of mobile communications - Health risk assessment of mobile communications

content.text: Object-oriented programming with Python 3 : entry, practice, professional application; [classes, objects and inheritance are practically applied; databases, graphical user interfaces and Internet programming; exercises with sample solutions for each chapter]. The freely usable object-oriented language Python is no longer backward compatible with previous versions from version 3 (currently treated 3.1) and also has several innovations. Therefore, the pre-release to version 2.4 (BA 7/05) displayed here had to be completely revised and updated. Thus and by the inclusion of two new chapters (to XML and special data structures) the scope has grown by 130 pages. The focus is on practical work with Python, less on concepts of object-oriented programming. Beginners with low previous knowledge are addressed. Numerous exercises, sample solutions and source code examples on the useful supplement CD-ROM increase the use value. A more concise introduction to Python 3 offers T. Theis (BA 7/09), similar to the scope and level is J. Ernesti (BA 11/09). The preliminary version should soon run out of 2 Python.
content.title_en: Object-oriented programming with Python 3 : entry, practice, professional application ; [classes, objects and inheritance applied practically ; databases, graphical user interfaces and Internet programming ; exercises with sample solutions for each chapter]

content.text: The main areas of cooperation in shrinking regions are: practical experience study; a project of the research programme "Building East" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS) and the Federal Office for Building and Regional Planning (BBR). The practical experience study "Cooperation of Central Places in Shrinking Regions" examines the extent to which functional divisions in the central-local system (city alliances) and other forms of cooperation are suitable for contributing to the safeguarding of general interest in shrinking regions. The publication is aimed at municipalities as well as regional planners as compact guidelines for action. The comparative study of ten case studies from the new countries, which, because of their early concern, take a pioneering role in the effects of demographic change, can be used as a basis for targeted recommendations for the successful implementation of central-local cities in various cooperation phases. The results of the study indicate the fields in which a centre cooperation is meaningful, which factors are decisive for successful implementation of the cooperation and which obstacles are ensured. Cities provide an important basis for the implementation of the existing planning of the MBR.
content.title_en: Cooperation of central locations in shrinking regions : practical experience study ; a project of the research programme "Building East" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS) and the Federal Office for Building and Spatial Planning (BBR)

content.text: In the "site debate" Germany is often attributed to a general lack of innovation. In the discussion about the game of capitalism, the view is expressed that "liberal market economies" like the USA favored rather radical innovations than "coordinated market economies" like Germany. A more detailed analysis of sectoral innovation processes in the pharmaceutical industry, the telecommunications industry and the automotive industry shows, however, that reality is more complicated: the juxtaposition of "radical" and "incremental" innovations is just as problematic as their identification with certain industries and institutional systems. National innovation systems are not closed units, but are interdependent in their strengths and weaknesses. State regulation plays a central role everywhere for innovation processes, albeit in different ways. A historical analysis is indispensable to understand changes in innovation conditions. In the German pharmaceutical industry and telecommunications industry, however, there is a relative decline, which has very different reasons, which cannot be subsumed under a simple explanatory scheme. The social debate on innovation promotion is still largely dominated by ecological and the issue of innovation promotion.
content.title_en: Sectoral innovation processes and the discussion on German innovation weaknesses

content.text: Basic course in function theory : an introduction to complex analysis and its applications; [for Bachelor and Diploma]. Hardly any of the standard lectures at German-speaking universities has remained as unchanged in the core for many years as the complex analysis, which was made clear again by the recent reissue of an almost 100 year old lecture note (H. Weyl: "Introduction to function theory", ID 50/08). Of course, the beginnings are now more thoroughly founded, even new fields of application have been added. Thus, this volume is characterized by its subtle treatment of algebraic and topological foundations as well as by the many cross references shown at the end of each section. However, the study of holomorphic and meromorphic functions remains central with the instrumentarium based on the Cauchy integral set. A substantial final chapter deals with the geometric environment of Riemann's illustration set. Many tasks without solutions are inserted.
content.title_en: Basic course Function Theory : an introduction to complex analysis and its applications ; [for Bachelor and Diploma]

content.text: Libraries in the Web 2.0 age: Challenges, perspectives and visions. The idea of Web 2.0, which is shaped by the Anglo-American space, has quickly entered the world of libraries and information institutions under the slogan Library 2.0. Among these new services and web applications of the library such as blogs, podcasts, web feeds and wikis subsumes. In Germany, the term Library 2.0 is a defining feature of this new dimension of library offerings. The work presents the technical background, working methods of individual applications and shows ways to integrate them into the work of libraries. In addition, innovative designs for the future design of library services using tenicing of Web 2.0 are presented.
content.title_en: Libraries in the Web 2.0 Age : Challenges, Perspectives and Visions

content.text: Scientific investigation and evaluation of the indicator "Ecological Footprint" : Research report 363 01 135. The indicator Ecological Footprint is one of the most successful indicators worldwide to convey the concept of ecological sustainability and physical limitation of planet Earth. The footprint has been established in the last 10 years as one of the most important measures for the consumption of resources of production and consumption activities at international level and is applied by a variety of institutions to evaluate the environmental impact of human activities. Users include companies as well as urban and regional planning institutions and environmental and development organisations on all continents. Examples of the application as an indicator at national level are, however, only isolated.[...] (Source: Verlag)
content.title_en: Scientific investigation and evaluation of the indicator "Ecological Footprint" : Research report 363 01 135

content.text: My numbers, my friends : highlights of the theory of numbers. The author, who is well known in professional circles, offers here in 10 separate sections a further and very personal insight into his special field, the theory of numbers, according to Gauss the "king discipline" of mathematics (see also P. Ribenboim: "The world of prime numbers", BA 2/07). Of course, again prime numbers with new calculation records play an important role, but also other number types, square forms and other structures. Very often the text leads to deeper connections and also open questions, which then speak without proof but nevertheless historically become arranged and clearly clear. A detailed list of literature at the end of each chapter leads anyone who wants to know more precisely and more in detail. One can also be infected by the sham and enthusiasm of the author, if one cannot penetrate into every branch.
content.title_en: My Numbers, My Friends : Highlights of Number Theory

content.text: No new human image: the language of brain research. The current debate about brain research and its consequences for our human image, for legislation, jurisprudence, educational styles and understanding of history takes place in a little reflected language. From neurophysiological terms to popular philosophical speech about cognition, freedom of will and self-consciousness, from the scientific theoretical discussion to experience, experiment, evidence and refutation to world-view invocations of values, the range of linguistic means ranges. Polemic sharpness and conceptual superficiality are the complementary features of a talk about each other and a talk about each other, which can be met philosophically with linguistic criticism. Although the questions discussed are certainly not pure language problems, they cannot be clarified without clarifying the linguistic conditions. This applies not only to the public discourses about so-called body-spirit- or body-soul problems, but also to the demands and results of the specialist, in particular of neuroscience. They affect our traditional understanding of science in a way that is in need of clarification, as well as to our traditional understanding of human beings.
content.title_en: No new human image : on the language of brain research

content.text: The fact that we are able to use the word "into the world of human beings" is a fact that we are able to use the word "into the world of human beings" as a means of understanding and understanding, and that we are able to use it as a means of understanding and understanding the meaning of the human beings. We are able to use it as a means of understanding and understanding the meaning of the other side as quickly as possible, so that we can turn to the very perspective of our own. For Karl Eibl, human culture is not in contrast to the biological equipment, but rather to understand it as a product of biological evolution. Only the objectivity function of human language enables us to refer to non-existent things: the past, future, absent or even merely invented. It also allows us to design coherent worlds: intermediate worlds. Cultures as intermediate worlds are relatively autonomous, huge relays, in which the multifar-changing environment of man is frequently set on his old, in millions of years, evolved nervous systems. The book lays down the most important biological conditions and cultural in which the biological conditions are highly and in which the human arts is able to take up.
content.title_en: Culture as an intermediate world : an evolutionary perspective

content.text: The EBB (E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E
content.title_en: Reduce energy costs for buildings : [legal and technical know-how for builders, landlords and administrators ; step-by-step guide on the use of renewable energy sources ; on CD-ROM: Excel tool maintenance planner, sample letters, energy checks, glossary, laws ; current: new energy saving laws - EEHeizG, EEG, EnEV]

content.text: Bugatti : cars and racing cars since 1910. Provides an overview of cars and racing cars of the renowned company from 1909. Large chronologically arranged by types, with systematic short descriptions, data tables, black-and-white and colour photos. Price-effective compilation for a wide circle of lovers. Can be used before "Bugatti" (ID 28/91), "Bugatti" (ID 3/92, both not quite current) and before J. Kurz (ID 21/05), which more illuminates the company and family history. (2)
content.title_en: Bugatti : Cars and racing cars since 1910

content.text: Indignation : Roman. He is young, decent and diligent, he revolts once and pays for it with his life. Marcus Messner begins his studies at the conservative college of Winesburg in Ohio in 1951. During the Korean war into the second year, Marcus experiences a story about inexperience, about resistance, sex, courage and error. Hardly is he in college, it comes to a first, completely disturbing experience with a fragile young girl, and he encounters a form of discrimination that indignations him. Marcus becomes a rebel against his fellow students, but also against his father - and he remains stubborn until the bitter end.
content.title_en: Indignation : Roman

content.text: The preface promises to be astonished?! : Mathematical proofs of incredible ideas. "A mixture of surprising things with witty solutions". Of course, even a naive observer hardly surprises that a double cone can roll upwards on a wider pair of rails, if its mass focus moves downwards, rather than how the exact conditions can be specified by means of simple trigonometric functions. Other problems presented in 14 sections really lead to unexpected results, if methods from probability theory, geometry, analysis or combinatorics lead to a solution. In this case, cross references and often also mathematical historical classifications become clear again and again. Less the questions than the solutions and methods make the appeal of the text. The required mathematics remains with few exceptions in the school area, so the volume can also be offered to interested students. (3 S)
content.title_en: Amazing?! : Mathematical proofs of incredible ideas

content.text: Natural disasters: Cyclones, quakes, volcanic eruptions - unleashed violence and its consequences. In the same appealing presentation as "Weather, Climate, Climate Change" (BA 3/09) ZDF science editor K. Schwanke presents natural disasters. The results are treated earthquakes, volcanoes, tsunamis, landslides, avalanches, various storms, storm floods and floods. In addition, the reports are extensively discussed on climate change as well as droughts, heat waves and forest fires. The final results are natural disasters in Germany and countermeasures. The vivid and well-understood texts are supported by impressive photos and informative maps and graphics and supplemented by expert interviews and case studies. The reasons and backgrounds are examined and the processes and their effects are explained in a general way and countermeasures and early warning systems are shown at the current level. With detailed glossary and register. Compared to the first edition (not shown here), the first edition (not shown here) is mainly extended to cover climate change and global impacts, the data material should be updated. The first edition should be replaced. On this topic, the best title at present (1 S)
content.title_en: Natural disasters: cyclones, quakes, volcanic eruptions - unleashed violence and its consequences

content.text: Theoretical Informatics: 22 tables and 78 tasks. The author is known for a book on the basics of technical Informatics (BA 10/07). In this book he deals with theoretical Informatics, the oldest branch of Informatics, the conceptual foundation on which all other branches of Informatics are based. The book explains very clearly the basics and conveys the knowledge necessary for the Bachelor's degree in Informatics at universities and universities of applied sciences. The presentation is practical; various methods and procedures are introduced by means of examples. Many exercises (with solutions on the Internet - there also numerous links to further information). The focus is on statements logic, formal languages, finite automats and the theory of calculability and complexity. Very helpful almost 30 pages glossary with extensive comments on the individual terms. Detailed bibliography. In addition to the present work R. Hollas (ID 29/07) is recommended (more on theoretical foundations and theory of proof). (2)
content.title_en: Theoretical computer science: with 22 tables and 78 tasks

content.text: The Numerati: Data sharks and their secret machinations. What sounds like a Dan-Brown title is a report about the work of data collectors, mostly mathematicians, who use sophisticated algorithms to evaluate the traces we leave on the Internet when surfing. Of course, it is frightening how exactly today profiles of our behavior can be created, whereby the use for product advertising seems even more harmless. Now the illusion of the Internet as a place of freedom has long since vanished and so it is not surprising that all social actors want to use it for their purposes. As is customary in the popular US-American material literature, from chapters to chapters new experts are presented to us, which is something fatigued in the long run and not really illuminating. The book will find readers already due to the tearful title. Comparable to the somewhat older title "The Surveillance Mafia" by Pär Ström. (BA 6/05). (2)
content.title_en: The Numerati : Data sharks and their secret machinations

content.text: Mathematical Logic. Publisher's text: This book provides an introduction to the various aspects of mathematical logic that every mathematician and computer scientist should know. After the predicate calculus and its applications to the beginnings of artificial intelligence, the set theory is axiomatically presented. In the third and fourth part, the necessary basic concepts of calculability theory and the hierarchy of subsets definable in natural numbers are introduced, in order to finally prove the Gödelian incompatibility sets. Through its clear style and the inserted exercises, this book is a concissive introduction to these basics of mathematics.
content.title_en: Mathematical logic

content.text: Logical basics of mathematics. The book conveys logical basic knowledge, fundamental principles of proof, methods and insights that every mathematician should possess. The following questions are examined: What is finite different from infinite quantities? How can all the rational and real numbers from natural numbers and the latter from pure quantities be constructed? What basic set-theoretical constructions are needed for this and even in mathematics? What are the basic topological properties of the set of real numbers? What is the continuum hypothesis? What is the selection axiom required for? Can the natural or real numbers be fully axiomatically described? Non-standard numbers are constructed with the help of the ultrapotency method. In addition, an easily accessible proof of the First Gödelian Incompleteness Set is provided. Written for: Students of Mathematics. (3)
content.title_en: Logical Basics of Mathematics

content.text: Renewable energy: Application possibilities - technologies - economy; with 56 tables. Given the dwindling resources it is urgently necessary to save energy costs and reduce the emission of pollutants in new buildings and renovations. This can be done by using renewable energies such as photovoltaics, solar thermals, heat pumps or by using conventional energy forms more efficiently and by improving insulation. This requires accurate analysis to ensure the cost-effectiveness of the investment. The professor for building management deals with the basics, advantages and disadvantages of individual plant forms as well as the legal situation and provides exemplary cost calculations. The technical book convinces by systematics, argumentative precision and a successful interaction of text and illustrations. It is highly recommended for professional users from architect to energy consultant, but is also suitable for home owners (for example Jürgen Brück: "New Energy Concepts" (BA 6/08) or Bo Hanus: "House Supply" (BA 6/07). High price, which is acceptable in view of the good equipment and comprehensive information. (2)
content.title_en: Renewable energy : potential applications - technologies - economic efficiency ; with 56 tables

content.text: The author not only highlights the dangers of economic espionage from foreign intelligence agencies, but also the risk of information loss by his own employees. The wide range of threats from product piracy to organized crime to the risks of new markets is illustrated by the reader. The guide provides detailed information on the necessary protective measures. The daily traps for computer, TK data storage and protocols, for WLAN as well as the manipulation of TK systems are described in detail. Using numerous examples, the author illustrates that information protection requires a interlinking of all areas: IT/TK, personnel, processes, object security and security coordination, practical tips and definitions as well as checklists for successful security and crisis management complete the work. (Source: Text Verlagseinband / Verlag)
content.title_en: Industrial espionage: the great attack on the middle class

content.text: The life of wishes: Roman. What happens when a person suddenly has 3 wishes open as in a fairy tale? Jonas happens quite by chance during a mysterious meeting in the lunch break on a bench in the park. He lives his usual life as a copywriter and family father with side jumps, but gradually strange coincidences accumulate. The novel increases from the description of everyday realism increasingly into the surrealist to an imaginary - or imagined - world end. You are removed from novels like "The other side" by Alfred Kubin, as far as the end is concerned of American disaster films. Glavinic (lastly "That's me", BA10/07) proves to be an author, who, as was read in the Neue Zürcher Zeitung, leads the reader "into the fantastic depths of the everyday world".
content.title_en: The Life of Wishes : Roman

content.text: Green houses: single-family houses; sustainable, ecological, energy efficient. Large-format sample collection with 30 current single-family houses in D, AU and CH on the topic of "ecological and architecturally sophisticated construction".
