The architects considered the most diverse criteria of sustainability during planning and construction: energy demand, area consumption, resource consumption of building materials, waste generation, use of renewable energies, functionality, spatial quality, adaptability of the building, etc. Short introduction to the holistic approach to construction as well as explanation of the most important concepts and concepts. The individual houses are presented on 4-6 pages with text, interior and exterior photos, floor plans, scarce building data and a sustainability assessment. The exhibition shows mainly detached houses, but also cultivation or building gaps filling city houses. As an idea collection for architects, students, builders recommended according to "eco-houses for energy savers" (BA 2/09), "EinSparHaus" (BA 10/09), B. Kolb: "Susssreiches Bauen in der Praxis" (BA 12/04), "Eingeblich benutztige -usen die...
content.title_en: Green houses : Single family houses ; sustainable, ecological, energy efficient

content.text: The most recent curricula and national education standards in mathematics have led to substantial changes in the teaching of break-calculation. In this greatly revised re-editing, we prepare for this in depth by, among other things, the latest curricula and the national education standards in mathematics have led to substantial changes in the teaching of break-calculation. In this greatly revised re-editing, we prepare for this thoroughly by:
content.title_en: Didactics of the break-up calculation : [for teacher training and teacher training]

content.text: Exam Trainer Computer Science : 500 questions and answers for the Bachelor's degree programme. Exam Trainer of the Spectrum Publisher have been discussed many times (e.g. R. Busam: ID 14/08 - Analysis; C. Turtur: ID 8/08 and ID 23/03 - Mathematics). In this book students of Computer Science at universities and universities are addressed, who want to prepare themselves for the Bachelor's examination. Provided basic knowledge is provided (acquired during the course of studies). Facts, which are important for the examination after experience are elaborated. In the foreground are questions about applications, but also the basic understanding of important concepts is not too short. The facts are taught in the question-answer style. The very detailed answers often bring short examples and hints on further literature. The book is divided into 3 large sections: theoretical Computer Science, practical Computer Science and Technical Informatics. The focus is on formal languages and the automat theory, algorithms and switching circuits/circuits. Recommended especially for libraries at university locations.
content.title_en: Exam Trainer Computer Science : 500 questions and answers for the Bachelor's degree programme

metadata.authors: Moritz, Thorsten; Steffens, Hans-Jürgen; Steffens, Petra

content.text: Technical freehand drawing : Teaching and exercise book. Practically oriented teaching and exercise book for sketching technical tasks for a wide range of specialists. Well structured course with numerous tasks suitable for self-study (solutions in annex). Was updated compared to the 5th edition 2004 (BA 3/05) in the section "Handcrafted Basics" and structure and scope of the book remained approximately the same. The 5th edition can be used up, the updated new edition should be purchased as additional as possible. (2)
content.title_en: Technical freehand drawing : Teaching and exercise book

content.text: The fixation code: what we need to know about the Internet if we want to survive. Our computer is our travel agency, our bank, our shopping consultant, our leisure designer, our stereo system and our TV. We play, email, blog, tweet, and above all we google what the stuff holds. The machines we use become more and more beautiful and more and more part of our own. Without a doubt we are extremely fixed on the digital cosmos behind our devices only unfortunately often equipped with a very fragmentary knowledge. Who overlooks all the services that Google uses to get our data and secret wishes? Who has more than a vague idea of the dependencies that can be found in it? Ibrahim Evsan explains for everyone what lies behind all the terms, some of which are only familiar with hearing stories, how to protect oneself (and his children!) from the dangers of how to maintain his reputation on the net, what huge changes we have yet to expect from his vastness and how we can survive as an economy in the digital future.
content.title_en: The fixation code: what we need to know about the Internet if we want to survive

content.text: Postwar modernism in Germany: Thinking on an epoch. Architecture and urban planning of post-war modernism are increasingly understood as the cultural heritage of a young past. The quality of individual buildings and plans from the decades after 1945 are highly controversial. At the same time, their importance as a building monument is a central topic. In local and supra-regional debates, planning strategies and new guidelines for an adequate, contemporary approach to the urban areas of post-war modernism are discussed. - - In the book Jürgen Tietz, Christian Welzbacher and other selected actors from architecture, society and politics highlight the central facts, aspects and positions and convey the background of the discussion. Numerous illustrations and plans illustrate and document the topic, among others in the case study Hannover
content.title_en: Postwar Modernism in Germany: Thinking on an Epoch

content.text: Manual for food chemists: Food - Supplies - Cosmetics - Feed. About this book: Since 1991 this work has proven itself in the practice of food chemists and other professions concerned with food safety. The new, third edition contains a separate chapter on biotoxins and manufacturing-related contaminants. Cereals, bread and fine bakery products are now treated in a common chapter. The experienced authors have updated the chapters with regard to numerous new food legislation and scientific findings. In this uniquely comprehensive work both food chemists and other experts from the food sciences, food technology, microbiology, pharmacy and human and animal medicine find reliable information for professional practice: legal basis for food and feed and for food commodities in the EU and insights into food control in the German-speaking countries - dealing with all commodity or product groups according to a uniform structure (group of commodities, assessment bases, product science, quality assurance, literature) - Practical information on topics such as Novel Food, Functional Food, Food Supplements and Nanomaterials. Written for pharmacy, food chemists, food chemists and nanomaterials.
content.title_en: Manual for Food Chemicals : Food - Supplies - Cosmetics - Feed

content.text: The passionate programmer : how programmers successfully shape their career. Readers who like to write programs may be inclined to make a profession out of their hobby. What should be considered? The author works well to establish that a profession should not only create the foundations for a secure life. A profession should also bring fulfilment and happiness, the feeling of being a valuable and respected person. Fulfilment and happiness rarely occur by chance. The author describes - sometimes from a typical American point of view - strategies to plan and realize a truly successful career (and thus also a successful life) in software development. Very clearly again and again: only more intensive, not focused on close goals, personal use helps. Focuses are among others on the skillful self-marketing and the striving to stay at the height of time. Good hints on the implementation of the developed strategies. Many short but well-noticeable guiding principles as milestones for the successful path. A book that can also be very helpful in planning a professional career in general.(2)
content.title_en: The passionate programmer: how programmers successfully shape their career

content.text: Mathematics to take away : Summaries and overviews from Arens et al., Mathematics. In addition to "Arbeitsbuch Mathematik" (BA 1/09) and "Abstracts and deepenings to Arens et al., Mathematics" (BA 2/09) a handy summary in the pocketbook format as another "Satellite" is added to the textbook "Mathematics" (BA 12/08). This compilation is intended as a companion to seminars, group work etc., in which the textbook of its form is unsuitable. (2 S)
content.title_en: Takeaway Mathematics : Summaries and Overviews from Arens et al., Mathematics

content.title_en: The Art of Mathematics : How to Become Images of Formulas

content.text: The Book of Evidence. Publisher's text: In this German translation of an excellent book that is easy to understand for mathematically interested, two top mathematicians have selected a series of mathematical problems that can be solved by elegant, aesthetically appealing evidence. The result is a book that will delight everyone interested in mathematically!
content.title_en: The Book of Evidence

content.text: Planning of public passenger transport. Millions of people are transported daily in Germany by buses, trains and aircraft alone. Public passenger transport (ÖV) is of great importance for the quality of life of individuals but also for the performance of entire regions. Quality and efficiency of public transport systems depend on political framework conditions (state-planned, competitively organised) and the suitability of infrastructure (rail systems, airport locations), on the existing transport offer (road and flight plan), on the use of appropriate technologies (information, control and booking systems) and the best possible use of resources (energy, vehicles and personnel). The resulting decision-making, planning and optimization problems are sometimes gigantic and shouting" due to their high complexity after support by mathematics. This article outlines the state and importance of the use of mathematics in planning and implementing public passenger transport, describes the existing challenges and encourages forward-looking measures.
content.title_en: Planning of public passenger transport

content.text: Hello world! : Programming for kids and other beginners. The book is aimed at children who have already had some experience with the computer and who already use it for different things. Programming experience is not provided. The authors Sande - father and son (not shown here) - show the way to programming in child-friendly formulation, with many illustrations and small comics using the free language Python. Starting with general information about the programming language, it is quick to go into detail and you learn to program simple games yourself. There are numerous examples for each chapter and in the end there are quiz questions for self-testing and practicing. On the accompanying CD, next to the Python software, there are all sample files from the book as well as many links to the most important websites around Python. A detailed index completes the whole thing. A topic that is still in demand, on which not too much current titles can be found on the market. Therefore, a broad recommendation besides "Programming for children" and "Game Programming for kids".
content.title_en: Hello world! : Programming for kids and other beginners

content.text: The empirical study is part of the interdisciplinary acatech project "Monitoring of Motivation Concepts for the Younger Technology (MoTech)". It establishes conditions and prerequisites for developing and promoting technological interest in children and young people. The study follows the assumption that there are phases and times in the socialisation process of children and young people who are important for their (technical) socialization. Whether young people are interested in technology depends on various factors that can be described as conditions constellations. The aim of the study is to collect and describe such constellations. The study collects three complex content-related aspects: skills and skills needed for understanding and dealing with technology, attitudes that influence the view of technology and its handling, and socialisation factors that promote or inhibit the interest in technology (with the emphasis on school and family). With a view to potential intervention points, it examines how technology-relevant skills and attitudes in the socialisation process change; a specific gender interest.
content.title_en: Ways to technical fascination : socialisation and time of intervention

content.text: Socialnomics: how social media transforms the economy and society. Verl.Beschr.: Social media such as Facebook, YouTube and Twitter are the media of the future. Erik Qualman shows in detail in this book how the daily behavior of people changes fundamentally through social media and how companies can use this for their marketing strategies
content.title_en: Socialnomics: how social media change the economy and society

content.text: Paperback of automation. Teaching and reference work on the automation of technical processes for engineers and technicians in study and practice. (LK/N: Pleuß) Teaching and reference work on the automation of technical processes for engineers and technicians in study and practice. Well structured, with compact description of terms and basic information. Suitable for repetition and self-study. In the annex a list of important standards and guidelines as well as a detailed bibliography. Has been extended in some areas (SPS technology) compared to the first edition (BA 3/04), in others streamlined (sensors), and continuously updated (standards, guidelines, literature specifications). The old edition can be used, should be supplemented with this new edition. (2) (LK/N: Pleuß)
content.title_en: Paperback of automation

content.text: Engineering Mathematics Compact - Problem solving with MATLAB : Introduction and reference work for engineers and scientists. In this book the MATLAB mathematics system is used continuously to solve mathematical problems by means of computers
content.title_en: Engineering Mathematics Compact - Problem solving with MATLAB : Introduction and reference work for engineers and scientists

content.text: Generation porn: Youth, sex, Internet. A boy is 14 and searches the Internet on the porn platform Youporn almost every day for "blowjobs". The other is 16 and youporn is long since boring. The really crazily stuff is elsewhere. The Internet flushes a flood of pornographic images into the children's rooms. Often a quick click is enough: "Already 18?" "Yes!" Parents and educators are worried and worry about what the impressions in the minds of their children trigger. Porno is not limited to relevant pages in the net, but shapes the culture of teens and Twens much more comprehensively. String tangas exist for 8-year-olds, the Bravo forms total-razated bodies, Rapper Sidos Assficksong" is a teenage hymn. The porn clips become increasingly harsh. In the digital network, images of animal sex, anal orgies and pukes are circulating in the audience. On mobile phones, clips are circulating for which teenagers have taken up themselves during sex. Schools and parents' houses have to answer. But in the case of youths, there are other questions for the question?
content.title_en: Generation porn : Youth, Sex, Internet

content.text: Airbus : Aircraft since 1972. The pocket book, which is typically printed in series, records the machines of the largest European aircraft manufacturer after a short company history. All models are recorded, starting from the first development A300 from 1972 to the military transporter A400M, whose delivery is to begin in 2012. Each aircraft is presented with colour photo, short description, model history and technical brochure. A compact, up-to-date and inexpensive overview, well suited as an update to Karl Morgenstern: "Airbus" (BA 6/04) or as a supplement to general titles like "Das große Buch der Verkehrsflugere" by Achim Figgen (BA 7/09). (2)
content.title_en: Airbus : Aircraft since 1972

content.text: The author has been trying to repress formalism, also taking into account gaps in evidence, emphasizing its applicability with pictorially illustrated thinking patterns under the motto "better understanding without counting as arithmetic without understanding" in selected areas. This is easily possible with topics from geometry or graph theory, but also in fields such as stochastics or number theory, especially in the field of cryptography, it introduces with attractive ideas. As a supplement, also through moving images, a website is offered. The solutions to the assigned tasks can be found in the appendix. Like O. Deiser: "Grundbegriffe der wissenschaftlichen Mathematik" (BA 7/10), this simpler text can also be recommended to students as a guide in the search for a subject. (2 S)
content.title_en: Seeing and understanding mathematics: Keys to the world

content.text: Schere, Stein, Papier : Game Theory in Everyday Life. In this book, English physicist and science author Fisher explains some basic principles and key concepts of game theory, an important sub-area of mathematics that has already brought the Nobel Prize (for economics) to some researchers. He explains common methods, for example, in divisions ("who shares, chooses the other"), or peaceful strategies that are often conflict-laden (e.g. "like you me, I tell you"). He likes to take his true or invented examples from his own family history or tests at parties or other occasions. The book is free of mathematical formulas; psychological moments are highlighted. A whole chapter deals with trust. Even though titles are already available on the subject, which do not overwhelm an interested layman too much, for example the multiple-paged volume of M.D. Davis: "Game Theory for Non-Mathematicians" (ID 20/05) or the introduction of A. Mehlmann: "Who wins the game?" (BA 3/98); the new work is quite interesting and well readable precisely because of numerous deviations and remarks.
content.title_en: Scissors, stone, paper : Game theory in everyday life

content.text: Basics of branding. The book is an intermediate product between counsellor and textbook. The range of brand development includes: target groups, brand trends, branding techniques, brand structures and brand architecture. The topic "Man as a brand" is only discussed sub-dividently. For this purpose there are other titles in the range: e.g. P. Wüst: "Profile makes career" (BA 7/10) and J.C. Berndt: "The strongest brand is you yourself" (BA 2/10). Modern and contemporary besides the numerous well borrowed titles around the topic "brand". (2) (LK/C: Vogel) The author explains the individual steps of brand development and the methods used. (LK/C: Vogel)
content.title_en: Basics of branding
