content.title_en: Chemical delicacies

content.text: Modulated surfaces : Ornament and technology in contemporary architecture. A trend theme and its constructive foundations: the ornament in current architecture. The ornament is currently gaining a new place in architecture. Innovative technologies of design and digital component production change its role redically by linking the expressive forms of ornament with the constructive logistics of a building. This opens up a wealth of new possibilities for interaction between function and decoration, construction and surface, supporting structure and shell.
content.title_en: Modulated surfaces : ornament and technology in contemporary architecture

content.text: Demand-oriented use cycle management : conceptual considerations for sustainable land management in the city and region. The continued use of undeveloped land for settlement purposes - among other things as a result of urban-relocation of private households - is in conflict with the guiding principle of sustainable spatial development.
content.title_en: Demand-oriented use cycle management : conceptual considerations for sustainable land management in the city and region

content.text: The first chapter on the history of plastics and their demarcation from other materials is presented here. In terms of formulation and construction, the title is primarily aimed at students and practitioners. It is more recommended for vocational students: "Skills Engineering" (BA 10/09). (3)
content.title_en: Plastic Knowledge for Beginners

content.text: C and Linux : use the operating system with their own programs. Practical aids for Linux system programming are relatively thin. A standard work appears already in 4th edition (most recently shown here the 2nd edition: ID 44/02, must be replaced; only partially usable: 3rd edition 2005 not displayed here), which conveys the obvious programming in C, after all, the entire operating system itself is written in ANSI-C. The source texts of the new edition have been converted to the newly developed Linux standard base, new is also the topic of controlling devices via USB. Examples for network programming have been extended and new development environments are described. Offers advanced programmers with C basic knowledge still using the numerous available Linux tools and with many detailed examples well comprehensible instructions, among others, for creating hardware practice solutions, graphical user interfaces or own help pages.
content.title_en: C and Linux : use the operating system with your own programs

content.text: Tutorium Analysis 1 and linear algebra 1 : Mathematics of students for students explained and commented. Each section begins with the definitions of the most important terms, followed by a compilation of relevant sentences with evidence. Then explanations with sometimes original examples illustrate and illuminate the whole. In this way the text leads through the usual material of a first semester in mathematics. After the introduction of general foundations, evidence techniques and structures follows a presentation of the analysis up to the core sets of differential and integral calculus. The last part about linear algebra begins with the concrete problem of equation systems and leads through the the therory of vector spaces to matrices, determinants and self-values. The authors familiar with the difficulties of first semesters in this subject successfully strive for comprehensibility. Occasionally some vague formulations, for example when introducing the undetermined integral as function, are forgiven. The volume very helpful to students is also largely suitable for students in a course of performance of SII. (3 S)
content.title_en: Tutorium Analysis 1 and linear algebra 1 : Mathematics of students explained and commented on for students

content.text: E-Books with ePUB: from Word to E-Books with XML. Publication for experts in electronic publishing for the creation of attractively designed e-books in ePUB format with Word files as starting material. (Elke Nibbrig) E-Books have become an important topic of discussion in the publishing and media world, since early 2010 the ePUB format has established itself as an open standard, but surprisingly, there have been no specialist literature in the German language area except weblogs. Victor Wang (specialist for media-neutral publishing) closes this gap and offers a sound publication for the generation of attractively designed e-books in ePUB format with Word files as starting material. After an introduction to the history of e-publishing, different reading devices, formats and digital rights management it is about XML basics as a basis of ePUB format and the production of Word XML documents. In the second half of the book, the different substandards of ePUB are presented in detail and based on a sample flow of the display of the user's screenshots.
content.title_en: E-books with ePUB : from Word to E-books with XML

content.text: The dictionary of the PC-technical terms with correct pronunciation: [all important computer-technical terms and abbreviations especially for PC-initiators and seniors; new: terms for Windows 7 and the blog language]. In read-friendly writing this PC-Lexikon proves 6,000 current technical terms from the computer environment. (LK/HB: Isigkeit) Updated edition of a PC-Lexikon, which focuses mainly on desktop PCs and notebooks. The 6 year old prepress (BA 12/04) is outdated and should be deleted. The 6,000 entries comprehensive work was donated a larger font to improve readability and in addition the English terms received a sound-writing addition. Certainly a concession to the newly named target group of the seniors on the cover. Besides these formal improvements, numerous new technical terms have also been introduced, among others from the environment of Windows 7 and the blogger language. The inconsistency with the prepress is always evident in this issue. The appendix provides, besides an overview of the file extensions, a table of the TopBBranks and the Branks.
content.title_en: The dictionary of the PC terms with correct pronunciation : [all important computer terms and abbreviations especially for PC beginners and seniors ; new: terms for Windows 7 and the blog language]

content.text: From Boolean Logic to switching circuits and automatic : towards modern information technology. The work contains the portraits of the persons described and the pictures of their most important publications and passages.
content.title_en: From Boolean Logic to switching circuits and automatic : towards modern information technology

content.text: Sunny prospects. Amazon: Sunny prospects are promised by a house that is geared towards a completely new way of living: cut short and yet generous in its effect, comfortably and intelligently controlled, climate-friendly and energy-producing rather than consuming. In 2009 the Technical University Darmstadt took part in the international university competition Solar Decathlon in Washington DC. And for the second time in a row the German team won first place. The Solar Decathlon serves to bring the potential of solar and sustainable construction and solar energy generation closer to a broad public. It offers the opportunity not only to explore new paths in architecture, but also to develop, test and apply new technologies and products.
content.title_en: Sunny outlook

content.text: Sustainable logistics: responses to a global challenge. Logistics and supply chain management will have to adapt to completely new boundary conditions and requirements in the foreseeable future. Based on very ambitious targets for reducing pollutant emissions, policy will contribute to a significant increase in transport costs through various instruments such as tolls, excise duties and a trade with scarce emission certificates. In the same direction, oil price increases and increasing productivity losses in freight transport will have to be tackled, which will have to cope with an increasingly overloaded transport infrastructure. Against this background, logistics will make a strong contribution to maintaining mobility and the environment, and will have to reinvent itself in parts. Based on a description of the future boundary conditions, this book will develop adaptation strategies that will allow for less pollution-intensive goods exchange and can help to maintain mobility as a prerequisite for any part-time economy.
content.title_en: Sustainable logistics: answers to a global challenge

content.text: Samples : Methods and practical implementation with R. Verlagstext: The book introduces basic principles of sampling. Motivation and a clear description of the procedures are the main focus. After a general introduction, both model-based and design-based sampling methods such as cluster sample and stratified sample are developed. Each chapter is completed with a description of how the procedures can be implemented in R. This enables the reader to directly implement even complex sampling methods into R. An outlook on further procedures and practical problems closes each chapter of the book.
content.title_en: Samples : Methods and practical implementation with R

content.text: The lawmakers have always considered it too risky to "only" punish the violation of legal property. And so he already denounces behaviours which are dangerous in terms of experience or which, even further shifted, merely carry the germ cell of future disaster. The forced end of such a pre-delegation would be the punishment of the evil thought - not merely a play of thought, as we have seen recently in the new creations of criminal offences. Thus, the one perspective of the boundless pre-delegation of criminal law, which is named in the title of this volume, is addressed. The other is linked to the identified threat scenarios of international terrorism or the so-called organized crime, which seem to demand two things: a uniform and at the same time interconnected transnational approach. Here, too, the obsessive consequence lies in an extension of criminal law ... (source: Text Verlageinband / Verlag)
content.title_en: Limitless pre-delegation of criminal law?

content.text: Passive houses : Design - Construction - Details - Examples. Practical manual for architects, engineers, building practitioners and passive house interested parties. Compared to the 1st edition (ID-G 51/08) continuously updated with EnEV requirements, KfW funding programs, costs and up-to-date technology. More than 100 pages are extended, among others, for thermal insulation, renovation with passive house concepts, experience values, economic efficiency, multi- and lower costs when building a passive house and supplemented with other realized projects, mainly in the purpose building (children's garden, student residence etc.). The preliminary edition can be used with restrictions, a purchase of the new edition is recommended despite the high book price. According to Dieter Pregizer: "Fundaments and construction of a passive house" (BA 6/07) and the introduced guide for the inventory rehabilitation "From old buildings to low energy and passive houses" (last BA 4/10). (3)
content.title_en: Passive houses : Design - Design - Details - Examples

content.text: Biogas measurement programme II : 61 biogas plants in comparison ; this work was carried out in the context of the project "Federal programme for the evaluation of novel biomass biogas plants" (Förderkenzeichen: 22003405); the project was financed by the Fachagentur Nachwachsende Rohstoffe e.V. (FNR) with funds from the Federal Ministry of Food, Agriculture and Consumer Protection (BMELV). Overall, the results show that there are large differences between the plants in terms of function, performance and operational safety and in terms of economic efficiency. It is clear that the remuneration of the EEG is not a guarantee for the profitability of the plant operation. The correct dimensioning of the plant in combination with an optimal selection of the fermentation substrate rates is, together with a high utilization of the CHP while simultaneously using the heat generated by the biogas production key for the economic success. Not least, the qualification of the operator plays an important role (source: f.).
content.title_en: Biogas measurement programme II : 61 biogas plants in comparison ; this work was carried out within the framework of the project "Federal programme for the evaluation of novel biomass biogas plants" (mark of funding: 22003405) ; the project was financed by the specialized agency Renewable Raw Materials (FNR) with funds from the Federal Ministry of Food, Agriculture and Consumer Protection (BMELV)

content.text: Google Analytics : implement, interpret, benefit. MORE TRANSPARENZ = MORE REFERENCE - Optimize your website with Google Analytics, the free leader in web analytics tools. - Get a comprehensive overview of all features of Google Analytics and learn how to use them properly. - Take advantage of the experience of a Google insider. - The second edition has been continuously updated and expanded by 100 pages. - Current information on web analytics and Google Analytics can be found at www.timoaden.de You've surely heard about Google Analytics or already use it. But do you know all the subtleties, tips and tricks? Have you really implemented the tool perfectly and adapted to your individual needs? Take full advantage of it and conduct concrete actions from existing numbers? Timo Aden, former Google staff and web analytics experts, presents in this practical book the multifaceted features that this tool offers - Analytics now comprehensively covers all areas of activity in the online analytics section.
content.title_en: Google Analytics : implement, interpret, benefit

content.text: The modern state of stabilization: Germany and Europe 1618 - 1715. Part of an unfinished "German history", in which the period between the beginning of the Thirty Years' War and the death of Louis XIV of France is described as a stabilizing basis for the development of modernism
content.title_en: The modern state of stabilization : Germany and Europe 1618 - 1715

content.text: Nothing: what is important in life. Pierre sits day after day on a branch in the plum tree and preaches that everything is irrelevant and nothing of importance. By his urgency, Agnes and the others from Pierre's class try to prove to him that there is something that is significant. From 14. (Birgit Knust) "Nothing" makes you freeze on a hot summer day, because the same-speaked novel tells about emotional cold students and their cruel deeds. Pierre sits day after day, month after month on a branch in the plum tree and preaches that everything is irrelevant and nothing of importance. By his urgency unsure, the I-teller Agnes and the others from Pierre's class try to prove to him that there is something important. They collect important things and build a "mountain out of importance from it". What has begun harmlessly, escalates soon: First, Richard's football must believe in it, then Gerda's hamster, Hussein's prayer carpet, the coffin of Eli's little brother, Janfi's girlfriend, and reburiedly ordered to be the author.
content.title_en: Nothing : what is important in life

content.text: The I-Senders : the social media principle ; Twitter, Facebook & Communities successfully use. The I-Senders - they tweet, blog and present details from their lives to a million audience. Social media are as natural for the generation upload as the air to breathe - but what about the companies? The commercial use of Facebook, Twitter, XING and Co. for targeted marketing, target group communication or PR is still not a reality for many companies. The communication pro Wolfgang Hünnekens shows in his new e-book what possibilities the Web 2.0 offers with its communication forms. The children's shoes develop into a serious, serious communication form. Using many examples, this e-book shows what potential these new media offer. Whether social media experts or novites, who are planning to enter the topic, they all find in this e-book many new aspects for the targeted use of social media.
content.title_en: The I-Sender : the Social Media Principle ; Twitter, Facebook & Communities to Successfully Use

content.text: Next BANG! : how the risky game with megatechnologies threatens our existence. An ominous alliance of science, big corporations and governments is preparing large-scale interventions into the Earth system - largely unnoticed by the public and without the urgently needed risk assessment
content.title_en: Next BANG! : how the risky game of megatechnologies threatens our existence

content.text: Child abuse : recognize, help, prevent. Deegener, who has worked for many years in the children's and youth psychiatry in Homburg/Saar, is one of the most important experts on the topic of "child abuse". His fundamental title is now available in the 5th edition. Starting from 21 typical questions and statements, the topic is addressed in its entirety in a combination of facts and action knowledge. However, a complete revision is not possible. The text is largely identical with that of the preliminary edition. In addition, current developments (e.g. the scandal at the Odenwaldschule) are mentioned. Besides a few address changes (the sorting by post-code instead of by alphabet as in the preliminary edition, here at first glance) only the literature directory has been revised. Now titles are taken into account until 2009, some older literature is no longer listed. In public libraries, m.E. the 4th edition of the title suitable for lay people can be used as well. Furthermore, "well readable, understandable and professionally based" (BA 5/09). (1) (LK/WIT: Grote Mährerlagungsabberechtung, Kinderbehörung, Mübenung) istung, Müben der Kindersberechtung, Mübenung, Müben der Kindersberechtung, Wehrerberechtung isteilung, Wehrung, Wehrung ist
content.title_en: Child abuse : detect, help, prevent

content.text: On the way - with Navi, Handy & GPS : you will find everywhere. The new series "Digital lifeguide" (2 further titles for review: "Home-Media" and "Music digital & everywhere") which works with black and white illustrations offers easy to understand, stimulating and useful information about everything that is now possible with digital devices in everyday life and leisure time. This volume shows, not too much in depth but offering a comparative overview, how to plan routes with GPS navigation device, mobile phone, smartphone or PC comfortably, with the most different means of transport or walking through city or nature or how to access his photo archive through geo-tagging. Also the outdoor sport geocaching is treated. The band is drawn with numerous tips and further web addresses. In principle, on all mentioned topics are already current individual titles (e.g. T. Bierl: "GPS on a bicycle", BA 8/10) but who could not get all the information can provide with this quick information for communication.
content.title_en: On the way - with Navi, Mobile & GPS : so you can find everywhere

content.text: Mathematical modelling with MATLAB® : a practical introduction. The fact that predictive predictions are supported by mathematical models is carried out in very different areas, whether in the economy, in weather forecasts, in cosmology or only in order to determine the optimal flight path of a ball. To this end, a mathematical structure must be found in which the original gröen and the determining natural laws can be interpreted. The results of mathematical processes must then be translated back into reality. The text introduces the problem with a detailed case study and then deals with the topic in general and fundamentally. The numerical calculations use the routines and possibilities of the MATLAB program system, which is explained in the appendix. The volume is aimed at students in the bachelor's degree programme, who however have some mathematical knowledge, although deeper evidence is usually only hinted at. (3)
content.title_en: Mathematical Modeling with MATLAB® : a practical introduction

content.text: Calculation methods for students of physics in the first year. Calculation methods that the physics student needs in the first semesters. Markus Otto, born 1982, knows what the student needs. In short, but precisely, he explains the calculation methods in examples. Grey is a short memo. At the end of each chapter there is a pick sheet that summarizes everything like a formula collection. This book is excellent for beginners of physics. H. Fischer: "Mathematics for physicists" (in this no.) is more detailed, but the memos and pick sheet are missing. (3)
content.title_en: Calculation methods for students of physics in the first year

content.text: Lasers in science and technology. The non-fiction book provides information on basics and areas of application of laser technology, provides an overview from the discovery of lasers to practical applications in today's world. (Dirk Reinartz) The author provides an overview of laser technology and its applications. From discovery to today's application, the history of lasers is illuminated. The writing style is fluid, easy to understand and can be read very well. A keyword list, a photo-proof and literature recommendations complete the whole. Since this book partly dispenses with detail depth, it is intended as a reading for technically interested persons who want to obtain an overview of the mode of action of a laser. For students or graduates of this subject area, it is more recommended to T. Graf (ID 24/09) or D. Bäuerle (ID 20/09). (2) (Dirk Reinartz)
content.title_en: Lasers in Science and Technology

content.text: Recycling technology : Fachbuch für Lehre und Praxis. Introductory textbook for students (environmental and engineering training) as well as for practitioners in authorities and companies on processes and materials for the recycling of waste. No guide for laymen (like K. Soyez: BA 2/10), but an information-rich, finely structured specialist. Also addresses the recycling of electronic equipment and end-of-life vehicles and deals with the topic in a clear and practical way. Important topic, on which only little basic literature is available ("Recycling Manual", ID 31/96, sets higher, is partly outdated). Therefore important for large specialist collections. (3)
content.title_en: Recycling technology : Book for teaching and practice

content.text: Human-computer interaction : basic knowledge for developers and designers. The book reminds of a computer science lecture that is as exciting as you expect it to be: little entertaining. The topic is reproduced very correctly in the whole range, including the consideration of the relevant DIN standards. It is about: software ergonomics, human information processing, hardware, dialogue design, human-centered system development and many more. Designers and developers get a very solid - theoretical - foundation, like a website, a program must be designed so that there is no irritation when communicating with humans. Important topic, relevant for many, comprehensive correct representation, poppy presentation - but unfortunately a bit dry stylistically. (2)
content.title_en: Human-Computer Interaction : Basic knowledge for developers and designers

content.text: The Twitter factor: Communication is a point of focus. Verl.Beschr.: Twitter - Communication in real time! Hardly any other medium in Web 2.0 delivers accurate information and connects people like Twitter so quickly. Whether you want to track trends, search interesting business partners and experts or use Twitter for your self-marketing (IBM) as a two-way communication tool, you can still see unheard of possibilities thanks to many additional applications. The German Twitter coaches Stefan Berns and Dirk Henningsen illustrate in this book how trainers, consultants, individual fighters and even companies can use this powerful communication tool. Starting with the generation of new followers and the efficient use of various Twitter tools, the authors show which new possibilities Twitter opens up for online PR, online marketing and customer loyalty. An exciting book that shows how Twitter is changing communication and which opportunities the Twitter factor offers in the future.
content.title_en: The Twitter Factor: Communication Put to the Point

content.text: Scientific work with Microsoft Office Word 2010: [all under control: format templates, graphics, diagrams and directories; the "outer values": perfect layout for homework, thesis, dissertations & co.; the form is easy to implement]. Seimert's guide to making scientific work using Word 2010 based on the Windows 7 operating system is a revised and updated version of the previous version of Word 2007 (BA 8/07). As the differences in the new Word version compared to the previous version are not so pronounced, parts of the text remained unchanged. A stronger emphasis is on visual effects. However, the second chapter, which was devoted to creating divisions and creating central and branch documents, is omitted. The depth of the contents of the table of contents has been shortened, but the index allows targeted control of content. Illustrations have been exchanged and the accompanying CD includes all the examples and templates mentioned above. The new edition can be used as a further application and as a more affordable alternative to the extensive version of Word/BH.
content.title_en: Scientific work with Microsoft Office Word 2010 : [all under control: format templates, graphics, diagrams and directories ; the "outer values": perfect layout for homework, thesis, dissertations & co. ; keep the form: implement formal specifications easily]

content.text: Monument conservation and society: Detlef Karg on the occasion of his 65th birthday. More than 50 authors write on this volume on topics of monument protection and preservation, on art history and landscape architecture, on German-German research and projects. - - With Ferdinand von Quast, the first state conservator of Prussia since 1843, and Franz Kugler, who became an art consultant in the Prussian Ministry of Culture in the same year, the development of inventory and the struggle for monument methodology, which today includes considerably expanded subject areas, begins. - - To use and deal with monument substance, to examine "reconstruction versus conservation" examples of the history of construction, documentation and restoration of monasteries and churches are presented, but also topics of urban monument preservation, garden conservation, industrial or military monuments up to the handling of recent history, such as the Berlin Wall as memorial and monument
content.title_en: Monument conservation and society : Detlef Karg for 65th birthday

content.text: River landscapes: Interrelationships between regional cultural landscape design, preventive flood protection and low water supply; a project of the research programme "Model project of spatial planning (MORO)" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS), supervised by the Federal Institute for Building, Urban and Spatial Research (BBSR) at the Federal Office for Building and Spatial Planning (BBR). This publication is dedicated to the consideration of interrelationships between preventive flood protection and regional cultural landscape design in river landscapes. The focus is on a social and political perspective. Laws, planning works and informal documents are analysed to what extent there are links between flood protection and low water supply and cultural landscape design. Furthermore, it is examined whether synergy potentials exist and to what extent these are gaining importance in the course of a climate adaptation policy. For example, the increasing linking of different policy fields is examined in four regional case studies: the urban Emscher region, the tourism region of Franconian Lakeland, the city region of Cologne/Bonn with the regional region of 2010 and the Havel region as a location of the BUGA 2015.[]
content.title_en: River landscapes : Interrelationships between regional cultural landscape design, preventive flood protection and low water supply; a project of the research programme "Model project of spatial planning (MORO)" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS), supervised by the Federal Institute for Building, Urban and Spatial Research (BBSR) at the Federal Office for Building and Spatial Planning (BBR)

content.text: Moral in times of crisis. Autobiographical overview of the outstanding representative of political psychoanalysis Horst-Eberhard Richter (born 1923) about his diverse engagement. Life balance, criticism of the decline in values in politics and economics, plea for the regeneration of morality and encouragement to resistance. (Dieter Altmeyer) Autobiographical overview of the well-known psychoanalyst (born 1923) about his professional and private engagement. Personal experiences and experiences are combined by the "father of the German peace movement" and author of the "God complex" (last BA 4/01) with analytical reflections, as in his reports about his encounters with Brandt, Gorbachov, Sacharov, Mandela or Ustinov, so also in his remarks about the atomic threat, the climate disorder, the social injustice or the "goater-unbeing" of the banks, as whose common causes he blames the boundless egoism, the lack of emphatie and the general decay of values.
content.title_en: Morality in times of crisis

content.text: Rock determination in the terrain. The rock determination in the terrain has established itself in a short time as a standard textbook in the geoscientific basic studies and among lovers of geology and mineralogy. Faster than expected a second and now a third edition was required. This book is thoroughly practical. Roland Vinx explains the necessary basics easily legible and easily understandable. The readers learn to understand the characteristic characteristics of the rocks without the need for petrographic prior knowledge. The book thus fills a gap between textbooks of petrography and petrology on the one hand and rock and mineral guides on the other.
content.title_en: Rock determination in terrain

content.text: Statistics in Germany: 100 years of German Statistical Society. The work describes the centenary history of the German Statistical Society: The contributions of its members to the foundation and further development of German economic and social statistics and to methodological innovations such as recent time series, price index or sampling methods. Other topics are the role of the DStatG in the integration of East and West statistics and in the preparation and implementation of the last and current censuses. In a total of 17 chapters, recognized experts present these achievements in a historical and factual context also understandable to general audiences.
content.title_en: Statistics in Germany : 100 years of the German Statistical Society

content.text: Table book Mechatronics : Tables - Formulas - Norms applications. Publisher's text: A professional reference work for mechatronics specialists and those who want to become them. This collection of tables, formulas and standard applications is a faithful companion through professional life or studies and has everything between the book covers, including ?Mathematics, Technical Physics?, ?Technical Communication?, ?Chemistry, Materials, Production? via ?Electrical systems and drives, Mechatronic systems? and ?Digital and information technology? up to ?Connection and environmental technology?.
content.title_en: Mechatronics table book : Tables - Formulas - Standard applications

content.text: F0rb1dd3n Network : Anatomy of a hack. This volume on security in information technology is aimed primarily at somewhat inattentive administrators. Their interest is to be aroused by a thriller story, which takes the first 40 percent of the book. Two young hackers meet with darker hackers, which gives the authors the opportunity to describe a series of attacks on WLANs and PCs, which are then commented on in the second part of the book. These subject chapters contain many information about common methods and tools of hackers, but also the countermeasures that a prudent IT department can take. Many web links and further literature information, however, are found, almost only US sources. There are also descriptions of some programs that are used by hackers, but also by network administrators, e.g. to detect attacks from outside. This is the translation of the second edition with completely new subject matter (the 1st US edition contained many plagiars and was withdrawn). (2)
content.title_en: F0rb1dd3n Network : Anatomy of a hack

metadata.authors: Street, Jayson E.; Nabors, Kent; Baskin, Brian

content.text: Facebook - Marketing among friends : Dialogue instead of plump advertising. Advertising in and with Facebook, a guide for small and medium-sized enterprises, with many examples of successful strategies and campaigns
content.title_en: Facebook - Marketing among friends : Dialogue instead of plump advertising

content.text: Android Apps Development for Dummies: [at a glance: Apps for smartphones like Nexus One, MyTouch and Droid learn to program; download the SDK and get Eclipse running; encode Android apps; offer your apps on the Android market; let the Androids work for you]. What N. Goldstein (in this no.) offers the iPhone developer, D. Felker shows in a very similar way to the reader, who prefers to create his apps for the device-independent Android platform from Google and market them in the more accessible Android marketplace. It works with useful step-by-step instructions and 2 different complex sample projects, on foreknowledge is expected. The focus is on developing apps for the Android smartphone with the Self Development Kit and the development environment Eclipse, on the Android preference framework is only briefly addressed. The promising new Google tool Inventor, which is still in the beta phase, is also mentioned in the case of H. Klos 11. The app is also referred to as a common theme for the Android app.
content.title_en: Android Apps Development for Dummies: [At a glance: learn how to program apps for smartphones like Nexus One, MyTouch and Droid; download the SDK and get Eclipse running; encode Android applications; offer your own apps on the Android market; let the Androids work for you]

content.text: Transformation management for sustainable water management: Handing in to implement novel infrastructure solutions in the area of water and wastewater; [results of the research network netWORKS]. The conversion - the transformation - of the urban technical systems of water supply and wastewater disposal is the subject of this volume. In the sense of an energy and resource efficient urban development it is important to raise existing potentials of energy and material resources. If this conversion succeeds, the settlement water infrastructure will in future be more decentralised and closely linked to the energy-efficient infrastructure (especially the heat supply). It will consist of numerous modules, focus on the closure of material circuits and be able to react more flexibly to changing environmental conditions. It will also affect the level of the individual household or building or the level of the individual block and will have consequences for the building technology and equipment. The publication of the research network netWORKS is aimed at decision-makers from the fields of urban development, urban planning and settlement water management. The responsible planners will be given a concept for the multi-dimensional assessment of the possible conversion strategy.
content.title_en: Transformation management for a sustainable water management : Handying in order to implement new infrastructure solutions in the area of water and wastewater ; [Results of the research network netWORKS]

content.text: Strategies of the municipalities for their municipal housing holdings: Results of a municipal survey; a project of the research programme "Experimental Housing and Urban Planning" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS), supervised by the Federal Institute for Building, Urban and Spatial Research (BBSR) in the Federal Office for Building and Spatial Planning (BBR). Municipal housing companies and holdings traditionally play an important role in the German housing markets. In the context of realised or planned sales of municipal housing holdings, a lively housing policy discussion has been held in recent years. Against this background, the research project "Strategies of the municipalities for their municipal housing holdings" was awarded by the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS) and the Federal Institute for Building, Urban and Spatial Research (BBSR). The aim of the study was to gain information about the situation and importance of municipal housing stocks as well as the strategies of municipalities in relation to their municipal housing holdings.
content.title_en: Strategies of the municipalities for their municipal housing holdings : Results of a municipal survey ; a project of the research programme "Experimental Housing and Urban Planning" of the Federal Ministry of Transport, Building and Urban Development (BMVBS), supervised by the Federal Institute for Building, Urban and Spatial Research (BBSR) at the Federal Office for Building and Spatial Planning (BBR)

content.text: High frequency technology : Basics of mobile communication technology ; with 54 examples and 39 exercises. HF applications can be found in many - also non-technical areas, e.g. in electrical, information and communication technology, mechatronics, vehicle electronics etc. It is such a wide field that it can hardly be treated all-encompassingly in a book. Here the focus is on processes during wave propagation, i.e. on their description, consequences and utilization in circuits and systems. This is described vividly and mathematically well-founded for students and an insight into the modern design tools (circuit and field simulation) is given. At the end of the chapter there are exercises tasks at each time; the solutions are located beside an animated 3-D simulation on the web site of the book. If necessary for libraries with student readership and complementary to basic literature on the subject, e.g. H. Heurmann (ID 37/09), J. Detlefsen (ID 5/07). (3)
content.title_en: Radio frequency technology : Basics of mobile communication technology ; with 54 examples and 39 exercises

content.text: Mathematics for engineers: an application-oriented textbook; [Bachelor-suitable; extras on the web]. Originally 2-volume practical textbook for students of natural and engineering sciences at universities. Up to the 4th edition in 2 volumes and many more "Mathematics for engineers with Maple" (here last ID-G 14/01 and 38/97, 5th edition 2008 not shown here). In this 6th edition the CD-ROM supplement was omitted, the content of which is now available on the Internet. Newly included are chapters on partial differential equations, the MAPLE descriptions have been adapted to version 14. From the author see also "Mathematical problems solve with Maple" (BA 12/05). Suitable for self-acquiring mathematical basic knowledge and for Bachelor exam preparation. All MAPLE-edituations are available on the homepage of the book as electronic worksheets and can be individually edited, elementary connections can be visualized there via animations. In the book 380 calculated examples and over 360 tasks with solutions, registers, literature list.
content.title_en: Mathematics for engineers : an application-oriented textbook ; [Bachelor-suitable ; Extras on the Web]

content.text: Living from Death : Thinking about life and death ; 7/8th class. The students think about their own mortality and the afterlife ideas of the different religions. Inspired by stories, images and their own creative form, they experience during the course of the 10 learning stations that death is part of life - and also points beyond.
content.title_en: Living from Death : Thinking about Life and Death ; 7/8th Class

content.text: Virtualization and Cloud Computing: Concepts, technology study, market overview. Virtualization and Cloud Computing are currently among the key keywords for IT infrastructure operators. There are a variety of different technologies, products and business models for completely different application scenarios. The present study first provides a detailed overview of current developments in concepts and technologies of virtualization technology – from classic server virtualization to virtual workplace infrastructures to application virtualization and makes an attempt to classify the virtualization variants. When considering the cloud computing concept, its basics and various architecture variants and applications are introduced. The subsequent market overview for virtualization technology shows that the large manufacturers – Citrix, Microsoft and VMware – offer products for almost all virtualization variants and raises crucial differences or the strengths of the existing virtual infrastructure provider. For example, the virtualization of the cloud is very well-referred to the virtualization industry.
content.title_en: Virtualization and Cloud Computing : Concepts, Technology Study, Market Overview

metadata.authors: Meinel, Christoph; Roschke, Sebastian; Willems, Christian

content.text: Energy-saving building guide : to the point: neutral technical information for more energy efficiency. Publisher's text: The author shows that energy saving in building does not mean restriction and non-remitting, but rather more comfort, home comfort, quality improvement and preservation of value. After a brief introduction to the basics of building physics and the presentation of the most important modern building and insulation materials, it explains where, how much and how much should be insulated and how dense a house should be today. It is shown what needs to be considered in the most important elements of the expansion from window to ventilation and heating to the use of collectors and power saving technology. He also explains in detail the implementation of the current energy saving regulation (EnEV 2009) and the passive house standard.
content.title_en: Energy-saving building guide : to the point: neutral technical information for more energy efficiency

content.text: Alternative drives: this is how we are driving into the future. Large-format non-fiction book with an overview of current and under development drive systems for cars. (Michael Müller) How mobility and individual traffic can be shaped in the future cannot be predicted. With rising oil prices and declining production there are different options, e.g. reduction of consumption. For some years, vehicles with hybrid technology (combination of combustion and electric motor, e.g. the Prius) are available. In development and small series are electric drives and in "near distance" fuel cells are to serve as drive. The articles, partly from articles of the journal, provide vivid information with many photos and pictures about "drives". Sometimes the articles in the magazine style are confusing, for example when tables, pictures, technical data, drawings and color-backed special information are summarized on 2 pages. While the fuel saving with current models is mentioned, alternatives such as voluntary absence of cars or public transport are missing. In this compilation and topic there is no comparison title (for newer drive types "Hybrid", ID-Micha 38/07).
content.title_en: Alternative drives: this is how we drive into the future

content.text: Remodelling with existing structures : sustainable adaptation strategies for buildings, rooms and structures. The adaptation of existing buildings has gained considerable importance over the past years compared to new construction and expansion of areas. But how can the conversion of buildings and buildings, rooms and open spaces, structures and infrastructures be designed in a sustainable way? - - The book focuses on sustainable planning and design strategies that are able to react flexibly to changing conditions in the future, beyond adapting existing structures to current requirements. The impact of demographic, economic, social and social change, the ecological challenges from climate protection to resource management and not least the citizen's anchoring of concepts and projects have a decisive impact here in particular.
content.title_en: Conversion with inventory : sustainable adaptation strategies for buildings, rooms and structures

content.text: The most important surfaces for the interior are: wall lexicon. The design of the "foot floor lexicon" (ID-B 13/11) is similar to that of the "foot floor lexicon" (ID-B 13/11) and now follows a reference work on different wall surfaces. After a short introduction to the effect of wall surfaces, the lexicon part provides an overview of more than 500 different materials that can be used for the design of interior walls. Structured by colours, plasters, wallpapers, tiles and panels, natural and artificial stones, wood and laminate, metals, plastics and other wall coverings (glass, acoustic elements, wall tattoos, etc.), each product is presented in brief with colour photo, product type, characteristics, material, name and manufacturer's specification. With interspersed interviews of room designers and short project examples. Like the above mentioned "foot floor lexicon" a treasure pit for architects, interior designers, craftsmen, planners and potential builders. Without any comparison title. "Boden, wall, ceiling" (BA 1/08) is an idea for the design of all interior surfaces.
content.title_en: Wall encyclopedia : the most important surfaces for the interior

content.text: Wood is more extensive than the pre-printed wood, and is extended by 17 new types of wood. Nevertheless, the 2006 edition can remain in existence. After a brief introduction to the material wood with drying, cutting, graining and wood defects, 219 types of wood are presented, each of them on an A4 page, alphabetically arranged according to botanical names. The pages always constructed in the same way contain a photo of the grain, the text contains the sections description, characteristics, drying and standing capacity, durability (including pests), use, origin and health risks. Partly supplemented by photos of workpieces. Processing oriented and more extensive than the otherwise comparable "atlas of wood species" (ID 17/10). As a cheaper and sufficient material science for homeworkers, it is recommended that "working material wood" (BA 2/03) be used. (3) (Karin Lehmann) 219 types of wood are presented with the properties important for wood workers: grain with photo, processing properties, possible types of use, typical types of clay, typical types of wood, common types of wood, common types of wood, common types of wood, common types of wood, common types of wood, common types of wood, common for use and use.
content.title_en: Wood: the reference work for practice; [more than 200 types of wood and their use]

content.text: Islam in the media: journalistic quality in the dispute over the Mohammed cartoons. Islam has become the top topic of the media in Germany. Almost daily the German press reports on the integration of Muslims or developments in the Muslim-influenced countries. Thus, the reporting determines the social discourse and political debates decisively. Reports without tendentious representations and evaluations are therefore urgently needed. Is there any need for action here? Based on journalistic quality criteria Fabian Wahl examines the coverage in three German daily newspapers using the example of the dispute over the Mohammed cartoons. With the Süddeutsche Zeitung, the BILD newspaper and the Bonn general ad, he covers the entire spectrum from the nationwide quality newspaper to the opinion-leading tabloid newspaper to the independent regional newspaper. Empirically, the author examines the aspects of diversity, impartiality, correctness, transparency and comprehensibility.
content.title_en: Islam in the media: journalistic quality in the dispute over the Mohammed cartoons

content.text: Housing market forecast 2025. Housing markets in Germany have changed significantly in recent years: on the one hand, declining population numbers in supply overhangs and housing emptynesses are showing, which are no longer limited to individual regions - not even the new federal states. Thus, the vast majority of urban and rural districts in Germany will experience a declining population development by 2025, which will be reflected in the local housing markets, despite further differentiation of housing markets with increasing numbers of single-person households and in individual market segments, still continuing growth of living space indirectly due to supply overhangs and changing demand.
content.title_en: Housing market forecast 2025

content.text: The collection, which was created in collaboration with the newly founded "Deutsche Rohstoffagentur" and the "Federal Institute for Geosciences", contains 17 articles and interviews dealing with the imminent shortage of energy raw materials, minerals and ores. The authors also analyse how Germany as a low-raw material country can ensure its supply. Although it is not a systematic presentation, a variety of topics are being discussed. They range from the increasingly important rare earths (with in "We consume ourselves to death", ID-A 50/11) to the search for unconventional gas storages (to gas "energy in 60 minutes", ID-B 46/11) to manganese nodules, diamonds, copper, salt and coal. Compared to the conference volume "Energy and Raw Materials" (ID-G 40/11), the high-level essays are easier to read and take into account environmental policy considerations. A colour section offers maps and photos. Despite the high price, the small volume suitable for students can be used for "We consume" (2).
content.title_en: Focus: Natural resources : in search of raw materials

content.text: Technical reports : intelligible structure, well-designed, convincing presentation. Guidance on professional and norm-oriented design of technical reports in writing and as presentation. Helpful for studies and practice in technology, natural sciences and computer science. (2)
content.title_en: Technical reports : easy to understand, good to design, convincing to present

content.text: The primary school is developing. The school reforms implemented in many Länder also concern primary schools, which are subject to two visible changes in the course of which. On the one hand, primary schools are becoming more and more common as full-time schools, which is intended to reduce social disparities in the first years of schooling. On the other hand, the initial phase of the school is being made more flexible, thereby enabling children to learn individually. However, these measures do not yet sufficiently know which processes are triggered by this in the schools and which effects result from the changes in structures.
content.title_en: Primary school is developing

content.text: Adaptive windows for duplicate detection. Duplicate detection describes the finding of multiple data sets representing the same real world object. This task is not trivial, as (i) the data sets may differ slightly, so that similarity measures are needed for a pair-wise comparison, and (ii) due to the data set a complete pair-wise comparison is not possible. To solve the second problem, there are different algorithms that partition the data set and only make comparisons within the partitions. One of these algorithms is the Sorted Neighborhood Method (SNM), which sorts data by key and then passes a window over the sorted data. Comparisons are only carried out within this window. We describe different variations of the Sorted Neighborhood method based on varying window sizes. These approaches are based on the intuition that areas with larger and smaller similarities exist within the sorted data sets, for which correspondingly larger or smaller window sizes are useful. We describe and evaluate different adaptation strategies as being verifiable in terms of the same type of the original method.
content.title_en: Adaptive windows for duplicate detection

content.text: Technical Biooils : Basics - Products - General Conditions ; [Order No. 35]. This brochure shows what makes biolubricants, what technical characteristics they have, in which areas they are particularly used and how it is related to their environmental compatibility. However, the brochure also gives a brief overview of the legal framework conditions, the promotion and the biolubric market. And not least for practice of great importance, the brochure contains hints for an economic use of biolubricants (Source: FNR)
content.title_en: Technical Biooils : Basics - Products - General conditions ; [Order No. 35]

content.text: On the way through the universe: why physics has gone. A. Unzicker, a physicist and science journalist with a doctorate, is also working hard on modern science. According to "From Big Bang to the Big Bang" (BA 6/10), which was named the "Most Great Science Book of the Year" in 2010, he continues his criticism here. This is again about the basics and basic assumptions of physics, space, time and mass, as well as the atom, the atomic structure on the one hand and around galaxies and the cosmos as a whole. As an outsider, he is "inconsistencyless, how many speculations flood physics with senseless calculations". Intrusively, he pleads for more open research, sees the problem of research funding, because as soon as projects have to be applied for and approved, it is practically impossible "that a fundamentally new idea is present". Numerous quotes from literature support his efforts to achieve a more critical science. Finally, he advocates a broad access to all data and calls on the readers to search for open forums for the results.
content.title_en: On the wooden way through the universe: why physics has gone missing

content.text: We look forward to finding a way to make Germany fit for the future. "We are joined by a schizophrenia of consumerism and postmaterialism, a bizarre mix of material carelessness and social pressure, personal optimism of the future and diffuse fear of the future, political alienation and the awareness that everything cannot remain as it is
content.title_en: We look forward to finding out how Germany will become deceptive

content.text: No fear of Linux, Unix : a textbook for Linux and Unix users. After 11 years of pause, a classic of UNIX literature is reissued in a highly revised form in view of the unbroken demand. The fact that Linux is now called UNIX in the title shows the development that the related operating systems have taken in the meantime. Compared to the 10th edition (BA 8/02; replace now) of course, some of the updating needs have arisen, and now a first entry into system management is offered. Overall, the scope has increased by a good 50 pages. Basically, the introduction is designed as a basic and development course in computer science studies, but is also very suitable as an initial step for interested Linux users of all kinds, who not only want to work in the basics of configuration and application, but also the various possibilities of shell programming or graphical user interfaces.
content.title_en: Don't worry about Linux, Unix : a textbook for Linux and Unix users

content.text: Photovoltaics: [Buildings provide electricity]. In the foreword of the 6th edition (BA 5/10) the framework conditions for the solar industry were literally sunnier. Meanwhile the author points out that the construction of a photovoltaic system is still worthwhile despite falling funding, but that the domestic solar industry is experiencing difficult times due to competitive pressure and sales capping. The book is mainly aimed at all those who are involved in the planning and construction of a photovoltaic system and can also be used by students and trainees. It offers a complete overview from the current market situation to the planning, construction and commissioning up to the future perspective. New focus lies on law and norms, self-consumption and economic efficiency. In addition, the volume provides current figures and facts, vivid illustrations, checklists and literature data, but no factual register. With similar page numbers, the format has been enlarged and readability improved. In addition to T. Seltmann (ID-A 26/11, now 4th edition 2013). As a supplement or better substitute for the preliminary requirement. (2) (LK/LEV: Junker) Bauherren, Handicrafts, Planer and Investors receive basic information about the construction and the basic conditions.
content.title_en: Photovoltaic : [Buildings supply electricity]

content.text: Technology futures: Prethinking - Creating - Evaluating. Ideas about the future development of technology and society have a central role in social technological debates and decision-making processes. Technology futures are communicated in the form of scientific expertise, among other things. As such, they receive great attention from policy makers, business and the media. Especially in the field of scientific policy advice, the authors of technology futures are thus responsible for revealing the premises and value decisions that are the basis of these technology futures. To enable an open understanding of the future living conditions in society, technology futures have to be transparently designed. With this guide acatech offers all those who deal with technology futures in science, business, politics and society.
content.title_en: Technology futures : Prethinking - Creating - Evaluating

content.text: Competition for resources: conflicts over climate, water and soil. Climate, water and soil are equally indispensable as well as endangered resources of humanity. What happens when a competition is set on fire for their use? What conflicts can arise from this? Internationally renowned experts investigate the question of how resource conflicts and resource scarcity affect domestic and global levels and investigate exemplary forms of cooperation and conflict resolution. Their contributions reflect the insights and perspectives of different disciplines: The book covers political, economic, economic and social geography, international, regional and theological-normative aspects - and thus opens up a highly topical field of peace and conflict research.
content.title_en: Competition for resources : conflicts over climate, water and soil

content.text: In the area of the former GDR not only Wartburg and Trabant were driving: In the course of so-called compensation shops vehicles from Eastern Bloc countries were imported time and again. Of course, only a few lucky people were able to enjoy the highly sought-after goods, usually the need carriers and functionaries had the first access to the Skoda, Tatra, Lada and as they were all called. Excellently illustrated, this volume shows the most beautiful and unusual vehicles in the workers' and peasants' state, which were the ones that animated the streetscape in East Germany.
content.title_en: Cars in the GDR : Import vehicles

content.text: Garden experts and their green knowledge. There are already some titles on the subject ("Flower women and their extraordinary gardens", ID-G 5/11; "Gartners", BA 2/09), but no overlaps. After a brief review of large garden ladies of England 11 garden ambassadors with their different trainings, experiences and professional skills are presented in selected projects: e.g. Countess Bernadotte (Island Mainau), Viktoria von dem Bussche (Schloss Ippenburg), Heike Boomgaarden and others with the innovative "urban farming" (the "Essbar City" Andernach), Sabine Reber and her mobile garden, the "Baum-Finder" Katharina von Ehren. In this context, the editor, K. Lammerting, will present her garden in Cologne again (see "A garden full of imagination", ID-G 40/12). Practical advice on varieties and care will be given by everyone. The gardens in this book are artistically and architecturally different, offering space for beauty, peace and order.
content.title_en: Garden experts and their green knowledge

content.text: 50 key ideas architecture. Wilkinson, known for its entertaining first information "World-famous buildings in detail" (ID-A 9/13), now offers a starting title in Western architecture from antiquity to today, which is knowledgeable and substantial, not only in terms of description but also in terms of explanation, in all the shortness of the 4-page articles. It mainly includes styles and epochs, but also material concepts such as taste or restoration and currents such as the garden city movement. The design with loose text, striking quotations, high-profile info blocks and continuous timeline has been retained. The popular science work with attractive cover design complements as an overview well "100 ideas change architecture" (ID-B 50/11), which goes more into details that were preparing at the respective time, and is to be placed on a level with "architecture" (Dorling Kindersley; BA 4/07), Christoph Höcker (BA 7/08) "SID-A-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-M-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-
content.title_en: 50 Key Ideas Architecture

content.text: MATLAB compact: [MATLAB and Simulink examples]. MATLAB is a comprehensive manual of the experienced MATLAB trainer W. Schweizer (1st edition: ID-G 52/05, Release 7.0) which describes all MATLAB application possibilities and is now available in a significantly extended and updated version. The presentation is now based on version 8.0 (release 2012b), but also takes into account deviations that the previous versions brought with them. On the subject of last update: A. Bosl: "Introduction to MATLAB, Simulink" (ID-G 35/12, suitable for beginners, but also less comprehensively priced); the classic "MATLAB - Simulink - Stateflow" (7th edition: ID-G 4/12, allows the graphical extensions to be extended); "MATLAB and Simulink" from O. Beucher (introductory version: GID-G13, available for use).
content.title_en: MATLAB compact : [MATLAB and Simulink examples]

content.text: The dictionary of the PC terms: now with correct pronunciation; [all important computer terms and abbreviations especially for PC beginners and seniors]. Continuously revised and updated edition of an introduced lexicon. Compared to the pre-release (BA 6/10) 1,000 new entries have been added. At the same time numerous outdated technical terms have been removed. The evidence is fed from the areas PC, mobile devices, consoles, Internet and social networks. At the quality of the texts nothing has changed: short, reduced to the essential information, in part acronyms are only dissolved, technical details are omitted. A reference system leads to related or further entries. In part cryptic error messages are also resolved. At the end again 3 attachments to file extensions, top-level domains and Netlingo (common abbreviations from the net world). Target group are computer users without special IT knowledge. Pre-release. In addition to C. Prevezanos (ID-A 46/12). (2 A)
content.title_en: The dictionary of the PC terms : now with correct pronunciation ; [all important computer terms and abbreviations especially for PC beginners and seniors]

content.text: Handbook Mediatektur : Design media, space and interaction as a unit : Methods and instruments. Theme pavilions, exhibitions, museums, flagship stores, showrooms, stages, experience stagings, space installations - everywhere we meet the challenge of understanding media, architecture, interaction and narration together with the visitors as a unit and to design and implement accordingly. The Handbook Mediatektur shows methods and instruments of this practice, illustrates design and production processes and offers the necessary foundations and criteria to master projects in design, organizational and economic terms. The book also sees itself as a contribution to the academic development of this interdisciplinary design field. It is aimed at students as well as professionals from art and culture, event management, architecture and scenography, curatorial practice as well as exhibition, media and experiential design. Exhibition design. Exhibition design.
content.title_en: Manual Mediatectur : Designing media, space and interaction as a unit : Methods and instruments

content.text: Material use of renewable raw materials : Basics - Materials - Applications ; with 128 tables. The introduction to the extraction, processing and use of renewable resources as chemical materials is aimed at experts and students of process, material, bio and environmental technology. The occurrence in nature or the production of materials, structure and properties, applications as well as economic and ecological aspects are treated and thus a holistic presentation of the area is given. An extensive introduction and the focus-like deepening of various questions in the respective material chapters show the complex boundary conditions to which this field of technology is subject.
content.title_en: Material use of renewable raw materials : Basics - Materials - Applications ; with 128 tables

content.text: General and inorganic chemistry : an introduction. Structured according to the periodic table of the elements, the elements of the main groups, then the secondary groups (properties, occurrences, extraction, use) as well as atomic models (bohrs and wave mechanics) are presented. Chemical arithmetic is explained by examples. This clearly written, with clear explanations, introduction to the basics of chemistry is suitable for students of chemistry in the bachelor's degree programme, students with a minor subject or teaching position chemistry and chemistry teachers. Also recommended for students and trainees (corresponding natural science disciplines) in addition to other teaching materials
content.title_en: General and inorganic chemistry : an introduction

content.text: The modernist and vagants of the modern era (1500-1933) were considered a serious problem by the alms-gathering and wandering poor. They disrupted the good police order, violated the work morale, even appeared as a danger to public security. This edition brings together 257 documents from the German space, which reflect the social handling of beggars, vagabonds, gypsies and crooks during the well-known four centuries between 1500 and 1933. They show astonishing continuity in the perception of these groups, but also transformations in their composition and in the manner they were described, explained and disciplined. Above all, they illustrate the persistent brisance of the phenomenon over all historical fences. Again and again, until the world economic crisis of the 1930s, contemporary comments speak of a threatening overhandling of bettel and vagabondage, by documenting the volume not only norms and abstract discourses, but also a strong emphasis on the everyday life, but also illustrated the ambiless and the medialized representation, and the ubiquitous reactions were always possible in the modern era.
content.title_en: Beggars and Vagants in the Modern Age (1500-1933) : an commented source edition

content.text: Lightroom 5 : my workflow with the modules library, development and map. Lightroom has developed into a editing program, which is not necessary for some image editing in Photoshop. Besides RAW development, image management is the main strength of Lightroom. Therefore, the press photographer focuses on "his" modules - library and development - because here the actual music plays. The workflows are presented in detail. Plug-ins, if they can be a valuable addition, are also presented. Sensually constructed and very well described in the practical chapters also the new functions (area repair brush, perspective corrections) from version 5 are treated. If you are looking for an entry that discusses all modules, better access Torsten Kieslich (in this no.). Otherwise a clear recommendation for this practice book. (2)
content.title_en: Lightroom 5 : my workflow with the modules library, development and map

content.text: Driverless transport systems : a fib - with practical applications - to technology - for planning ; with numerous tables. History, technology, application of flat-line conveyor systems with automatically controlled vehicles. These systems were introduced in Europe for rationalization reasons in the 1960s, but only in the 1990s more widely used and are now available in the beverage and building materials industry as well as in hospitals
content.title_en: Driverless transport systems : a fibel - with practical applications - to technology - for planning ; with numerous tables

content.text: Stochastik in den Ingenieurwissenschaften : an introduction with R. Introduction to probability calculation and statistics for engineers and scientists. (LK/SH: Preisler) Based on a lecture script, an introduction to probability calculation and statistics for engineers and scientists. The 1st part is dedicated to the presentation of concrete questions of stochastics in engineering sciences and descriptive statistics, with which data from random processes are evaluated. The 2nd part provides basics for the description of random phenomena and probability theory as well as simulation using the freely available statistics software R. Each chapter is provided online with exercise tasks, solutions and other R programs. Lecture accompanying, in self-study and as reference work. With further literature in the text and in the appendix. For subject stocks. (3) (LK/SH: Preisler)
content.title_en: Stochastics in Engineering: an introduction with R

content.text: Expert knowledge on environmental technology. Understandable introduction and textbook for future specialists and practitioners as well as students in the field of environmental engineering. (LK/SH: Preisler) The finely structured textbook is aimed at future specialists and practitioners in the field of the 4 new environmental engineering professions (in waste management, wastewater engineering, water supply, pipe, canal and industrial service), but also at environmental protection assistants, laboratory technicians and students at specialized and universities as understandable introduction. Structured according to the learning fields of the teaching professions, the new edition deals with topics such as: environmental analysis, power supply network and power generation, energy saving, basics of control technology, wastewater purification, flue gas desulphurization, automation etc. Publisher typical layout with numerous colored illustrations, graphics, glossary and register. The enclosed CD-ROM (single license) contains the solutions to the questions listed in the book for repetition and deepening. Should already be offered from medium stocks in the current edition.
content.title_en: Environmental technology expertise

content.text: Opening up the residential area to old age: development of a communication information infrastructure to bridge structural holes in the social area. The focus is on older people who are retired in their private life, are little involved in local relationship networks and are not yet reached by information and offers from the old people's welfare agencies. For these people, the idea of a "communicative information infrastructure" has been developed in the social area of the residential area and district. The infrastructure model is intended to avoid such people getting caught up in emergency situations unrecognized, but also to ensure that they are continuously informed about opportunities for successfully coping with their living situation. The book describes the developed model and the experiences with the practical implementation. The model shows perspectives for social planning that between private living in old age and public services of general interest of old age can be effectively communicated.
content.title_en: Opening of the residential area to old age : Development of a communication information infrastructure to bridge structural holes in the social area

content.text: Innovation finance for SMEs: specific features and opportunities in the eastern Länder; summary of the research project 2009-2012. The present study deals with the business characteristics of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in eastern Germany, which are also shown in the financing. The research shows that the insufficient innovation dynamics of eastern Germany is not only a cyclical or even mental phenomenon, but a structural one. The analysis underlines a special need for action in the eastern Länder, since on the one hand small enterprises are present in large numbers, also the middle class is largely established overall, but in East-West comparison still established large companies are found as partners less frequently and cause a positive charisma effect on medium-sized subcontracting enterprises. Also in Germany-East the financing ratio is special, i.e. the proportion of external financing is differentiated. Accordingly, the „Hausbank" should be able to test the outstanding importance of the medium-sized enterprises due to its structural funding. The financing weaknesses shown here again are valid for SMEs in principle, but especially for smaller SMEs in the east, where the equity ratio has grown, but the debt ratio is partly the debt financing with partial support of the private debt.
content.title_en: Innovation funding for SMEs : Special features and opportunities in the eastern German states ; Summary of the research project 2009-2012

content.text: Chemical treats. No trace of boredom, but a lot of reading fun and, by the way, something else about chemistry is learned? Klaus Roth succeeds in doing this like no other. He doesn't only explain it; he makes chemistry alive with all its funny, serious and fascinating sides! Let yourself be taken on a colorfully illustrated, wild ride through chemistry. But take a sip of fresh water before: The journey is long, but never boring. But stop! Please don't use normal water:Energetic, vitalized, clustered, stretched, lively and right-turning it must be - or is all this just hocuspocus?
content.title_en: Chemical delicacies

The majority of women in the majority of the population are over-represented in the majority of the population.
