content.title_en: The betrayed generation: what we expect women to do in the middle of life

content.text: Business Administration Methods : Manual for Studies and Practice. Michael Nagel, Professor at the Duale Hochschule Baden-Württemberg, and Christian Mieke, Professor at the University of Applied Sciences Brandenburg, present a reference work on common business tools, methods and problem solving approaches. The author duo breaks down the presented methods according to value-added areas: research and development, procurement and logistics, production, marketing and sales, strategic analysis and planning as well as organization. Within the individual chapters, the respective tools are presented on several pages according to a uniform structure and are described intelligibly. Thus, the respective contents, objectives and applications are presented appropriately. The title is rounded off by a glossary and an extensive bibliography. Overall, this is a good, but also quite expensive overview, which is particularly suitable for beginners or beginners.
content.title_en: Business Administration Methods : Manual for Studies and Practice

content.text: HTML5 and CSS3 for dummies: [Webdesign is not magic - with HTML5 and CSS3 ; at a glance: combine the advantages of HTML5 and CSS3 ; design beautiful and functional websites ; implement media files, forms and geolocation ; with many inspirational ideas and code examples ; completely in color]. A practical reading for web designers who want to learn about the current status of HTML5 and CSS3 and apply these standards already. You can find out here, among other things, how to integrate videos, animations and other media into websites.
content.title_en: HTML5 and CSS3 for dummies: [Webdesign is not magic - with HTML5 and CSS3 ; at a glance: combine the advantages of HTML5 and CSS3 ; design beautiful and functional websites ; implement media files, forms and geolocation ; with many inspirational ideas and code examples ; completely in color]

content.text: The community-wide-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-community-common-common-comm-comm-common-common-common-common-community-community-community-community-community-community-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-common-
content.title_en: Sustainable settlement ecosystems : planning, conversion and operation ; a user manual

content.text: Manual on Environmental Management. In a compact form, this manual provides the necessary knowledge for the operational, sustainable environmental management. It is designed as a reference work for the introduction and continuation of an environmental management system. In addition, it can be used as a textbook on the basic aspects of environmental management.
content.title_en: Manual on Operational Environmental Management

content.text: 50 key ideas of the future. What does the world look like in 2020? And what about 2050 or even 2100? Will we still start families at 70 or 80 years old? Will we have found beings on strange stars? Does each tree have its own IP address?
content.title_en: 50 key ideas of the future

content.text: 3D printing: how generative manufacturing technology works. How does 3D printing work? What is 3D printing technology for? What does 3D printing mean for individuals? What social and economic changes will be made by this future technology? The author gives answers to these questions. It introduces precisely and easily into the ever more popular 3D printing technology. Readers will thus be able to apply 3D printing themselves. They will learn to try out free software or perhaps even use a 3D printer themselves in one of the ever-increasing open workshops (fab labs).
content.title_en: 3D printing: how generative manufacturing technology works

content.text: The use of technology was a major factor in the development of information and communication technologies, and the idea of a suitable medium. This has changed with the use of computer technology. More often, personal, social, aesthetic and playful dimensions are brought to the fore. The use of modern gadgets (smartphone, PC tablet & co.) with their versatile possibilities is playful and thus conceals effort and time expenditure. Modern technology use appears to be self-determined. Increasingly, members of society are making temporal, financial and social expenditures in order to be constantly accessible and ready to act. One of the consequences of technological everyday action is a stronger accentuation of "now", as well as the increased importance of aesthetics, convenience and emotion. The "rational" purpose-determined use of apparatus thus enters the background, as well as the role of technology as an instrument of standardization and effectivisation. Without technical networking, modern everyday life would not function. The sensitivity to the social consequences of technology, e.g. its controlling and restrictive function, has become the basis for everyday life, and technology forms everyday life.
content.title_en: Shadow Games - Technology Forms Everyday Life

content.text: Constructing with SolidWorks. SolidWorks is a 3-D design software that allows the creation of parametric models, assemblies and drawings. The present work provides an introduction to virtual construction - the so-called Mechanical CAD (MCAD) - and the introduction to the program. 13 detailed, color illustrated workshops represent the many possibilities, whereby the current version 2014 is used for construction, but the examples can also be edited with the previous versions of the program since 2004 - which therefore do not have to be separated yet (5th edition, here last 4th edition: ID-G 49/09). The DVD supplement contains the exercise and result files of the examples in both the current format and the previous formats. Suitable for self-study, as a reference work and as an accompaniment for training and study. (3) (LK/SH: Preisler) Entry into the program for 3-D CAD with numerous examples of image and design. (LK/SH: Preisler)
content.title_en: Constructing with SolidWorks

content.text: The devilishly good web design: how to tempt your customers. Your customers should love your website? Feeling really comfortable there - doing what you want? In a furious mix of psychology, marketing and design Chris Nodder shows you how it works. He speaks out what we all know: we have small weaknesses. We want to be part of it, get things for free, not have to put too much effort into us, not have to say no and much more. Building on these small weaknesses, he gives you easy-to-use design patterns that will make your website particularly enjoyable for your customers - or at least the activities you want your customers to do. The countless examples from all the loops of the Internet make the explanations even more vivid. After that, it is up to you: Let yourself be tempted and switch to the dark side of power with your new knowledge or use it for the benefit of humanity? (publishing text)
content.title_en: Devilishly good web design : how to tempt your customers

content.text: Structurae Project Examples - Railway Bridges. "Each design task involves new challenges for the planning engineer. .
content.title_en: Structurae Project examples - Railway bridges

content.text: Poverty in welfare societies. In 11 scientific contributions on the latest state of the art, well-known experts (including Butterwegge, Hradil, Huster, Opielka) express themselves with regard to the changing manifestations of relative poverty, the public reaction, evaluation and the increasing social polarization. They are well-founded statements about child and old age poverty, health and irresponsible precariats classifications. Also approaches to self-help in lifestyle were identified. One contribution deals with European developments and dangers. With some pre-education, the individual contributions - also as a repetitory - are well understandable, but above all, an overall overview has emerged with everything that is relevant for social developments and problems. With literature lists and abstracts. (2) While poverty research has long been only a topic of marginal group research, poverty has long become the central topic of social structure and inequality research. It has the impression that poverty is becoming increasingly consolidated in our society. At the same time, salaries and tidalisms in executive days and the immensely unequal distribution of the money, real estate and productive assets continue to profit from the precarious labour market.
content.title_en: Poverty in affluent societies

content.text: Coursebook Climate Adaptation : Options for action for the Hamburg Metropolitan Region. The coursebook is aimed at employees at all levels of administration in offices, authorities and industry-specific chambers and associations as well as non-governmental organisations, such as environmental associations or initiatives.
content.title_en: Kursbuch Klimaadaptation : Options for action for the Hamburg Metropolitan Region

content.text: Jane Jacobs and the future of the city: Discourses - Perspectives - Paradigm Change. Publisher's info: After the lamented "crisis of the city" is currently often referred to as a "Renaissance of the city". Jane Jacobs is considered in this context to be a major fighter for city and urban life as well as an icon of "urban planning from below". Her first-time death and life of large American cities, published in 1961, is still available in new editions and has since been translated into many languages. Her resistance to large-scale urban development projects in New York and Toronto has also made her an "Urban Guru". Already during the Cold War, the urban flight and suburbanization, she proclaimed urban diversity, mix of use, compact city, participation and gentle urban renewal. The author contextualizes Jacob's work, reflects her transverse later books and analyses the power of influence that they unfolded and which resulted in a transatlantic paradigm shift in urban planning and urban renewal.
content.title_en: Jane Jacobs and the future of the city : Discourses - Perspectives - Paradigm change

content.text: Cloud storage service providers at a glance. The increasing amount of digital information is making use of cost-effective cloud storage services more and more applications. The number of providers providing these services has increased significantly in recent years. To find the right provider for an application, different criteria have to be considered individually. In this study, a selection of providers of established basic storage services is presented and compared. Criteria are extracted for comparison, which are applicable to each of the investigated providers and thus allow for an objective assessment as possible. This includes, among other things, costs, law, security, performance and interfaces provided. The presented criteria can be used to evaluate cloud storage providers regarding a specific application case.
content.title_en: Cloud storage service providers at a glance

content.text: IT management for Bachelor. Handy textbook on IT management, which can also be recommended for practitioners in the data center or IT decision-makers in the company. IT management is clear at the latest since the "Cloud": IT services are delivered, purchased, rented, etc. Both perspectives - buyers and providers of IT services - are responsible for IT management, and this textbook offers students in economics, computer science or engineering subjects a compact and yet complete entry at a reasonable price. After an introductory basic chapter, the topics IT strategy, budget & resources, IT services & processes, governance, risk & compliance as well as finally IT security are covered. All important topics are represented, whether IT controlling, business process modelling, project management or possible organizational structures of an IT department. Numerous black-and-white graphics, info boxes and graphs give an overview, but with a weak, because much too few keyword lists. Nevertheless, recommended from medium libraries and also suitable for practitioners in the data center or IT decision-maker. (2)
content.title_en: IT Management for Bachelor

content.text: Legal expert report style : a teaching and work book. Learning and work book, which not only introduces law students to the writing style, but also informs them in terms of content about the structure and structure of expert reports. Review : The book of the lecturer at Bielefeld University is in the best sense a teaching and work book. It not only introduces the writing style of the report, but also illuminates the content of the expert report statements. It deals with questions such as: "Why do I draw a syllogistic conclusion for what?", "Why do I make a top sentence?", "How do I develop a definition?". Finally, the author draws her attention to the specificities of criminal, civil and public legal reports. Students are directly asked to work on the short exercises in the book. Therefore, entries are to be counted. The solutions to the tasks are to be found in the appendix. The title should be offered wherever law students belong to the clientele. A comparison title is not known. (2)
content.title_en: Legal advice: a textbook

content.text: We have rebuilt: women of the hour nil. In today's Germany, the ruins cannot even be imagined, on which reconstruction began after the war - by women of a generation who will no longer exist in a few years. Their life paths dictated unimaginable things today, all the more touched when they smile at the cameras emaciated and heavily laboured. The picture-text-band documents an impressive piece of our story. He tells of escape, displacement and death, of survival in the winter of hunger 1946/47, "stopping" on harvested fields, of unfathomable housing shortage, coals smuggled into briefcases, imaginative clothing recycling and food (liver sausage from flour and marjoram! At the griesspoilers, Kasseler was introduced) and of disappointment about returning, alienated husbands. Shocking, touching stories of need and awakening and very different experiences and social developments in East and West. This book belongs to all libraries! (1 S)
content.title_en: We have rebuilt : Telling women of the hour zero

content.text: Guide to the renovation of facades for non-residential buildings: [building physical requirements and cost-effectiveness]. "Office buildings, schools, sports halls and hotels were selected from the variety of possible building types and uses. For these building uses, the impact of energy efficiency measures with the focus on the building facade is shown, the effect of accompanying effects such as sound protection or air quality is shown, as well as planning and execution instructions given."-
content.title_en: Guide to the renovation of facades for non-residential buildings : [building physical requirements and cost-effectiveness]

content.text: Incident Management : Successfully fix complex malfunctions in IT. The author shows how complex malfunctions in IT can be successfully managed and corrected. This book is addressed to full-time information service providers who support organizational processes in companies
content.title_en: Incident Management : Successfully fix complex malfunctions in IT

content.text: Electromobility in urban and transport planning: practical experience from model regions and other knowledge needs. The brochure is a component of the accompanying research on the topic "urban development and transport planning". It offers a systematic review of previous approaches and highlights the fields of action that are essential for anchoring electric mobility at municipal level. This includes the concrete fields of application of electric vehicles (e-commercial transport, municipal commercial vehicles, vehicles of the public transport company, car sharing, bike sharing) as well as the integration of this new drive technology into municipal mobility strategies as well as urban development and urban planning. The focus of the study was explicitly on urban planning and municipally relevant aspects of the projects considered, even if they often pursued other or broader research priorities.
content.title_en: Electromobility in urban and transport planning: practical experience from model regions and further knowledge needs

content.text: Data analysis with SAS: statistical methods and their graphical aspects. The program package "Statistical Analysis System" developed about 40 years ago runs on all common operating systems for large computers and PCs. For this 3rd, completely updated edition of the 2004 published work, the current version 9.3 for Windows is now used. In some places sub-chapters were added, otherwise the basic concept remained the same. "First, the authors provide a thorough introduction to the structures and operations of the system, placing great emphasis on the graphical possibilities. A streamlined summary of core areas of descriptive and inductive statistics follows as a main part a basic and at the same time practical representation of manifold procedures and applications using SAS. A reader should be familiar with the general mathematical foundations. Apart from students of higher semesters, the focus is on demanding users of statistical procedures in practice" (Wolfgang Grölz). If necessary, the current version should be offered. (3)
content.title_en: Data analysis with SAS : statistical methods and their graphic aspects

content.text: The thermofluid mechanics is an interface for the well-known physical fields of thermodynamics and fluid mechanics as well as their technical applications. The author, professor for this cross-sectional area at the TU Hamburg-Harburg and by several relevant textbooks (e.g. "Technische Thermodynamik", BA 8/07), presents 50 phenomena of everyday life (e.g. about the drop of tea or coffee pot), which are divided into 4 topics ("house and garden", "drinks and beverages" ...) , clearly explained, supplemented by further reflections and illustrated by illustrations and tables. The book addresses students, professionals and technically interested lay people and offers a comprehensible course, which - at least in the further consideration - requires concentrated thought and physical preliminary knowledge. In the appendix a glossary of physical terms. Without a register. Recommendable, widely applicable addition to the relevant textbook literature, e.g. to W. Bohl (ID-B 24/14), D. Labuhn (BAuß 6) or the above is the subject of the thermofluthic dynamics.
content.title_en: Oh, that's it! : Fifty thermofluid dynamic everyday phenomena in principle and scientifically explained

content.text: Wind turbines and land-use planning areas. Wind energy is of the greatest importance in the context of the energy transition among all renewable energy sectors. A sufficient supply of planning-protected areas must be available for stable growth. The contribution focuses on the inventory of land-use planning areas for wind energy use in regional plans, the density of the building and the installed performance. The basis of the study is the spatial planning plan monitor, which is carried out in the BBSR, which contains vector data of land-use planning areas in binding regional plans, as well as a site-sharp wind turbine database built by the BBSR. This enables for the first time a nationwide geo-statistical blending of land-use planning areas and plant locations (source: Verlag).
content.title_en: Wind turbines and land-use areas

metadata.authors: Bundesinstitut für Bau-, Stadt- und Raumforschung

content.text: Balance sheet analysis and key figures : case-oriented balance sheet optimization. 'Whether it is accounted for according to HGB, IFRS or US-GAAP: much in the profit and loss account or the balance sheet is actually obvious, but not at first sight recognizable. Moreover, the total cost process loses importance on an international level, but for the German medium-sized enterprises the total cost process is clearly the better conclusion, since both the controller and the tax consultant quickly identify strengths and weaknesses and legal possibilities of intervention in the balance sheet. The work presents the legal situation before and after the BilMoG. (Verlagstext)
content.title_en: Balance sheet analysis and key figures : case-oriented balance sheet optimization

content.text: Statistics exercises : descriptive statistics, probability calculation, closing statistics. Students of the economic and social sciences who need statistical basic knowledge can prepare themselves with this exercise book for their exams. Review (ekz): The author, professor at the University of Regensburg, has compiled this accompanying volume with exercises and solutions for his 2 textbooks "Descriptive Statistics" and "Probability Calculation and Final Statistics" (Gabler, 8th edition 2013; not discussed here) . As a free additional material, the publisher also offers the learning software "PC-Statistics Trainer" via its website. The exercise book can be used by students with the necessary knowledge also independently of the textbooks for exam preparation...(3)
content.title_en: Statistics exercises : descriptive statistics, probability calculation, closing statistics

content.text: Use of nano-irons in the remediation of groundwater damage : Data sheet Nanoproducts. To remediate environmental damage, the applicability of a number of nanomaterials is investigated and tested. Initial experience exists with the application of nano-irons for the remediation of groundwater damage. The use of nano-irons in the underground (in situ) is an innovative remediation process that is in development in Germany and has only been applied in individual cases, which is why the level of experience is still relatively low. The process is currently mainly used for groundwater damage with chlorinated hydrocarbons. Under suitable conditions, it can be characterized by a high effectiveness and a short remediation period.
content.title_en: Use of nano-iron in the restoration of groundwater damage : Data sheet Nanoproducts

content.text: Security and cryptography on the Internet : Theory and practice. Lecture-oriented textbook that provides the necessary tools for both computer science students and network administrators and software developers. It explains the various security procedures (cryptographic as well as non-cryptographic) for the protection of networks (including mobile communications) and applications and presents the most important attack techniques of the hackers. The scope has grown since the pre-press (ID-G 29/10) by almost 90 pages, the contents have been restructured and brought to the current state of the art, and a chapter on the security of web applications has been added. Short keyword register, but detailed table of contents; the list of further literature and web links is 17 pages long. Smaller printing errors in the text. Demanding presentation that requires concentrated reading. In Leverkusen a very sought-after topic. (3)
content.title_en: Security and cryptography on the Internet : Theory and practice

content.text: Mathematics for Bioscientists: Basics with a focus on statistics for the Bachelor's degree. Introduction to mathematics and statistics for the Bachelor's and Teacher's degree programme with a focus on biology. Review (ekz): In order to describe observations and processes in biology quantitatively, the statistical and analytical methods of mathematics are used. Adolf Riede updated his introductory textbook of 1993 (not displayed here) and presents the second edition. More than half of the book is dedicated to statistics. In this context, elements of differential and integral calculus are embedded, which include a repetition of the school material from upper secondary school. Despite the gradual and illustrated form of presentation, the ductus remains mathematical. Thus, the volume is particularly relevant, although elementary theoretical concepts are of interest, such as in the teaching office studies with natural science combinations. It can also be used for the biological Bachelor. Titles with a stronger practical relevance (e.g. "Biostatistics", ID-G 49/12) or with a focus on evaluation software ("Parametrical Statistics", however, cannot be replaced by this.
content.title_en: Mathematics for Bioscientists : Basics with focus on statistics for the Bachelor

content.text: User and fuel influences on fine dust emissions from small combustion plants. Domestic combustions contribute to a non-negligible proportion of fine dust emissions in Germany. The aim of the present project was therefore to investigate numerous factors affecting the emission behaviour of different wood burnings and to derive recommendations for action from them. Four combustions were selected for the experimental programme: two fireplaces of different price categories, a tiled stove heater and a wood boiler. At the selected combustions, fundamental experimental methodological questions were first clarified, in order to then quantify the diverse fuel-related and user-related influences on the emissions.[...] (Source: Verf.)
content.title_en: User and fuel influences on particulate emissions from small combustion plants

content.text: AWUSYS : Development of a highly precise and time-efficient industrial balancing system. Within the framework of the project "Awusys" a highly precise and time-efficient industrial balancing system was developed interdisciplinaryly, which can implement balance corrections with highest accuracy at the same time in addition to the imbalance determination. Compared to existing systems, an accuracy in the imbalance determination should be converted from usually +/- 0.1 g to +/- 0.01 g. The same applied to the necessary mass removal and mass removal, which should be realized with an accuracy in the 1/100 range. The development of such a system was successfully implemented by the development and development of different approaches from the fields of design, software technology, measurement technology, handling technology and manufacturing technology and brought together in the form of a computer-assisted test stand.
content.title_en: AWUSYS : Development of a high-precision and time-efficient industrial balancing system

content.text: Small bathrooms: the best solutions up to 10 sqm. Professionally planned bathrooms as well as places of well-being and retreat from everyday hectic were already presented in the attractive picture-text-band "The best baths" (ID-G 17/10). The average size of the German bathroom is 7.8 sqm, therefore the present picture-text-band is dedicated to newly built and renovated small baths with areas between 3.9 and 10 sqm, which are perfectly tailored to the needs of the residents. The 47 tailor-made bathroom projects are each on 2-4 pages with short texts on the wishes of the builders, on sanitary equipment, floor plans, construction data, costs and with professional color photos presented. Short articles with planning tips for small baths, light design, sanitary products, materials as well as manufacturer directory and addresses of the bathroom designers round off the contents. The range of examples includes various materials, color designs, built-in, lighting concepts, residential styles, detail solutions and offers potential builders for conversions in stock as well as for new buildings are a recommended source of inspiration before the o.g. Nibrit title.
content.title_en: Small bathrooms : the best solutions up to 10 sqm

content.text: News-Transmission Technology : Basics, components, procedures and applications of information, communication and media technology : with 495 images as well as numerous examples, exercises and test tasks. "This 7th, newly edited edition of 'News-Transmission Technology' deals with the latest developments in information, communication and media technology. Topics such as digital modulation, processes of digital transmission, source and channel coding, encryption, error protection concepts, interfaces and transmission protocols are discussed in detail."
content.title_en: News-Transmission Technology : Basics, Components, Procedures and Applications of Information, Communication and Media Technology : with 495 images and numerous examples, exercises and test tasks

content.text: Simplified flow zone theory : based on the Zarka method. "The cyclically accumulated distortions and possibly the elastic-plastic swing widths are required for a life-time prediction of load-bearing structures, such as plant and mechanical engineering and civil engineering. The Simplified Flow Zone Theory (VFZT) is a direct method that provides estimates of these and all other mechanical sizes in the elastic and plastic state of play. The present book presents the VFZT in detail and attaches importance to the fact that not only scientists, but also engineers working in practice and students of higher semesters can get an idea of the possibilities and limits."--
content.title_en: Simplified flow zone theory : based on the Zarka method

content.text: Introduction to mathematical thinking and work : tutorial and transparent. Verl.Beschr.: You study mathematics in the first or second semester? Understanding the lectures and solving the exercises is not necessarily easy for you? You do not know exactly whether you are fit for the exam? Then this workbook can help you with basic content and study techniques in mathematics studies. The authors take deep into the know-how box and show how mathematics can be successfully studied. Based on authentic understanding problems of students, this book provides you with a rich range of materials on selected subject areas. Besides tried-and-tested texts, extensive examples as well as numerous exercise tasks and control questions (all with solutions), you will find concrete hints and concepts for reading mathematical texts, for writing these and checking your own learning situation.
content.title_en: Introduction to mathematical thinking and work : tutorial and transparent

content.text: Which heating system does the house need? : Systems of heating and ventilation technology in comparison. Facts and figures comparison of heating and ventilation systems in a newly built reference house and old buildings from the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s based on the EnEV, the KfW's guidelines and other regulations. Architects, planners and builders receive a good and fast comparison possibility for energy values, investment and consumption costs. Compared to the 2nd edition (BA 12/10) extended by some pages on ventilation measures as well as the mandatory proof of ventilation in a new building and in the renovation in the old building according to DIN 1946-6. The preliminary edition can be used with restrictions, a purchase of the new edition is recommended. (2) (LK/KA: Nibbrig) Facts and numerous comparisons of heating and ventilation systems in a newly built reference house as well as in old buildings from the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s based on the EnEV, the KfW's guidelines and other regulations for architects, building contractors and building contractors.
content.title_en: Which heating does the house need? : Heating and ventilation systems compared

content.text: The established standard work on the structure and system of media in Germany is continuously revised and updated. New is a chapter on global communication. The crisis of the media industry since the beginning of the century, the rapid structural change of the classical media press, radio and television through the digitization of communication are other important topics. The basic overview of the media landscape Germany should be present in the latest edition in many libraries. (I. Müller-Boysen) Generally understandable, fundamental introduction to the political, legal and technical development of the mass media in Germany. (I. Müller-Boysen) The continuously updated reissue of the established standard work on "functions, structures and developments" of the mass media in Germany is characterized by the perception of a media landscape that is in the deepest crisis of the post-war period. Sinking sales conditions and dramatic declines in advertising revenues lead to bankruptcies, mergers and mass redundancies. Numerous hopes that the industry, for example in pay TV and online offerings, have proved to be an illusion. Hermann Meyn, who over a decade of chairman of the German journalist's band, did not leave this area of media unresolved since 2001 and the university professors.
content.title_en: Mass media in Germany

content.text: Satellites: since 1957. The US National Space Science Data Center currently counts about 7,000 spacecraft launched since 1957. Here 40 civilian and military Earth satellites are presented representatively. (Rolf Becker-Friedrich) The US National Space Science Data Center currently counts about 7,000 spacecraft launched since 1957; among them also spacecraft that have left the Earth's orbit (Eugen Reichl: ID-A 3/12) and those that have simply crashed (or have been forced to crash as defective or outdated). Regarding manned vehicles and feeders to the ISS, 40 earth satellites are presented representatively here, military and civilian (news, weather, GPS, telescopes, communication, observation, surveillance, research, etc.) of all nations, from 1 kg to 7 tons of heavy high-performance communication satellites. Sputnik, Telstar, Intelsat, Meteosat, Envisat are likely to be a lot of a term, more may be known to the broad audience, but not of great significance.
content.title_en: Satellites : since 1957

content.text: Methods of empirical social research. Textbook with the emphasis of the presentation on the attempt to mediate a link between sociological theory and empirical social research. (LK/GÖ: Vetter) Introduced textbook (last ID-G 10/05) which focuses on the attempt to mediate a link between sociological theory and empirical social research. For this edition, the subchapter "Critical Psychology" was deleted, the chapter "Science Theory" reorganized and the part for "Content Analysis" completely revised. Internet links were updated, cited data continued and newer literature incorporated. More detailed, but also theoretical than Michael Häder: "Empirical Social Research" (here last BA 3/07), which conveys corresponding basic knowledge on the basis of numerous examples. "Very clear design and good possibility to look at certain methods. - For students" (Silke Reimers, ID-G 7/99). - Exchange of the preliminary edition is desirable, but not mandatory. (3) (LK/GÖ: Vetter)
content.title_en: Methods of empirical social research

content.text: The discovery of the Indivisible: Quantum, Quarks and the discovery of the Higgs particle. When the first edition of the book appeared (BA 12/10), the Large Hadron Collider had just been put into operation. Shortly thereafter, in July 2012, the discovery of the long-sought Higgs particle was reported, which finally completed the standard model of particle physics. Reason enough to revise and expand the text for a second edition especially in this section, as well as to make further minor updates and corrections. However, in the meantime, a whole series of books on the discovery of the Higgs particle and the way there have been published (e.g. R. Vaas: "From God's particle to the world formula", ID-A 6/14, "The discovery of the Higgs particle", ID-A 50/13, B. Lemmer: "Bis(s) into the inside of the proton"), so that the range of comparable titles is greater. Topics here are the development of atomic physics from the antiquity to the 20th century, the relativity and quantum theory, the theory of the Mügium, the theory of the theory of the classical particle.
content.title_en: The discovery of the indivisible: Quantum, Quark and the discovery of the Higgs particle

content.text: Whom does the future belong? : you are not the customer of the Internet companies, you are their product. After the Internet pioneer Lanier recently saw our individuality threatened by applications like Facebook and demanded a digital emancipation (see "Gadget", ID-B 47/10), he now advocates an end to the prevailing free culture on the Internet. He moans that just the big network companies like Google or again Facebook make much profit with the data of their users, which they there completely for nothing. Consequently, this would mean that the companies would have to pay for our data as we did for the use of the services. Moreover, Lanier warns against the destruction of many jobs by a software, which soon dominates all industries of the economy. For this thesis he strives to see the example of the company Kodak, which once employed over 140,000 employees and was worth 28 billion dollars, before the invention of digital photography. Their standard is now Instagram, which with its just 13 employees was sold recently for 1 billion dollars to Facebook. An important, wider discussion about the issue can be received by the users of the Internet. (2) (Rouvian wants to pay for the Internet-Rounian) The Internet-Rounian too.
content.title_en: Who owns the future? : you are not the customer of the Internet companies, you are their product

content.text: The Roman city: a short history. Most Roman foundations are based on firm patterns. Which are and how these are partly also in difficult terrain, although cleverly varied, but nevertheless considered, runs as a red thread through the representation of rather small scale. Nevertheless, sufficient information is provided. Focus on the essentials while simultaneously illustrated by typical examples demonstrate the great expertise of the author, former director of the German Archaeological Institute in Rome. He breaks his writing chronologically according to the time of the Republic, the Imperial Age and the higher Imperial Age. The difference between the colonial foundations and the city of Rome itself is well elaborated. On the one hand, the book is more than an archaeological guide to the ancient sites treated, on the other hand, it is worth consulting it before a trip, unless one interferes with the few Latin terms. Many understandable basic outlines are also for the city of Rome. For the city of Rome, F. Coarelli (ID-A 41/13) and even more special "The Roman Forum" (ID-G 15/12) are recommended. (2) (Olaf Kaptein) representation of social planner principles of the Roman city of Rome (Ancient) and of Rome.
content.title_en: The Roman City : a short history

content.text: Amazon: the book as a booty. Even if the online retailer Amazon does not even exist for 20 years, he has already revolutionized people's shopping habits. Customers appreciate its inexpensive and almost complete product range, the independent product evaluations of other buyers as well as the uncomplicated exchange options. And since the company usually even promises a delivery by the next working day, many prefer the convenient mouse click to the stressful shopping. But the appearance of the beautiful new goods world is deceptive. Behind the facade of Amazon's online shop hides a world of precarious working conditions. The low price for the convenient shopping in the net pay mainly those who are responsible for the logistics and shipping of the goods.About Amazon has recently been published a lot. The present pocket book is a good, perhaps necessary supplement to B. Stone: "Allesverscheller" (ID-A 48/13), R. Brandt: "Eine Klick" (ID-B 31/13), C. Knop: "Amazon knows you already" (ID-B 31/13). Leisegang is an editor of the reputable "Blätter für deutsche und einer Beschal gebtragbar einen", the book has been stopped.
content.title_en: Amazon : the book as prey

content.text: The global surveillance: the case of Snowden, the American intelligence services and the consequences. In June 2013, Glenn Greenwald published the first NSA documents from the archives of whistleblower Edward Snowden. Since then, more and more threatening details of the global spy system of the American intelligence services are revealed. Now, based on a plethora of exclusive, never previously published secret documents, Greenwald brings to light the full extent of mass surveillance. Everything and everyone is being spoofed out, the population is under collective suspicion. Freedom of opinion is suppressed in the name of security, and there is no privacy - nowhere else Edward Snowden met in Hong Kong with documentary filmmaker Laura Poitras and the lawyer and journalist Glenn Greenwald and thus brought the NSA affair into play. Glenn Greenwald has now written a book about the "Snowden case" in which he extensively reports on the background. Chronically, starting with the first, covert contact attempts of Snowden, which had almost failed on Greenwald's disinterest, up to Snowden's flight to Moscow, he writes an intriguably about the incident, and the incident of the High-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-Rang-S.-S.
content.title_en: Global surveillance: the Snowden case, the American intelligence services and the consequences

content.text: Developing Android apps: Concept, programming and marketing; from design to setting up on Google Play and Co.; developing native apps for Android; developing is not enough: marketing apps properly. Apps for Android, an open source operating system for mobile devices of market-dominating importance, are becoming more and more important for the two large app stores of Apple and Google. A good introduction to programming these apps for beginners gives D. Louis (ID-A 4/13); a comprehensive compendium is R. Meier (ID-A 49/13). This book is recommended by additional extensive versions also for marketing these apps. Beginners are addressed without any prior knowledge. Chapter 1 deals with the differences that need to be considered in programming for mobile devices compared to programming for desktop devices and servers. Chapter 2 deals with the actual programming (in Java) and the tools needed for this (Android Studio, Android SDK), based on examples. Chapter 3 deals with marketing (appstore optimization, targeted advertising, search engine optimization). Good is also built up from testing to using a Java application's own application (in Java) and the application's own application section.
content.title_en: Developing Android apps: Design, programming and marketing; from design to setting up on Google Play and Co.; how to develop native apps for Android; Developing is not enough: marketing apps properly

content.text: Wikingerschiffen. The author, already published in the GDR (after studying ship-engine engineering until 1990, who was working accordingly; here, "Normannschiffen", BA 9/87), describes after an introduction to the history of the Nordmen and their shipbuilding trade the current state of knowledge about the mining of long- and transport ships in Norway, Denmark and Schleswig-Holstein (including the Oseberg ship and the vehicles presented in the Danish Roskilde exemplary), their archaeological investigation and the findings gained thereby on construction and operation (each ship is presented with a data sheet in an introductory manner).The information of the factual text, even for non-specialized, well-readable text, is well illustrated by fittingly placed, partly double-sided color images (including the replicas), cracks and graphics. With glossary and bibliography (numerous references to English publications and Scandinavian languages), but without factual registers. - As currently only, attractively designed and suitable for wide interest groups, the title on the subject: (2) (Wei) depicting the excavations of ships from the Viking period and the German Shipyard.
content.title_en: Viking ships

content.text: The golden age of aviation. The aircraft has become a mass means of transport today. With cheap companies it is possible to reach far-off destinations for little money. But from the late 1940s to the 1970s flying was an exclusive pleasure for wealthy people who were offered a perfect service, good food, comfortable seats and even a bar in the first class. The journalist Borgmann draws a comprehensive picture of this - also because of the good profits of the companies - called "golden". He describes the change from propeller aircraft to jet, legendary constructions like the "Comet" or the "Caravelle", the development of Lufthansa and other companies and much more. The very informative text is illustrated by excellently selected pictures of aircraft and airports, aircraft production, passengers and flight personnel, historical advertising and other. Smoking was allowed! An outstanding aviation history, which can be recommended even small stocks. Comprehensive e.g. R. Niccoli: "Air travel" (ID-B 4/14). Cross format. (1) (Rolf Raschka comprehensively illustrated the late-year in aviation) The late-year in the year was the year in the year in the year in which the aviation.
content.title_en: The Golden Age of Aviation

content.text: The world of raw materials: deposits, extraction and economic aspects. Comprehensive description of the formation of deposits and the availability of mineral raw materials (e.g. ores or industrial minerals), fossil energy sources and mass raw materials (stones and earths). Economic and ecological aspects. (Ingrid Rall-Haiss) The very informative and understandable non-fiction book of the two mineralogens Neukirchen ("Moved Mountains", ID-A 14/11, "Edelsteine", ID-G 24/12) and Ries explains the world of ores, fossil energy sources, industrial minerals and mass raw materials (e.g. salts, stones and earths). Part 1 deals with different types of deposits and their formation. Important historical (e.g. black forest, resin) but also current deposits worldwide are presented on land and in the sea. Part 2 is classified according to the raw materials. In addition to the creation, properties, use, mining and preparation, it also deals with economic, political, social and ecological aspects. With an understandable and balanced representation of the currently discussed tailings and thus excellently illustrated by the associated deposits.
content.title_en: The world of raw materials : deposits, extraction and economic aspects

content.text: Energy-saving construction and renovation: neutral technical information for more energy efficiency. Competent, product-neutral guide for homeowners and potential builders on the topic of energy-efficient, healthy construction and modernization. The new edition appears at the same price as the content-like joint edition of the publishing houses Blottner and Fraunhofer IRB (ISBN 978-3-8167-9182-9). Compared to the 4th edition 2009 (BA 9/09) more readable by a 2-column layout, continuously updated, extended and brought to the current state of regulations and building insulation standards (EnEV 2014). Preliminary editions must be replaced. Further recommended as basic stock title. Before G. Hopper Perger: "Renovating and Modernizing" (ID-B 34/14), "From old building to the efficiency house" (ID-A 21/14), K. Micksch: "Energy-efficient and renewable energies ... " (in this No.) and U. Stamp: "Renovating and modernizing in old and new buildings" (ID-B 43/11) with a slightly different emphasis on healthy building owners/KA.
content.title_en: Energy-saving construction and renovation guide : neutral technical information for more energy efficiency

content.text: Manual of Strohballenbau: Basics, constructions, examples. The manual for planners, executioners (architects, engineers, craftsmen, self-builders) and construction interested persons provides practical and understandable information about rules for building with straw, constructional aspects, structural design, constructional details, possible errors and presents 36 realized houses. (LK/KA: Nibbrig) Introduction manual for straw bale construction for planners, executioners (architects, engineers, craftsmen, self-builders) and construction interested parties. Practical, understandable and well illustrated basics for building with straw, constructional aspects, structural design, wall and vault construction, insulation, exterior and interior plaster, construction process, possible sources of fault, passive houses with straw bale insulation and others. Extensive 36 implemented examples of residential and purpose buildings with images and floor plan are presented with the latest standard of construction (Recommended by the German Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of the Standard of
content.title_en: Manual of straw bale construction : basics, constructions, examples

content.text: Crowdinvesting: the investment of the many. The Dortmund professor is considered a specialist for crowdinvesting. It is a form of collecting money for companies (especially "start ups") that are uninteresting for various reasons for banks to get the necessary investment funds. The donors are very numerous and can participate with small amounts with the help of the Internet. The dynamic development in this area shows, among other things, that the 3rd edition is already available (the 1st of 2012 not discussed here). The author lays the basis for the perspectives of investors, investment-ready companies and the Internet platforms acting as intermediaries. How has this developed and how does it work, how is the legal structure, how are chances and risks to assess, what influence this has on market development and on the economy. Widely invested and very well founded, also for the wide (reader) mass ("the crowd") well understood. And "every euro that runs not over the banks, but directly between the parties, helps to reduce the banks' power" (Kimklappen, gegründet) and "the book "Joh" shows reputably.
content.title_en: Crowdinvesting : the investment of the many

content.text: Unknown planet: the amazing diversity of our wildlife. The diversity of the unknown animal world, captured in breathtaking photographs, and numerous information. (LK/KI: Hagen) The PhD-doctor Ross Piper shows the zoological diversity of this world on more than 500 fantastic photographs, focusing his attention on the less respected species such as jellyfish, echinoderms, arthritis or gillhole animals (only invertebrates in the marine habitat). Ultimately, the animals we know - mammals, birds, crocodiles, lizards, amphibians and fish - only about 4% of the approximately 1.5 million known species. This title shows that the large variety of animal species is due to a relatively small number of genealogical lines, which share a common construction plan and a common development history. Great macro- and raster electron-microscopic images show nudities in bold patterns or the hidden beauty of a thick-scary bear animal. The text contains detailed information on physiognomy, lifestyle and relation to survival strategies, and thus is well known for the use of a library.
content.title_en: Unknown planet: the amazing diversity of our wildlife

content.text: Garden designers: stylish gardens of the best designers in Europe. 20 landscape and garden architects who have made a name for themselves in the European garden scene present their works, mostly public facilities, but also numerous private gardens. (Reinhold Heckmann) 20 landscape and garden architects who have made a name for themselves in the European garden scene present their works, mostly public facilities, but also numerous private gardens and in each case an outstanding example of modern groundbreaking garden design. The extensive and first-class picture material shows, moreover, what high quality can be expected from a professional garden architect. Background information by garden expert Kerstin Walter (see her "Southern England" garden guide, lastly BA 4/09) about the respective garden designer as well as about planning and execution of his plant are always added to the list. For every garden lover a fascinating journey of discovery. (2) (Reinhold Heckmann)
content.title_en: Garden Designer : stylish gardens of the best planners in Europe

content.text: The over-consumption of the ecoControl is the first step towards the energy transition. In addition, in combination with other energy systems such as photovoltaic systems, they allow a continuous and decentralized energy supply. In the operation of different energy systems it is desirable that the systems work together. However, it is difficult to operate heterogeneous energy systems efficiently with each other so far. Thus, saving potentials remain unused. A central control system can therefore improve the efficiency of the overall system. With ecoControl we present an expandable prototype that optimizes the cooperation of energy systems and involves environmental factors. To this end, the software provides a uniform control interface for the configuration of all systems to be used. In addition, it offers the possibility to develop optimization algorithms with the help of a programming interface, to test and execute them. Within such algorithms, the user can also use the ecoControl forecasting methods provided by the user.
content.title_en: ecoControl : Design and implementation of software for the optimization of heterogeneous energy systems in multi-family houses

metadata.authors: Herbst, Eva-Maria; Maschler, Fabian; Niephaus, Fabio

content.text: Injection moulding tools for beginners. This application-oriented technical book describes the construction of an injection moulding tool from the ground up: explanations of the individual types of tools, components and technical terms; the procedure during the construction; techniques, tips and tricks during the construction of a injection moulding tool; advantages and disadvantages of different solutions. A plastic part specially developed for this book (?Can with lid?) is explained by easy-to-understand text as well as many vivid pictures and drawings the necessary knowledge for the practical implementation. The plastic part is changed and extended step by step. The technologies and versions, which are necessary for this on a injection moulding tool, are described by design drawings. Maintenance and repair and the essential manufacturing techniques are discussed. (Verlagsinfo)
content.title_en: Injection moulding tools for beginners
Control of wind energy through regional planning - yesterday, today, tomorrow

content.text: Embedded Linux : with Raspberry Pi and Co. Embedded Linux is an almost invisible Linux-based operating system that controls the monitoring, control and data processing of technical devices. J. Quade has already dealt with this topic (also based on Raspberry Pi) and has dealt with the importance of embedded Linux in the programming of real-time operating systems in "Modern Real-Time Systems ...". In this book, the author introduces the operation and ongoing development of embedded Linux. Readers with good knowledge in C are addressed, who want to get more out of existing embedded Linux systems. Alternative uses based on other minicomputers are briefly discussed. The author briefly starts with the basics of installation and data exchange between host and embedded system and then comes based on practical examples of the construction of a kernel and the basics of driver development. Good information source; each chapter with an overview of further literature
content.title_en: Embedded Linux : with Raspberry Pi and Co.

content.text: Qualitative inorganic analysis : for pharmaceuticals and scientists; with 4 figures and 24 tables. To make the complex processes of the analysis of substances more understandable, the structure of the book is based on the increasing complexity of the analyses as in the preliminary editions. In addition to the slightly revised and clearer design, the more detailed explanations to the general parts are new.
content.title_en: Qualitative inorganic analysis : for pharmaceuticals and scientists; with 4 figures and 24 tables

content.text: Entry into VBA with Excel. An introduction to Excel programming with VBA, equipped with numerous exercises and examples. The version Excel 2016 and the three previous versions are taken into account.
content.title_en: Entry into VBA with Excel

content.text: Learning with joy - a lifetime long : why we need a new understanding of learning ; seven theses on an extended concept of learning and a selection of contributions to support. Why do most children want to know nothing about learning after the first class at the latest? Why do pupils who have started to explore the world as a baby so joyfully? Why do few adults still feel that learning is an enrichment of their own life and that it is deeply enjoyable and enjoyable? Gerald Hüther's answer: Because our understanding of "learning" is only historical and that we have to understand it in view of our present state of knowledge. We have made learning difficult for us, and that we have allowed the knowledge providers to give us the opportunity to learn from the institutions created specifically for this purpose. How could we forget that learning is vital for us humans? And that we are not the only living beings that can learn? But from mistakes we can learn. Learning is nothing less than to lose his pleasure in learning.
content.title_en: Learning with joy - for a lifetime : why we need a new understanding of learning ; seven theses on an extended concept of learning and a selection of contributions to support

content.text: Physical play: active, creative, educational. 34 partly demanding experiments from optics, mechanics, thermodynamics and electromagnetism for adults and teachers. (2-3 S)
content.title_en: Physical toys : active, creative, educational

content.text: The end of the Empire : what became of the states of the Soviet Union. Verlagsinfo: The only overview of the development of all 15 former Soviet republics - 20th anniversary of the demise of the Soviet Union in December 2011, on which a strong media echo is expected - a mixture of travel report and historical analysis - facts overview of each country. For the re-issue of the book, published for the first time in 2011, historian Thomas Kunze and journalist Thomas Vogel have again embarked on the journey through the 15 former Soviet republics. In their description of the dramatic changes of the past 25 years, they take into account the recent events and conflicts, such as the conflicts in Ukraine.
content.title_en: The End of the Empire : What Becomes the States of the Soviet Union

content.text: Narrating children's and youth literature in German lessons : Text suggestions - Didactics - Methodology. Whether canon text, school classics or successful newer publication: The manual "Telling children's and youth literature" offers a quick orientation about contents, didactic suitability and methodological starting points for the German lessons of all school forms in more than 100 articles. It can be used in the teaching department during seminars or for exam preparation and also for teaching planning in referendariat and school practice
content.title_en: Narrating children's and youth literature in German lessons : Text suggestions - Didactics - Methodology

content.text: The following topics are addressed: history and economic importance of milk, composition of milk, udder health, milk production, quality control of milk delivery, consumption milk, milk products (butter, cheese, raw milk), microbiology (pathogens micro-organisms and toxins), inhibitors - residues of antimicrobial substances
content.title_en: Milkology and dairy hygiene

content.text: Shopping for the climate: how "2050 – Your climate market" makes sustainable consumption experienceable. Richly illustrated guide for the climate-friendly use of food, clothing, electronics, travel, heating, etc., which emerged from the environmental pedagogically oriented Bremen exhibition "Your climate market".
content.title_en: Shopping for the climate: how "2050 – Your climate market" makes sustainable consumption experienceable

content.text: Above the fire, below the mountain: Roman. Berlin, October 2012, a woman has disappeared. Theresa, born in East Germany, grew up with foster parents because her parents were imprisoned as oppositionists. In the seventies she got access to secret archives of the GDR - frightening, unlaudable documents lie before her. Theresa is cold, and that remains so, because her knowledge is extremely dangerous after the turn of 1989. Reinhard Jirgl tells of an unknown German story: The great bureaucratic reconstruction that politics called the "turns" left intact what they believed to be past: ropes, organizations, and enmities. Yesterday is also not over tomorrow. "Reinhard Jirgl's novel "The fire below the mountain" is the venture to flash down behind a state resolution of abominable murder stories. The crimes are closer than they think – they are at present. Strongly compacted case stories, each one for itself is unthinkable. And Jirgl remains: Algebraische Strichtungsgebräge, nargebiben.
content.title_en: Above the fire, below the mountain : Roman

content.text: The Heureka principle : discover the scientist in you. Science is not an abstract concept reserved for highly specialised experts. With emphasis and passion, physics professor Chad Orzel has written a plea for the scientist in each of us. He provides countless examples such as the cycle of observation, abstraction, testing, passing and correction always - and often completely unconsciously - to be applied when people meet unknown challenges. (1S)
content.title_en: The Heureka principle : discover the scientist in you

content.text: Applied Statistics with SPSS : practical introduction for economists. Verl. Beschr.: The eighth edition is based on version 23 of the program package IBM SPSS Statistics. All SPSS data files used in this book are available at the Internet address specified in the annex. - Peter P. Eckstein presents in this book classical and modern methods of descriptive and inductive statistics, the explorative data analysis and the econometrics compressed. Using the program package SPSS, the statistical methods are demonstrated using practical and real data-based problems and the results are interpreted in a factual way.
content.title_en: Applied statistics with SPSS : practical introduction for economists

content.text: Lateral management: the principle of success for companies in the digital age. Leadership, decision-making, working together: Why lateral management is the answer to the digitalization of the economy Digitalisation will change the economy and society in the coming years as dramatically as electrification did a hundred years ago. While leadership and cooperation in the 20th century were still hierarchically organized, the digital future will be shaped by lateral management – by leading at eye level. Roland Schulll and Martina Nieswandt analyse what this can mean for us and our working world in the future, but also show what opportunities the process of digitalization offers for companies, people and managers: the chance to gain more freedom, more individuality, more exciting jobs, more creativity and more innovative power. (Verlagstext)
content.title_en: Lateral management: the principle of success for companies in the digital age

content.text: The B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2B, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2, B2,

content.text: Richard Neutra in Berlin: the history of the Zehlendorfer Hause. As soon as his name falls, they are seen: spaciously composed, light-flooded bungalows that shape the architectural style of the American west coast around Los Angeles. Richard Neutras (1892?1970) career in Berlin-Zehlendorf was sometimes overlooked. The Zehlendorfer Hause are a particularly fascinating section of Neutra's work. With their complex colour concept and extravagant interior design, they reveal not only the experimental and radically innovative design. Rather, this hardly known side of his construction already reveals indications that are reflected in the following projects. This publication pays tribute to the early work of one of the main representatives of classical modernism and, in addition to historical sources, presents new, previously unpublished documentations of the houses and their first inhabitants.
content.title_en: Richard Neutra in Berlin : the history of the Zehlendorfer Hause

content.text: VBA with Access: the comprehensive manual. The author is known for numerous publications on Microsoft's Excel and Access applications (most recently "Get right: Excel VBA Programming"). For the use of the Microsoft script language VBA for the relational database management system Access, Held has presented a comprehensive compendium for advanced users. The new edition shown here takes into account the version Access 2016. The detailed table of contents again contains 17 chapters. The programming of tables, queries, forms and controls is explained. Furthermore, many interesting functions are described. Compared to the predecessor, the book has hardly any changes. In addition, four new subchapters on recording types, procedures, branches and "with" instructions are added. In addition, there are small additions to the API functions for solutions beyond VBA. A few smaller sections are omitted.
content.title_en: VBA with Access : the comprehensive manual

content.text: Next to us is the Flood: the externalization society and its price. Who pays the price for our prosperity? Sociologist Stephan Lessenich on the social failure of our world order. We are doing well in the West because most people are not doing well elsewhere. We systematically manage poverty and injustice, on a small and large scale. And we all displace our share of this practice. The renowned sociologist Stephan Lessenich offers a brilliant, politically explosive analysis of the dependency and exploitation of the globalized economy. He illustrates the social failure of our world order, because it does not all benefit somehow from free markets. The truth is: if one wins, others lose. Each of us is a responsible actor in this zero-sum game whose losers now knock on our doors
content.title_en: Next to us the Flood: the Externalization Society and its Price

content.text: Atlas of the strange houses and their inhabitants. Suddenly there is a house: a gigantic castle of white wood built by a New York art speculator. A hemispherical concrete that a film director has set up for himself and his lover on a steep coast in Sardinia. A hut in Mexico, to which an American ex-banker has retreated. Eccentric builders sometimes indulge themselves in rather peculiar houses, which Niklas Maak has been following around the world. He has talked with architects and residents and has learned a lot about the dreams, fears and obsessions of the 20th and 21st century. Houses tell the most amazing stories. Niklas Maak wrote them down – not only for lovers of architecture. "An architectural atlas, as the title claims, is not this purely subjectively compiled house show. Nor are all stories equally interesting. The fact that you like to read the book is due to Maak's faulier art and its contagious fascination for unusual biographies.
content.title_en: Atlas of the strange houses and their inhabitants

content.text: The Paris Agreement (2015) which was celebrated as a breakthrough, has confirmed once again that the ability of policymakers to cooperate is important, globally, nationally and in networks, if the global climate is to be stabilized. The handbook provides information on the most important institutions (IPCC, UN climate regime), actors (USA, EU, China, developing countries) and forms of cooperation in the still young global policy field
content.title_en: Handbook on Global Climate Policy

content.text: SQL Server 2017 : the quick start. For the latest edition of its manual on the database management system Microsoft SQL Server, Konopasek has made a continuous revision of the content (lastly "SQL Server 2014"). Although the subtitle speaks of an entry-level work, the bid goes far beyond that. This book, which has grown to over 1,000 pages (formerly 747 pages), is not only based on the version 2017, but also takes into account the recently published version 2016. Numerous innovations and improvements that affect both the core of SQL Server and the frame products (analysis, service and reporting services). There is now also an availability for the operating system Linux. An added chapter is devoted to this topic. Probably to underline the entry-level feature, the proportion of grey-departed alert and info boxes has increased significantly. In addition, there are code examples and practical tips. Examples can be found on the Internet. All black-and-white images have also been updated.
content.title_en: SQL Server 2017 : the quick start

content.text: "I stay, but I'm gone." : Deconstructions of the author figure(s) at Elfriede Jelinek*. Introduction -- Elfriede Jelinek* and Paul de Man - An entanglement -- Jelinek* Author figures -- Instead of an end
content.title_en: "I'll stay, but I'll be gone." : Deconstructions of the author's character(s) at Elfriede Jelinek*

content.text: RiSKWa - Joint project RiskAGuA: Risks from intensive livestock farming for ground and surface water : Final report : BMBF Research projects : Project duration: 01.11.2011-31.04.2015. The research project RiskAGuA covers the following areas: - Screening programme for the determination of the extent of the application and persistence of veterinary pharmaceuticals, pathogenic microorganisms and their resistance to manure recovery and the distribution in the environmental compartmentalised soil, groundwater and surface waters. - Analysis of natural spread barriers (ground, groundwater and surface waters). - Creation of artificial barriers such as biogas, further waste and waste plants, which enable further recovery and separation of water-hazardous substances as well as nutrient recycling in addition to energy production. - Establishment, further development and optimisation of decentralised biotechnological processes, which are to reduce the contamination of soil, groundwater and surface water and waste management in the aquatic environment.
content.title_en: RiSKWa - Joint RiskAguA project: Risks from waste water from intensive livestock farming for ground and surface water : Final report : BMBF Research project : Project duration: 01.11.2011-31.04.2015

content.text: Farewell to the one-dimensional consumer. Basic considerations on critical consumer research / Christian Fridrich, Renate Hübner, Karl Kollmann, Michael-Burkhard Piorkowsky and Nina Tröger -- People in the labor, consumer and media society. On the enslavement and entanglement of the life fields and sub-markets of modern societies / Karl Kollmann -- What potentials does transdisciplinarity offer for consumer research and consumer policy? / Nina Tröger -- Consumer in the focus of everyday and life economics / Michael-Burkhard Piorkowsky -- Consumer education in the context of comprehensive socio-economic education. Pleasure for critical access and for an extended understanding / Christian Fridrich -- Sustainability and consumer research. A cross-over attempt of intervention-oriented science / Renate Hübner
content.title_en: Farewell to the one-dimensional consumer

content.text: The garden book for urbanists : balcony and small gardens, greening of the house. Ideated, ecologically oriented garden book for the nature-loving cityr, which provides practical suggestions for the installation and care of window and balcony gardens, roof gardens, "Bürgersteiggartenn", garden courtyards etc. With many suggestions, which can activate a district, e.g. Bachpatenschaften, sponsorships for the care of the school grounds, participation in the realization of natural-oriented building biological housing settlements etc. Fresh thoughts, new possibilities - a band, which should also animate municipal politicians. (1) (LK/MS: Glaas) Ideated, ecologically oriented garden book with practical suggestions for the installation and care of window and balcony gardens, roof gardens, "Bürgersteiggartenn", garden courtyards. (LK/MS: Glaas)
content.title_en: The garden book for city dwellers : balcony and small gardens, greening

content.text: Refugees in the company: Practical guide for successful recruitment and integration. The euphoria of the welcome culture, which was mainly supported by politics and business associations, made it possible to overlook the difficulties of integration. Because the integration of refugees into the labour market promotes social integration, the topic is treated in a compact but quite comprehensive way from a wide range of perspectives: lack of skilled workers, social fears about the competition for jobs, the need to take cultural specificities into account in recruitment and selection, the influence of the respective beliefs, the experiences of surveyed corporate representatives, tried-and-tested concepts, practical examples, labour law issues of the employment of refugees, with current research results, extensive sources, and also helpful links to public institutions. In this respect, the book is rather a kind of structured material collection, but has really failed to provide social/social/theologically oriented books. (2)
content.title_en: Refugees in the company: practical guide for successful recruitment and integration

content.text: The silent trabants : Narrations. A driver who loves the night driving until a laughing man stands on the rails. A guard who turns his rounds around the foreign residence and falls in love with the woman behind the fence. A snack shop owner standing at the high-rise window looking at the bright trabants of the night. Sovereign, intoxicating and dream-walking certainly tells Clemens Meyer of lost battles and overwhelming desires. These are stories from our time, as torn as our lives, as gloomy as the world, as beautiful as the most beautiful hopes. "He is considered a hard dog, but in his new narration book "Die stillen Trabanten" Clemens Meyer inspects the legacy of the underwent GDR with fine sensitivity for mythological motives.
content.title_en: The silent Trabants : Narratives

content.text: Upgrade: new living space through additions and conversions. Extensions, conversions, expansions. Upgrade breathes new life into old houses, barns or mountain huts. Upgrade explores how architects and designers can transform our living spaces from small changes to complete renovation processes. Whether it is an expanded attic, an old factory building, which is converted into a modern office and a cozy home for a family, or new wooden facades that stand in surprising contrast to old brick walls; upgrade tells of impressive projects and invites you to look at old building substance from a new perspective. A dilapidated barn, a run-down townhouse, a semi-destructive historic building facade - all this can become the foundation for extraordinary and inspiring architecture. This compendium shows how an old shed creates a new children's room, how a garage becomes a guesthouse avvove or an alpine hut becomes a modern holiday home. And with a smaller budget, you can also create something new and desirable. The projects in this book can be seen as a new, innovative building, and can be seen as an impressively new building, and can be used as a new, new building.
content.title_en: Upgrade : new housing through expansions and conversions
